But I still needed to work on healing the gut and stepping further down this path of healthy living.  No matter how healthy I ate, I still was experiencing some IBS.  Typical allopathic doctors simply want to throw drugs and even surgery at you.  Few want to address the root of the issues.  I had read many times that probiotics are one of the puzzle pieces in the whole healthy living picture.  So, I ordered these.  I started taking them 6 days ago and I've had 5 days of very good, healthy results. (the first day, I think my body did a small adjustment period of stalling and wait-and-see. title: Very, very encouraged
body: This is the first time I've taken probiotics.  After lots of research, I decided to try this product and they are not disappointing. I started this health journey 10 years ago after watching the documentary "Supersize Me", which completely changed my world from the typical S.A.D. diet to the whole foods/no processed healthy world we are enjoying now.  But I still needed to work on healing the gut and stepping further down this path of healthy living.  No matter how healthy I ate, I still was experiencing some IBS.  Typical allopathic doctors simply want to throw drugs and even surgery at you.  Few want to address the root of the issues.  I had read many times that probiotics are one of the puzzle pieces in the whole healthy living picture.  So, I ordered these.  I started taking them 6 days ago and I've had 5 days of very good, healthy results. (the first day, I think my body did a small adjustment period of stalling and wait-and-see. I had no problems - I simply experienced  nothing.  Next day I was fine)  So, the jury is still out on the long term effect, but I am very, very encouraged now.

title: The only probiotics I will buy now!
body: Outstanding product; by far the best and most effective  probiotics I've ever purchased.  I had just completed a course of antibiotics and was having the normal gastrointestinal side effects.  I ordered these due to the inclusion of probiotics and the special packaging to retain the live cultures.  The product arrived VERY quickly.  And what a wonderful difference it has made!  My system was back to normal within just 2 - 3 days.  I will not bother buying any other probiotic products now that I've discovered this one.  In addition, the owner of the company sent an email via Amazon to ensure I was satisfied with his product, which I consider above and beyond.  Thank you, Naturo Sciences!

title: Five Stars

title: Good Product!
body: We have been using Probiotics 15 for 6 months now and would highly recommend it.  Product comes fast and correct every time.  My husband and I both felt Probiotics 15 was gentle on the stomach.  I have gastrointestinal issues and Probiotics 15 did not irritate my stomach.  Alleviates the gassy bloated feeling.  Helps keep things flowing on a regular consistent basis.

title: Love it!!
body: Love it!!

title: Product /company review.
body: It's always hard to review probiotics in my opinion because it's not like it's something you can necessarily feel happening to you or at least I don't. However, when I first started taking this product, I immediately noticed a change with my bowels. I rated it a four ONLY because the changes I was hoping to have, haven't necessarily happened yet but then again I haven't consistently taken it everyday and I'm sure the changes I need would entail taking probiotics for a long time.

title: Wonderful Product and Super Customer Support
body: I really liked the price and quality of this supplement.  I has helped me personally with some gastrointestinal issues and comes in a blister pack which preserves the shelf life in my opinion.  This is my second order of this product and it has proved to be the only one I have used so far that really helped .e with inteetinal bloating and gas.  My physician suggested another probiotic brand but this is much more effective for me..  I stand by everything I have said about this product and I love dealing with the company that manufactures it.  First Rate.  I just received another order of this product and can not begin to tell you how impressed I was with both the company and vendor maintaining contact with me over an issue I had.  Products manufacturing process is exceptional.

title: Probiotics 15 Allows Me to Take Medicine without Stomach Upset
body: I have a very sensitive stomach. In the past I have only been able to take about 5 or 6 doses of medications that are hard on the stomach such as Advil before the discomfort is so great that I can't tolerate the medicine anymore. One day I realized that I'd been taking a lot of Advil for pain over the course of a few weeks and wasn't having any stomach discomfort at all. The only thing different was the addition of the Probiotics 15. Then I started thinking about it and have had far fewer digestive issues since taking it. I highly recommend this product.

title: VERY quality product that does exactly what it claims!
body: I've only been taking this probiotic for a little over a week but in that short period of time, the digestive issues I've experienced for my entire adult life (I'm now in my late 30s) have been completely eradicated! I take this probiotic in conjunction with one other that is designed specifically for women. The combination of the two have truly been a godsend. I will never be without this product! Highly recommend!

title: TMI, but worth it
body: I just had gastric bypass and I told by the dr to find a good probiotic that is over 10 million bcu's so I don't get constipated. Well, I didn't head is warning and I became constipated. Bad. Decided I was going to try this product and within for days, relief! Now I am normal and daily. It's worth it!

title: It's as if I took nothing
body: I have been taking it for 3 weeks and I still have not noticed a change in my weekly bowel movements and I really mean weekly. I poop, maybe once a week, usually on Sundays to be exact. Maybe the pack is a dud. I don't know. I do know that I will not buy another box.

title: Love it
body: I got this because I was taking long term antibiotics and didn't want it to effect my digestive system in a negative way. It works great. Normally I am very irregular with my bowel movements but after taking this for a few days I am now very regular and not having really any problems! The packaging is wonderful too! Very easy to take one on the go if I don't have time to take it in the mornings. Would definitely recommend to any one who needs a good probiotic.

title: Not For Me
body: I have had a very bad reaction to these pills. They have caused insomnia. My other concern is that these pills lose potency if exposed to hot summer temperatures. I am surprised that they are not shipped with dry ice or something to ensure they remain potent.

title: Quick delivery, starting to feel better
body: Package arrived quickly which was great because I was anxious to start taking it.  I had suffered with IBS for years before taking a probiotic (Pearls).  It worked to get me back on track, and I stopped taking it about 8 months ago.  Over one weekend in late January, celebrating my birthday, I ate a lot of sugar (cake, of course), and alcoholic drinks.  I felt miserable on Monday, intestinal problems, aches and pains, and the worst was a really bad eye inflammation. Doctors prescribed drops and ointments for my eyes, but healing has been very slow.  I decided to start working on getting well from the inside out, making dietary changes and taking a probiotic again. I chose Probiotics 15 because of the good reviews.  I've been taking this probiotic for only 1 week, but so far so good.  I will report back after more time has passed.

title: WASTE OF MONEY
body: Didn't do anything at all for me and my husband...wound not waste your money on this product.

title: Will be taking from now on
body: We have never tried probiotics before, so these are the first & only ones for us so far. We love them, and will continue to take them from now on. They have done a lot to help my husband. He has been suffering gallbladder issues & a # of other gut issues, and this has helped to make him feel better, far more than any medicine the doctors have given him.

title: I have tried a few other probiotics and have been ...
body: I have tried a few other probiotics and have been sticking with these because they are in blister packs, cost about the same as others, and have worked well in eliminating acid reflux for me and in general improving gut health.

title: As far as effectiveness, the Jury is still out.  But...
body: I guess I can't review the product on how well it's affecting my health since I've only used it for 1 week.  But, my 28 year old, health nut son, who knows his health good products asked me to split the box so he'd get 30 and I'd get 30.  As far as effectiveness, the Jury is still out.  But, the product came timely and had a good expiration date.

body: Was hoping this would help with my digestive issues. The first time I used it, it gave me a really bad tummy ache. I continued using it a few times because I wasn't sure if the pain was from the product. But each time I used it, I had really bad abdominal pain. I ended up returning it.

title: Watch the reviews
body: I purchased this product twice. The first time it was ok and I experienced no problems, so I decided to order again. The second batch I had issues with (loose bowel etc...). When I discontinued use, everything was fine and back to normal; so I decided to start it again a week later and the issues came back. I was only taking one pill a day.

title: Not worth getting if you have IBS, Doesn't have the vast majority of probiotic strands needed for help for IBS
body: Started taking it 4 days ago, and all good so far.  I did a lot of research online before I chose this product, and numerous sites (that rate probiotics) classed this in the top 8 of the probiotics out there.

title: Did not benefit, may have made matters worse.
body: This probiotic did nothing for me. In fact I had major stomach discomfort for two days after I took this and I recovered in 2 days after I stopped using it. I don't know the reason, because based on the description, it seems quite a good product but I can only go with my experience. On the other hand , the garden of life product which has many more strains of bacteria worked well for me in the past. So I will be switching to that one.

title: No results at all
body: Well I really wanted to like this product. I started taking these for bloating. I started 1 pill a day but noticed no changes, then switched to two pills a day, one morning and one in the evening, but no changes again. I really wanted to like this product but I don't see any changes at all.

title: Buyer beware!
body: These don't work!  Basically a placebo, both myself and my husband regularly use probiotics and rely on them for health issues.  That being said I skimmed over reviews and saw they were high in sales and cheaper than our current probiotic.  After taking for a week we were sliding down a slope  of knowing we weren't taking anything that was working!  So I did some reading on reviews and noticed after a closer look that almost all were paid or discounted in exchange for a review.  THESE DON'T WORK STICK WITH A PROVEN REPUTABLE BRAND THESE ARE JUNK!!!

title: Three Stars
body: it's a probiotic

title: Fatigue Cure!
body: Had debilitating fatigue that lasted for months. Nothing seemed to relieve it for more than a few days. Someone suggested the saliva test(spit in 8 oz. of water first thing in a.m.,check after 15 min.,if it looks like it sprouted tentacles or is cloudy you probably have way too much yeast in the gut)Cut out refined carbs and sugar and took this probiotic on an empty stomach and ,no kidding,got my energy back in 48 hrs!!! That was 2 mos. ago and I still feel great. Your body thinks the yeast is an infection and uses ALL it's energy fighting it. Probiotic also fights inflammation in your body and my knees don't ache anymore.Healthy Origins is loaded with good bacteria in the right amount,doesn't have to be refrigerated and the price is excellent.You'd need to eat 10 yogurts to equal one capsule.I'm telling everyone about Healthy Origins and I intend to use it daily from now on.

title: Was pleasantly and truly surprised......
body: I am one of those people that has gotten to a point where the scale wouldn't budge.  I am overweight and granted don't make the best choices 15% of the time but that other 85% I feel I do.  I love all veggies, am not vegan but tend to follow what I deem as a Mediterranean (dubbed Paleo) type of food consumption.

title: Works on my IBD.
body: About 12 years ago I was diagnosed with IBD (chron's, ulcerative colitis) and was told to take Pentasa (a form of aspirin) for possibly the rest of my life.  A year later I learned about candida and it's effects through a man I met at work.  I'm still very thankful for him, for without his advice I may still be on Pentasa.  Anyway, after spending three months on an anti candida diet and taking probiotics, I no longer had symptoms of IBD.  I forgot the brand of probitotics I was taking, but they probably weren't these.

title: I have not seen a stronger probiotic for a better price than this one from Healthy Origins
body: My Dr. said you need 80 billion CFUs daily to keep up gut health. One cup of yogurt is 90 billion CFUs. Check out how many there are in your current probiotic. I have not seen a stronger probiotic for a better price than this one from Healthy Origins. I take one twice a day, and do things like eating raw fermented veggies during the day to make up the 20 billion CFUs to 80 billion. I do believe attending to gut health has boosted my immune system and made me feel better. Find a better deal, and please post! So far, this is as good as it gets!

title: After taking it for 15 years I decided I really wanted to rid my self of my one prescription drug and moved over Psyllium Husks
body: Was skeptical but this product rocks!  Did a bunch of research and this product is indeed shelf-stable, affordable, and very effective at calming my bowels and keeping the plumbing working well.  Read on if you want to hear more of the graphic details.

title: NO MORE FLU, EVER!
body: I rely on an arsenal of immunity builders, especially this time of year. Whenever I'm out doing my weekly shopping errands, I don't ever catch any bug or illness, as long as I remain on the wide path to health and healing (I also abstain from eating junk and sugar-laden foods. I'm older now, so I must be much more vigilant with my dietary choices). The cornerstone to all of these immunogens is the daily inclusion of 'Probiotic 30 Billion CFU's' by Healthy Origins. Probiotics ensure that things always run smoothly throughout all of my body systems! NO MORE FLU, EVER!

title: Increased my digestive problems
body: I was hoping for good results, but ended up being more constipated than usual.  I had to use enemas several times for relief.  I got heartburn, stomach pains, acid reflux, and lots of gas while taking this.  Foods I normally eat made me nauseous, and I had to get something to settle my stomach.  I'm glad it worked for others, but it didn't help me.

title: Not for me
body: I have tried a couple different probiotics with no luck. They often cause bloating and stomach craps for me. Unfortunately, this product wasn't different. I took it for about two weeks, and experienced stomach craps and bloating. This may work for some, but it didn't work for me.

title: I really like that this product has many multiple strains
body: I really like that this product has many multiple strains, good count (30 billion), "shelf stable," and seemingly a really good price, but they don't work. I've been taking four at a time and still not getting the effects of even a lower dose probiotic.  I don't think they are as shelf stable as they say they are.

title: I like that the pills are small and the CU count ...
body: I have taken this product for almost a month now and it seems to work really well. I like that the pills are small and the CU count is high. I will definitely be ordering this again!

title: Melts in your mouth...but shouldn't.
body: I switched to Healthy Origins brand Natural 30 Billion Probiotic from my usual Blue Club 5 billion CFU product and was very disappointed.  I kept waiting for the usual advantage you get by taking probiotics, but ended up constipated.  I even doubled and tripled up on the dose with no effect. And we pay more for the supplements!  How crazy is that?  I am lactose-intolerant and I believe (can't be sure) that this has helped me accept small amounts of dairy without the intolerance symptoms appearing within 30 minutes of ingestion.  I was a a ZERO tolerance, even buttered sandwich breads at restaurants would make the symptoms appear.  Now, if I occasionally get a buttered bread or some small amount of milk in fried foods, I can handle it.  I have heard that the intolerance it's self can change over time, but mine has stayed at a ZERO level for 20 years, I doubt it will change.  And, when I was younger, I had to take a lot of antibiotics due to ear infections, tonsillitis, sinus infections, so I can bet that my "gut flora" needs this regardless.

title: Hard to believe

Before I had even taken this for a week I noticed dramatic improvement in both of those symptoms, as well as more frequent, more regular BMs. I for one am now a believer in the efficacy of probiotics. I can't compare this particular brand to any other probiotics since this is the only one I've taken, but I believe that this product has worked for me. I would highly recommend that everyone try some sort of Probiotic - check with your doctor first of course. This one is probably a good place to start because it's relatively low-priced, or you can just buy yogurt at your supermarket with probiotics in it already.

title: Solved IBS issues??  Could be!
body: It is hard to say if this product made the difference, but I took them for a while with a similar eating regimen to before and now have had consistently normal stool for a couple of weeks and no more gut rumbling.  However, it is interesting to note that it was after I had taken them a couple of weeks and QUIT taking them that I got the best results.  Perhaps now they are well colonized in the large intestine but not present anymore in the small intestine.  No more SIBO??  No more gurgling and less gassy discomfort.  I still have normal gas from the foods I eat but nothing unhealthy.  At the same time I was taking a Bacillus Coagulans and some gingko and milt thistle, occasionally a B12 and zinc, but no other supplements.  Diet?  Usually like this: BFAST:  bok choi, onion, pepper, ACV, with a big spoonful of quinoa, green tea decaf...LUNCH:.celery sticks, couple of mild radishes, bite of homemade hummus with garbanzos, olive oil garlic, lemon juice, herbs and salt and pepper..just a bite,  a few greek olives, then a big bowl with raw okra, 1/4 cucumber,  peppers, tomato, onion, avocado, lemon juice, avocado, warm brown rice, white rice mixed, salt, pepper....SUPPER: in pressure cooker, 4 oz.salmon, garlic, okra, gr. beans, squash, onion, tomato, cabbage,  with added brown and white rice 50/50, ACV, salt, pepper, 2-3 oz of raw almonds or raw peanuts...maybe a few figs off the tree each day up to a dozen

title: Stopped Taking Prevacid!!
body: Last year I saw my GI for cramping, nausea, bloating, etc. After several tests he could not find a cause and my ulcerative colitis was in remission at the time so he placed me on Prevacid. I did not want another RX so after a month I tried to stop the RX but the pain returned. I would wake up in the middle of the night from the cramping and could not sleep. I had been taking probiotics 5 billion capsules, off and on for years. I decided to bump up dosage and started taking one 25 billion capsule consistently every morning on an empty stomach. Within a week the pain went away and I stopped the RX.

title: Repeat customer - very satisfied
body: I have purchased this product multiple times now, and am very happy with the quality of it. Since I have a history of autoimmune problems, my doctor recommended that I should be consuming 35-50B CFU daily to stay healthy. I take 2 of these a day (for a total of 60B CFU), in addition to eating cultured foods, and I have not been sick for about a year and a half, despite my coworkers and friends with kids falling ill. I also like that it's shelf stable, so I can keep it out where I will not forget to take it, and I don't have to worry about the potency being compromised on the journey to my home. I also sometimes break open the capsules and use them to culture coconut into yogurt, and they work great.

title: effective
body: I've been taking this product for three weeks now and so far I like it a lot! My tummy has always been sensitive to, it seems like a lot of foods (certain fruits and veggies, coffee, juices, chocolate, breath mints, etc.). I used to get bloating and cramps almost all the time especially when I have my period. But since taking Healthy Origins Probiotics, I noticed my tummy has been CALM. It's an amazing feeling! I am more regular. And probably the most dramatic effect was a few days before my last period (just last week), I didn't feel any bloating or cramps in my abdomin, I thought maybe I am pregnant :-) But it came on the day I expected it. And I always, always, always had cramps. So I can only attribute this wonderful change to Healthy Origins Probiotics. My tummy is happier :-)

I will reorder as often as needed and as long as they manufacture the product, which I hope they continue to do for a long time.

title: I felt great at first but then got excruciating back pain
body: I bought this product a little over a month ago.  My husband did a lot of research and we went with this one because it met all of our requirements and it had mostly positive reviews.  I immediately noticed an improvement in my energy level and I craved junk food significantly less.  I felt great!  On day four, I suddenly got excruciating lower back pain.  I didn't wake up with it;  it hit me out of nowhere. Two days later,  my husband had the same back pain.  We stopped taking the probiotics.  The pain lasted for 7 solid days of agony.  And then it disappeared.  I did some googling to see if the pills could have caused this problem but I didn't see any connection.  A month goes by and I decide to give it another try.  Today, I'm on day four and out of nowhere, I have the same horrible back pain.  It has to be the probiotics.  I will never take this probiotic again.  I'm so disappointed because I felt amazing those first few days but I can't risk this happening anymore.

title: Miracle Worker
body: I know this will sound ridiculous, but it's true: these probiotics changed my life. Before taking them I was slogging through every day thinking that this was what it felt like to be old. I was planning on retiring at the end of the school year. I teach primary students and spent too much of the day sitting.I walked slowly, felt tired all the time, and had no desire to do anything. After about four weeks of taking these probiotics I found I was running around the classroom checking on students filled with enthusiasm and energy. At home I started cleaning, organizing, and cooking from scratch. When I stopped to wonder what had changed in my life, I realized the only difference was these probiotics.

title: Love these!
body: My, oh my! I started taking these after a friend explained to me the importance of a healthy gut. My father died young from a heart attack, and my 61 year old mother was just diagnosed with dementia, so genetics may not be on my side. I've been taking these for almost a month, and I can't believe what's happening to me. I eat right, stay away from processed foods, and I exercise daily, but my tummy was large, and my knees ached all the time. My tummy is almost flat. Seriously! After two kids, and almost two decades of a big tummy, it's just gone! I guess that pretty much proves that my gut was far from healthy. The other thing is, my knee pain and swelling have disappeared. I was able to play tennis last week without wearing knee braces, and I went for a 2 mile run with zero pain. Some may say I'm experiencing a placebo effect. I may be, but truthfully, I really don't care. I just know that I feel better than I have in years.

title: Probiotics Okay
body: I have used another brand of probiotics and read somewhere that you should switch up from time to time so I tried these.  They are okay meaning that it works however I think I will switch back to New Chapter because I think they work even better for my system.  I am currently using Garden of Life for women which combines vitamins with the probiotics and its okay but I still prefer the New Chapter so I will be switching back.

title: This one def works!
body: I have taken many types of Probiotics consistently for Candida and IBS issues. I can tell this one works simply from the immediate die-off reaction I had (upset stomach/poops that same evening that I started). None of the other cheaper brands I have taken created the immediate "die-off" reaction so I now know they were all a waste of money. They were cheaper but ineffective. I will stick with the more expensive product that works.

title: Two weeks in and already noticing a difference with my ...
body: Two weeks in and already noticing a difference with my acid reflux. Stopped taking the GNC 25 Billion CFU w/digestive enzymes as I wasn't seeing what I had hoped for other than more regular BMs. With Dr Mercola, I have seen less of an issue with the acid reflux and have made no other major changes to my diet other than eating less and avoiding some (not all) of the trigger foods. I have had BM issues over the last two weeks which was reported by others however, but that is nothing new for me, so I started taking Metamucil again. Problem solved. I will continue with Dr Mercola's Complete Probiotics until there is a reason not to!!

title: So far so good been taking these for almost a month had used ...
body: So far so good been taking these for almost a month had used pearls before this for about a month also. The Dr Mercola brand caused thrush in my mouth and a painless white sore in my lower lip which as since almost cleared up. I take that as a die off sinario. The reason I'm giving it 5 stars is I have had 2 family members with flu and another come down with it cough, sore throat, fever, chills, body aches ect. So far just some sinus pressure which I used a netti pot with the saline and a mercola capsule mixed in works awesome. I have no complaints so far its definitely boosted my immune system because being the main care giver to my sick family members and no signs if illness is a big plus in my book very pleased.

title: Little gems despite the cost
body: I am a UC patient and after suffering through a worsening flare-up, and not getting a call back from my doc before a weekend, I took things into my own hands. I ordered Dr. Mercola Complete Probiotics on a Saturday morning and it arrived by late afternoon.  Immediately started taking 4 a day (Note: the bottle recommends 2 a day -- I took 2 in the morning, and 2 in afternoon/evening), plus my existing meds plus a change in diet and I was able to get myself out of the flare without resorting to the dreaded prednisone.  I definitely credit the probiotic to some extent as my meds/diet alone haven't helped me in similar situations in the past. I also make my own kefir for health reasons, but these little gems seem to really do the trick even though they are expensive.

title: Helps Me
body: I'm a dyspeptic old lady desperate for digestive relief since gallbladder removal about 3 years ago. I've taken one capsule a day since receiving my first bottle a few weeks ago. I also take Mercola's digestive enzyme formula (one capsule with my main daily meal) and chew a couple bromelain/papain tabs when I eat anything. I eat a healthy, fresh, reasonably low-fat diet, NO fast or fried food and minimal processed or restaurant food. I do treat myself to a little beer & chocolate daily, hey a girl's gotta live. At last, I'm truly seeing improvement. What a nice surprise. Worth a try, good luck to all!

title: best to take it on an empty stomach so that ...
body: I have had a problem with diarrhea for 2 months, ever since trying cumerin.  I have tried various products, including yogurt and other probiotic capsules.  This product turned things around for me in two days.  I will definitely continue to use it as a prophylaxis.  Note:  best to take it on an empty stomach so that there will be less stomach acid present, which can kill beneficial bacteria.

title: Well worth the cost
body: This product works very well. I started my journey to a healthier lifestyle with these probiotics. In the beginning I had to take a probiotic with each meal but as my intestinal health improve (regular bowel movements) I reduced my intake to 2 probiotics a day. I highly recommend this product.

body: Love Mercola products. I'm on long term antibiotics for chronic lyme. I switch out my probiotics but rotate this one in often since it's a well known formula that my Dr recommends.

title: A good product
body: I was on antibiotics for over 15 days and knew that I had to take something that would normalize my gut. My brother suggested this product, I ordered it, took it and in about a weeks time my gut was back to normal. I continue taking it just to keep my gut healthy. I would also recommend this product for regular use for those who have digestive problems.

title: We've found that we do not need to even take the recommended dosage. The directions say to use one pill ...
body: I've used probiotics for years and I've cycled through quite a few brands before I found this one. Both my partner and I have had our gall bladders removed and my partner has microscopic colitis, so probiotics are rather important. Other probiotics made our bodies rather "yeasty" (skin feeling tacky under arms, etc) but this probiotic does not do that at all. As far as bowel movements, we've been as regular as regular can be. We've found that we do not need to even take the recommended dosage. The directions say to use one pill daily ... but we use just four a week and are on a schedule of SUN/TUE/THUR/SAT which works perfectly for us. Anyway, we highly recommend it. It's definitely the best that we've used.

title: OMGosh!!! Has this helped with IBS! ...
body: OMGosh!!! Has this helped with IBS!!! I can't miss a day, though, hopefully that will change after a while. Won't be without probiotics again. Major difference!!

title: Give this brand a try if suffering from digestion issues
body: I've taken several different brands and strains of probiotics but I believe that Dr. Mercola's products are far superior. The overall change on my digestion was quick and effective. I trust Dr. Mercola's products as well. Price was good too.

title: Great Quality Product
body: I really like these probiotics. You can tell after a few days of taking them that they are high quality. I am still using my first bottle that came directly from Dr. Mercola's site. I am hoping this bottle I bought on Amazon holds up to the quality. After a week of taking these you are more regular and feel as if foods digesting better. I have less bloat than usual as well. I have several food allergies so this may effects me more than others who don't have them. But people with celicas disease need these! I am highly impressed.

title: Great Product
body: Work like a charm on my digestive system!  I was purchasing these from Vitacost.com and from Dr. Mercola's website, however, they are less costly on Amazon.com and delivery is much faster. These capsules are the best probiotic I've ever used.

title: 10+ years of IBS solved!
body: I have had ibs for many ayers due to over prescription of antibiotics.  One month on this probiotic and a am south better. I can't believe something so simple took me so long to find. I've been seeing a gastroenterologist for years and have tried many medications that never worked and this started working the first day!  It's a travesty all the money I have spent on my digestive issues over the years that had such a simple remedy.

title: Five Stars
body: good quality probiotics, helpful with digestive issues.

title: Complete probiotics allow me to live a normal lifestyle, despite my autoimmune disease. Best price for the amt of CFU & strains!
body: I've suffered from gastrointestinal issues for years, such as chronic pain, bloating, acid reflux, etc. stemming from Crohn's disease. When I finally received the diagnosis (it took years and lots of testing), I was put on medications that I had to take multiple times (5-6) per day and had bad side effects. They also had many horrible side effects that could occur from long term use. None of the medications were any type of "cure", but mostly masking symptoms or keeping them partly under control. This was not how I wanted to live my life, so I started to keep an even stricter whole food diet and added Mercola's Complete Probiotics to my morning routine. I have now been off of all medication for months now, but my Crohn's symptoms that I used to deal with on a daily basis have yet to reappear. I have run out of these probiotics and had to wait a few days to order them (I know, I should get auto refill!) and definitely noticed a difference with some bloating and stomach pain that I used to deal with every day, so I know they definitely work.

title: Helps Me
body: I'm a dyspeptic old lady desperate for digestive relief since gallbladder removal about 3 years ago. I've taken one capsule a day since receiving my first bottle a few weeks ago. I also take Mercola's digestive enzyme formula (one capsule with my main daily meal) and chew a couple bromelain/papain tabs when I eat anything. I eat a healthy, fresh, reasonably low-fat diet, NO fast or fried food and minimal processed or restaurant food. I do treat myself to a little beer & chocolate daily, hey a girl's gotta live. At last, I'm truly seeing improvement. What a nice surprise. Worth a try, good luck to all!

title: We've found that we do not need to even take the recommended dosage. The directions say to use one pill ...
body: I've used probiotics for years and I've cycled through quite a few brands before I found this one. Both my partner and I have had our gall bladders removed and my partner has microscopic colitis, so probiotics are rather important. Other probiotics made our bodies rather "yeasty" (skin feeling tacky under arms, etc) but this probiotic does not do that at all. As far as bowel movements, we've been as regular as regular can be. We've found that we do not need to even take the recommended dosage. The directions say to use one pill daily ... but we use just four a week and are on a schedule of SUN/TUE/THUR/SAT which works perfectly for us. Anyway, we highly recommend it. It's definitely the best that we've used.

title: Complete probiotics allow me to live a normal lifestyle, despite my autoimmune disease. Best price for the amt of CFU & strains!
body: I've suffered from gastrointestinal issues for years, such as chronic pain, bloating, acid reflux, etc. stemming from Crohn's disease. When I finally received the diagnosis (it took years and lots of testing), I was put on medications that I had to take multiple times (5-6) per day and had bad side effects. They also had many horrible side effects that could occur from long term use. None of the medications were any type of "cure", but mostly masking symptoms or keeping them partly under control. This was not how I wanted to live my life, so I started to keep an even stricter whole food diet and added Mercola's Complete Probiotics to my morning routine. I have now been off of all medication for months now, but my Crohn's symptoms that I used to deal with on a daily basis have yet to reappear. I have run out of these probiotics and had to wait a few days to order them (I know, I should get auto refill!) and definitely noticed a difference with some bloating and stomach pain that I used to deal with every day, so I know they definitely work.

title: Seems to be working
body: I have been taking Dr. Mercola's probiotic for three days now and can already tell a difference. I had previously ordered another brand and after taking one pill I had a terrible headache that night. By the way, the brand did seem hesitant to disclose exactly what was in theirs. I did not want to take another pill to confirm that is what it was. Thankfully, with Amazon's return policy in place, I was able to send them back for a complete refund rather easily. While I was doing research for a good probiotic, I learned about the milk test. You can go to You tube and watch a person put five different probiotics in 5 different jars with 1/2 cup of milk in each jar. If the probiotic is doing its job, after a couple of days you should be able to notice a change in the milk. Only 1 of the probiotics tested showed any change. Just as I thought from taking them. Most of them are doing nothing. I would think Dr. Mercola would have a reputation to uphold so I went with his even though it was pricier. Sure enough I am noticing a difference. So far, so good. I will update this review in the  future.

title: Seems to be working
body: I have been taking Dr. Mercola's probiotic for three days now and can already tell a difference. I had previously ordered another brand and after taking one pill I had a terrible headache that night. By the way, the brand did seem hesitant to disclose exactly what was in theirs. I did not want to take another pill to confirm that is what it was. Thankfully, with Amazon's return policy in place, I was able to send them back for a complete refund rather easily. While I was doing research for a good probiotic, I learned about the milk test. You can go to You tube and watch a person put five different probiotics in 5 different jars with 1/2 cup of milk in each jar. If the probiotic is doing its job, after a couple of days you should be able to notice a change in the milk. Only 1 of the probiotics tested showed any change. Just as I thought from taking them. Most of them are doing nothing. I would think Dr. Mercola would have a reputation to uphold so I went with his even though it was pricier. Sure enough I am noticing a difference. So far, so good. I will update this review in the  future.

title: Best. Probiotic. Ever. (for us)
body: I've learned that all probiotics are not created equal and what works well for one person may not work as well for another. I decided to try Dr. Mercola's probiotic because he is a supplement purist and according to his website major R & D went into the development of this product. This is the best probiotic I have ever used for my son, who has Autism related GI issues (similiar to colitis). When he takes this probiotic he has no GI issues. Since rotation of probiotic brand is recommended so the bad bacteria do not overcome the good strains in the probiotic, we rotate Mercola with Florajaden, VSL #3, and Kirkman Gold - which also serve him well. But Mercola brand is the most effective for him.

title: It's ok but did not work for the reason I bought it for
body: I like that this has made me more regular, and it cleaned out the bad bacteria and restored my insides to health, but it hasn't actually stopped stomach bloat right away/while food is digesting - the main reason i wanted to try it. However, it's still a good pro-biotic and I would recommend it otherwise. Warning: this could give you a bad case of the runs when you first use it. I took it the 1st time 3 weeks ago and the next day was horrible.. went five times and my stomach was def irritated. I didn't use until 2 days later when I felt like I was ready to tolerate, but yeah it was just cleaning out I guess. I only had that problem for one day and now I'm regular everyday and feel lighter. I just wish it could have worked good for the bloat.

title: I like that this has made me more regular
body: Last year, I had a routine colonoscopy done.  The doctor said I had ulcerative colitis, even though I had no symptoms.  Of course, that freaked me out and I started paying more attention to my heath.  A friend introduced me to this product (along with taking a spoonful of Manuka honey) and I have been taking it ever since.  I like that this has made me more regular, and it cleaned out the bad bacteria and restored my insides to better health. It is a good pro-biotic and I highly would recommend it to others. Now I am regular everyday and feel lighter and much better.  I have since had a follow-up with my doctor and he thinks it was an anomaly and I don’t have ulcerative colitis.  He did think it was a great idea to take the pro-biotic and I plan on staying on this forever.  The pills are easy to swallow and have no taste.  I take them in the morning with a full glass of water and take them with my other medications.  They come in an easy to open bottle and are reasonably priced.  I highly recommend this product to anyone who wants to get healthier and be more regular.  I will continue to purchase this product from amazon and from this seller.  This is the single, greatest item I have ever bought from Amazon, and I've bought a lot from this site.  I have been using it for almost a year now with no complaints.

title: Puts back what Antibiotics destroy...
body: Several years ago I had to take antibiotics for an infection.  My doc gave me Cipro 500mg twice a day for ten days.  It destroyed all the good bacteria in my belly.  Anytime I ate anything that was beyond foods you'd give to a toddler I felt like I was dying.  I was sick all the time.  Stomach pain, gas, acid reflux, it was terrible.  My doc told me that I had GERD and that the Cipro would not cause a reaction like this.  For months I suffered in misery.  I was pretty much ready to die, because I felt so sick all the time.  I was taking TUMS, Aciphex and sometimes Prilosec, which only gave relief for short periods of time.  I ate tons of yogurt and nothing remotely spicy or acidic. Nothing I tried helped fix the problem.  Luckily for me my mom talked to my aunt who recommended this product, so we went to the store and got some capsules.  I began taking them because I figured it couldn't hurt.  I had suffered for nearly half a year before trying this.  Within a month I was feeling better, and I can eat normally again.  This product is a life saver.

title: Makes Miracles Happen
body: This is the single, greatest item I have ever bought from Amazon, and I've bought a lot from this site (wayyyy too much... seriously, this site makes it too easy to buy random stuff you don't need...). But this item has made the single, greatest impact on my life out of all of them.

title: Great price and they do an adequate job. Helped me recover from c-diff.
body: After a 3 month battle with c-diff caused by massive doses of antibiotics for an abscessed tooth that infected my parotid gland, I was told to take probiotics 2x a day for a year.  My guts were wrecked. The tooth is gone (along with a bit of jaw bone) and the parotid gland still functions at about 30%.

title: Great wide-coverage probiotic
body: Great all-around probiotic that we use for my Dad and our dog, who is prone to intestinal problems since c.Diff. We also use it for the rest of us when we're not having trouble (in that case, we go to some far more expensive specialized probiotics). If you don't need mega or specific probiotics, this is a really good general use probiotic with good coverage. It's also pretty hypoallergenic; having allergies to wheat, corn, soy, and lots of additives, we've had no reaction to this at all.

title: Less belly bloat
body: I ordered this product based on a friend's suggestion. I read all the reviews and decided this was the best option for my needs and I am happy with the price and quick delivery. I have noticed in a week of taking probiotics a decrease in belly bloating, I don't have acid re-flux or other digestive disorders...I mainly wanted to try this to reduce belly fat and bloating. It works okay for that purpose. I'll update my review after a moth of taking these.

title: I brought this item based on many good reviews. I got it and used it for ...
body: I don't understand what the hype is about. I brought this item based on many good reviews.  I got it and used it for four days straight with no effect from product at all. Last day of use I used one pill at night and one first thing in the morning before eating anything and still nothing.  I did what is called the milk test to see if these were effective and they failed the milk test.  A total disappointment and waste of money

title: So far, so good!
body: I have suffered from acid reflux, heartburn, IBS and gastritis issues for most of my life. I have tried every acid reducer on the market and am currently taking the "purple pill".  In the last several years, out of nowhere and no matter what I ate, I suffered with unbearable upper mid back pains, sometimes chest, for hours where the pain came and went and the only relief was walking the floor and burping. I was hospitalized the first time it happened for heart disease.  I have also had a thyroid, gall bladder, and pancreas check with no underlying reason for these attacks. I was told by my doctor esophageal spasms could cause part of the pain. During these attacks, nothing seemed to help; a seltzer, pain/anti- spasm meds & gas/acid relievers; taken all at one time!  After research and discussing with my doctor, I learned the pros of probiotics so I tried a few different brands which improved my issues somewhat. This is my third month using the PB8 probiotic and so far, great results!  Although I occasionally still have reflux pains, they are way less severe.  Another great thing is probiotics can be costly but these are sold at a great price!

title: LIFE SAVING!
body: I suffer from recurring yeast infections and this stuff has saved my life a number of times. I have tried so many brands of acidophillus and this is by far the best one! As soon as I feel something coming on, I take these and it clears it right up! Definitely something to keep on hand if you suffer from yeast infections!

title: Reduces bloating and subsequent nausea
body: I have IBS-C and I believe this has helped reduce symptoms. It has been a month since I started taking PB8 and I've been having less constipation(increase in frequency, no change in texture however) , a decrease in bloat and the nausea associated with bloating. I will purchase again.

title: High quality
body: I research all my supplements on Labdoor.com. Based on third party testing is one of the highest rated probiotics on the market. My wife and I use this daily and find that it helps us. I think this and fish oil are two worth while investments in your health.

title: Improved digestion - nausea, upset stomach, and diarrhea
body: I'm going to be graphic here...I have had diarrhea for a month. (Also some stomach discomfort and sometimes some nausea when I exercise.) I visited the doctor but she couldn't determine the cause. (I suspect my digestive issues have been due to stress.) The doctor recommended the BRAT diet (which I haven't really been following) and a probiotic. I tried this one and have been taking the recommended 2 per day. My stool has been a slightly firmer consistency (still not what it should be though), my stomach discomfort has mostly subsided, and I have not felt nauseous when exercising. Whether this is coincidental or causational I can't be sure, but my digestion has improved.

But I really have not noticed a lot. I feel so foolish and worried now about what I have been taking. I just I put to much trust in Amazon.

Makes a real difference, at least for me, and causes no problems at all. Most of the cheaper probiotics just don't have the same effective blend of critters in them.

title: Feel So Much Better
body: I had been feeling sluggish and tired due to candida overgrowth. Put myself on a candida cleanse as well as taking PB8 Probiotic. I am feeling so much better and will continue to take PB8. Best probiotic I have found so far.

title: Good for those who already eat healthy
body: These are great, but if your gut is in really bad shape, you're gonna need to take more than recommended on the bottle to up your levels of good flora bacteria; at least for a little while.  This brand is 14 billion per 2 capsules whereas some other brands are 25-50 per capsule.  Because of this, I decided to take 2 in the morning and 2 in the evening (I didn't notice much of a difference with just two a day).  I was going a little more regularly due to things being able to be digested faster.  Bloating was also minimized.  I tried taking 8 a day, and I noticed even better digestion, and bloating was minimal even after eating pastries.  So basically, if you're gonna eat junk, you're gonna need to take more, but if you eat a vegan or whole foods diet, you may only need 2 a day.  I don't eat strictly either or, so I make sure to take more (usually before and after eating) if I'm going to gorge on some cherry turnovers for dessert.  Just taking probiotics doesn't solve all digestive issues, esp. if you already have leaky gut or have food intolerances.  So don't always blame the probiotic if you don't feel any better trying them.

title: False advertising!!!!
body: The product I received is Not made by Nutrition Now as advertised!!!! Note the color of label is blue not white and Nutrition Now is not on label. I will try them but if they don't work I am sending back. Disappointed in Amazon for letting this happen!!! How can you trust anything you buy!

title: Great value!
body: After buying another brand at retail for about twice the price of these and they seemed to be working, I decided to do some research for better value.  One site rated these PB8's as the top value and high enough for quality so I tried them.  Was having a lot of problems for several months and now taking probiotics has literally changed my life.  My wife was taking expensive chewables and also switched to these since they are so much cheaper.  Highly recommended.  Amazing how much better I feel now from taking them and I only take one a day.

title: Great for balancing antibiotics
body: I bought when I was on antibiotics for an infection - so as to help restore the valuable probiotic bacterial part (apparently antibiotics are needed to fight infection; but are truly 'anti' - wiping out good and bad bacteria equally).  These worked great.  When all my tests came back - the doctor was impressed at how well my enzymatic and bacterial predictors aligned.  Not to mention, I felt great.

title: Highly recomended

I am a microbiologist so the types and amounts and good diversity of bugs in these is one reason I was drawn to them versus others with a single bacterium. They work well. We take one in mooring and one at night. Seem to quiet our bellies. Definitely notice a difference if we stop taking them for any extended time. Seem to also help with regularity and abdominal pain. good luck.

I've had several uncomfortable episodes in the couple of months I've taken the PB 8.  I think I'll experiment, switching back to the store brand, then trying this again.  If results change, I'll submit a new review.

title: and this one works best for me
body: By now, everyone's heard of probiotics. Been using PB8 for nearly 10 years. Its effective & safe, and the quality has never changed. I've tried several others, and this one works best for me. There's no need to refrigerate them, although I put mine in the fridge until I open a bottle (I usually order 2 at a time). Take it any time of day, with or without food, will not interfere with other supplements or Rx meds (always check with your pharmacist first just in case). I take 2 first thing in the am with water. Aids in digestion, reduces other GI symptoms such as gas, bloating, constipation, diarrhea, even lactose sensitivity.

title: Easily tolerated
body: I researched this probiotic class.  This product contains several different beneficial gut bacteria and none of the species have been associated with causing systemic infections (like some of the better known brands).  Sometimes when I took other probiotics, my gut would roil, get gas pains for a few days, or experience irregularity.  Although this product also took 2 days to acclimate to, there was no pain just growling gut noises after the first two doses.  Since then, I have experienced no symptoms.

body: Enzymatic supplementation taken with a meal can assist in the digestive process and help the body to better absorb and utilize nutrients, slow down the aging process, and improve overall health. It does this in five essential ways, by…

body: I've been using this probiotic for years, and I love that it has eight strains of beneficial bugs while still being shelf-stable. The most recent new use case I've had is giving it to a sick dog to prevent antibiotic-related diarrhea.

title: A great product!
body: Years ago my doctor recommended that I take a probiotic daily for ongoing GI tract issues, stomach pain, and bloating. I have a gluten allergy and have always had a sensitive stomach. Since then, I have grown to love probiotics and have been through many different brands. My current favorite is the expensive Megafoods probiotic, but the problem with that one, and most of the other good ones out there, is that when you travel you cannot keep them refrigerated. An acupuncturist recommended the PB8 brand to me for travel and other times you need a shelf stable probiotic. I bought them at Whole Foods and loved them! Of course they are much cheaper through Amazon, so I order them whenever I need to go on a trip. I love that they work as well as the more expensive brands and are also shelf stable (also means you don't have to worry about getting them shipped to you during warmer months or in warmer climates). Because they are shelf stable, I also keep a little ziploc baggie of these in my purse in case my tummy gets upset at work or while I'm out to dinner. They'll calm things down after a rich meal or a stressful day. A great product!

title: Good for those who already eat healthy
body: These are great, but if your gut is in really bad shape, you're gonna need to take more than recommended on the bottle to up your levels of good flora bacteria; at least for a little while.  This brand is 14 billion per 2 capsules whereas some other brands are 25-50 per capsule.  Because of this, I decided to take 2 in the morning and 2 in the evening (I didn't notice much of a difference with just two a day).  I was going a little more regularly due to things being able to be digested faster.  Bloating was also minimized.  I tried taking 8 a day, and I noticed even better digestion, and bloating was minimal even after eating pastries.  So basically, if you're gonna eat junk, you're gonna need to take more, but if you eat a vegan or whole foods diet, you may only need 2 a day.  I don't eat strictly either or, so I make sure to take more (usually before and after eating) if I'm going to gorge on some cherry turnovers for dessert.  Just taking probiotics doesn't solve all digestive issues, esp. if you already have leaky gut or have food intolerances.  So don't always blame the probiotic if you don't feel any better trying them.

title: My Constipation is Cured!!!
body: Hello everyone, I thought I should help. For the people who are constipated I may be able to help you. My friend over 3 weeks ago told me what I can do to help my severe constipation that I used to have. I suffered so bad and it was so painful to go and I could never lose weight. I even eat pretty healthy, drinking lots of water and trying to get a lot of fiber in my diet (that didn't even help). I used to use the restroom once every 4-5 days. I had severe headaches everyday. I also used to have bad insomnia as well. I purchased three different products and in writing this review, I am going to just paste the same review for reviews in all 3 of the products that I purchased.  I have no more headaches, less fatigued, and I sleep better. I purchased a digestive enzyme, a good probiotic, and magnesium citrate supplements. What I have learned is that we need good bacteria back in our guts. Then the most shocking thing I learned is that so many of us are magnesium deficient. Please, I encourage you to read about magnesium deficiency. It's so hard to test for magnesium deficiency because around only 1% is found in our blood. The rest of the magnesium is stored in our bones and tissues. I first must say that if you are vitamin D deficient you should well of course consult a doctor first but you will need your vitamin D levels to be good in order to take magnesium. The vitamin D blood test is very accurate and I was once deficient. The reason is magnesium, calcium, vitamin D, and vitamin K2 all go together. The magnesium will store better in your body if your vitamin D levels are at where they are supposed to be. I continue to take 6,000 units of vitamin D3 everyday. I live in Michigan and I get no sun. Most people are getting too much calcium and not nearly enough magnesium. I have read that the ratio for calcium to magnesium for most people is 5:1. It should be calcium and magnesium 1:1. I eat foods with dairy and my calcium levels were healthy. The magnesium product that I bought may also be sold with calcium in it. I did not purchase that one because I already have enough calcium in my system but I didn't have any magnesium due to all the symptoms. There are not that many foods that contain magnesium. Honestly, I do not eat spinach and nuts all day long to get the magnesium our bodies need. Magnesium is amazing and it helps with so many symptoms. Magnesium will help you sleep better and has helped so many with insomnia. Magnesium helps with the osmosis in your digestive track. Magnesium can help maintain your heart to be healthy, helps with blood pressure, body aches, reduce headaches, helps with insulin resistance, some fibromyalgia people, helps people with asthma because it opens up the bronchioles so that people can breathe better, and so many more. Now, there are different forms of magnesium that you can take and the dosage for all different types are different. I take magnesium in the form of citarte. This form is very good for people who are suffering from constipation. The supplement I use is in a powder form and I add it to warm water at night before bed. I use 2 measured teaspoons that may be rounded on top  every night. These two measured teaspoons equal to around 325 mg a day which is the daily value of 81%. My constipation is cured. I am also hypothyroid and even taking thyroid medication I was still constipated. I have learned everything I mentioned above after I purchased the three products. I wanted to make sure that all this stuff is safe, right amount in using it, and why it's working so well (that's when I learned so much about magnesium). So, I thought I would share my experience and hopefully help some of you out there suffering with constipation. I will post three links at the bottom of all the stuff that I bought. I bought everything off of Amazon. I would like to say that I believe out of all 3 products that I purchased I feel that the most important one in curing my constipation is the product Natural Vitality Nature Calm product. I don't know if my constipation would have been cured with just taking the probiotics and the digestive enzymes. I purchased those two products because I feel that they are important as well in keeping good bacteria in your gut with the probiotics and the enzyme with the help of breaking down our food. I feel that the Nature Calm Magnesium is the main reason for going to the bathroom everyday and relieving my other symtoms.

body: Product arrived quickly and at a good price. Although I bought probiotics from local drugstore, this was the original one my doctor recommended. After 55 years and a strong relationship with BIG PHARMA, I am now a believer in natural herbs and supplements. After sinus surgery last year I was on antibiotics 8 times in 7 months for horrid sinus infections. Since then, I started nasal rinsing with saline; occasional use of goldenseal tea (now use drops) when I felt an infection taking hold; and probiotics. I'm happy to report in the past 12 months I have not been miserable with sinus issues for more than a half day, and have not required antibiotics in that long also. I wish I had discovered all that natural supplements and probiotics have to offer; if I had I might not be allergic to almost every antibiotic available.

I took one pill first thing in the A.M. and one right before bed. I was so excited to try this after reading the great reviews from other Amazon shoppers. The only difference I noticed from this probiotic was the TERRIBLE gas, diarrhea and cramps when I stopped taking it...worse than I ever had before taking the pills. Wish they would have worked. :-( The only thing that has ever given me relief was George's Aloe Vera Water. My problems got about 80% better after taking the Aloe.

My physician told me to cease the probiotics and just remain on the digestive enzyme regimen (Protease 1, Protease 2, etc.) which is easier on my system.

title: I had been in the hospital for a massive infection ...
body: I had been in the hospital for a massive infection that led to sepsis. The massive doses of antibiotics I was given threw my system into chaos. This product brought my system back to normal in just a few days. I did have to adjust the dosages to keep from getting stomach cramps though.

title: Ordering another bottle
body: I am about a month into using this product and seems to be working well.  It seems to help control acid reflux when added to some dietary/habit changes.  Giving some time to digest before sleeping seems to be the best approach.  It doesn't seem to really heal the inflammation, but seems to help with prevention of further reflux.  I have had success with cabbage juice for the healing.  Vitamin U supplements seem to work as well, and much easier than cabbage juice.

title: Hard to swallow.

They aren't terribly large or anything but, they are not coated and are difficult to swallow without getting it caught in my throat. I used to take the Trader Joe's pills and they were a bit easier to swallow somehow. These seem even more rough on the surface. I'm trying to be healthier but, this is a deterrent to my good intentions. I won't be buying this brand again.

title: Placebo.
body: Placebo effect and nothing more. If you are taking these and you still have thrush on your tounge they don't work. Just because your 'symptoms' have subsided isn't good enough. If you have thrush you got issues and without diet change you'll never get rid of it. This is one of 20 probiotics i have tried. All worthless.

title: PRODUCT QUANTITY NOT AS STATED
body: This product states that it is a 120 count package of PB 8. I received a 60 count package. I assumed this was a mistake and contacted the seller asking for a partial refund, or fulfillment of the total quantity. THEY WERE EXTREMELY RUDE AND WOULD NOT CORRECT THE ERROR. I feel as though I have been stolen from for half of the money I paid. I will never buy a product from this seller again, and would advise others not to as well. However, if you do decide to purchase this product, expect a 60 count and NOT a 120 count as it states in the description page multiple times.

The only difference I noticed from this probiotic was the TERRIBLE gas, diarrhea and cramps when I stopped taking it...worse than I ever had before taking the pills. title: I suggest you try this one
body: This is a very emotional review for me to write. I will explain. I have suffered from chronic acid reflux/GERDS for 8+ years. It has been severe enough at times for me to confuse with a heart attack and end up in the emergency room 3 times. It has severely curtailed what I can eat. It got so bad that I could not work out even on an empty stomach. I became weak.

title: Acid reflux - GONE, digestive function - Excellent
body: I've had acid reflux over two periods in my life: early twenties and late thirties. First time went away on its own after 3 miserable years. Came back more than a decade later, a year and a half ago. Went from tolerating quite spicy Indian, Mexican, Thai with no problems to being unable to eat a tomato or a slice of pizza or some chocolate without 4-5 hours of really bad acid. Turned to Zantac, 150mg extra strength because anything less was ineffective. Ended up taking Zantac 4 out of 7 days a week on average for almost a year, even though I was avoiding any triggers. I was miserable and I was unable to fix the problem, only cover the symptoms. That's the background story.

title: REALLY helps control my (unexplained) nausea and vomiting
body: After starting it -- I really wasn't tracking so can't be specific about how long it took to kick in -- my very frequent (several times a week) nausea and somewhat frequent (1-2 times per month) vomiting became a thing of the past. I took it regularly for about a year and then stopped taking it when I ran out; my nausea came back within a week or two. I started taking it again and feel fine now. So I thought I should post a review, since apparently it really works. :-)

title: THIS PRODUCT CHANGED MY LIFE - ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT!
body: About 4 months ago, a friend suggested that I start taking probiotics. My history with GI problems goes back about 25 years. During those years, I NEVER went to restaurants without finding out the location of the restroom BEFORE I ordered. I located the bathroom in stores shortly after arriving....just in case! I had severe IBS symptoms that would come on without notice. I had life-saving surgery in 1998... doc thought I had appendicitis, but when I woke up from surgery I had a temporary colostomy! What a shock! It was reversed 6 months later. Cause was undiagnosed diverticulitis with bowel perforation that caused gangrene.  Since then, I was diagnosed with ulcerative colitis that was most recently upgraded to ISCHEMIC COLITIS. This is when your bowel doesn't get enough blood flow and sections of it begin to die off. Doc says really nothing to do about it except get prompt treatment at ER when it reappears. I am more proactive than that, so I researched probiotics online.  iFlora seemed to be the best rated product with the highest count of the GOOD STUFF. (I didn't, and still don't understand about all the ingredients. So I was just acting on faith that all the reviewers were smarter than me in this area!)

title: I bought this after researching specific probiotic bacteria strains to ...
body: I bought this after researching specific probiotic bacteria strains to help with fat loss, depression, and anxiety. This has all of them and since taking it I've noticed a dramatic increase in my ability to handle life. I've never tried other medications and I'm not in the medical field, but I swear this really helped improve my quality of life and my moods. I am rarely depressed and my anxiety is manageable now. If you're struggling and you want to try a natural route, this is worth a shot!

body: Been taking 2 each day for 2+ years. Several years' back I'd seen an episode of Dr. Oz, for which I took notes, where he explained which kind of good bacterium did what, (for example, some help with gas; some help with digestion, etc) and did a search for about 3 of those specific bacterium, and this brand of probiotic came up, so I've ordered this one repeatedly.  It's now on my subscriptions so it comes regularly.  Doesn't have to be refrigerated, either, which is a plus.

These symptoms leave as your body adjusts to this active formula.  I highly recommend this product AND you should not refrigerate this product, which is a bonus for travelling and ease of storage.  Also we give it to my cat that has digestive problems.  We just sprinkle on cap on their food a day.  We have 3 indoor only cats, but the one that has a sensitive stomach, does not throw up when he has this on his food daily.  And he likes the sweet flavor of the powder.

title: It really helped!
body: After having a couple of surgical procedures, taking antibiotics, and fighting off 2 colds in a row, my whole body seemed to be out of whack - including my digestive tract. I was skeptical about Probiotics, but desperate to get things back to normal, so I decided to try Probiotics.  I did some research to find out which Probiotics might be most helpful to use, and this iFlora formula contained all the ones that I was looking for.  After taking a capsule in the morning and the evening for 3 days, my digestive tract gradually started to return to normal.  After about a week, I cut back to one capsule per day and then stopped them completely after 10 days.  I have a very sensitive system, so I was concerned that I might have an over-reaction or side effects from the capsules.  I didn't have any negative effects.  I would definitely use these again if needed.

I worry that the gelatin capsule is not resistant to stomach acids (it starts melting if you just pour vinegar over it) and therefore the good bacteria contained inside may be killed in the stomach acids as well before being able to reach the colon and do any good. title: Acid reflux - GONE, digestive function - Excellent
body: I've had acid reflux over two periods in my life: early twenties and late thirties. First time went away on its own after 3 miserable years. Came back more than a decade later, a year and a half ago. Went from tolerating quite spicy Indian, Mexican, Thai with no problems to being unable to eat a tomato or a slice of pizza or some chocolate without 4-5 hours of really bad acid. Turned to Zantac, 150mg extra strength because anything less was ineffective. Ended up taking Zantac 4 out of 7 days a week on average for almost a year, even though I was avoiding any triggers. I was miserable and I was unable to fix the problem, only cover the symptoms. That's the background story.

Three months ago I read a consumer's study in which culturelle was one of three probiotics that were recommended AND TESTED.  Culturelle tested highest for potency delivered, as opposed to potency at the time of manufacture.  I was impressed by that, so I tried it.  I can truly say that this is the first time that I have experienced a definite difference, and IMPROVEMENT!  What a great, unexpected surprise.  I have been so impressed that I told my GI doc about it.  This one works, at least for me.

title: Definitely a great buy on a brand of probiotics recommended by my physician
body: Culturelle is the brand my doctor recommended to protect against yeast infections that many women experience. This is a well-respected brand of probiotics, with the specific bacteria that prevent against candida overgrowth effectively, the lactobacillus variety. They are also definitely good for digestive care, though there are different types of Culturelle probiotics specifically for digestive care, and then there are those specifically for female care. I think, as it is an excellent brand, and the probiotics generally work in the same way, any of these types of Culturelle will be effective for the usage you need it for. I found it very helpful, and it has prevented me from suffering unnecessary trips to the doctor's office and the usage of prescription medications that are essentially ineffective anyway, in the long run. I highly recommend this product. I also recommend that you store it in your refrigerator, where probiotics have the most longetivity. They do not store as well at room temperature, as you have to remember the bacteria need to stay alive. The price on Amazon for Culturelle beats out the price of any stores I have walked into and looked for it at, and this is a really great deal.

title: Been on anitbiotics and can't get rid of diarrhea ?...this may be your "silver bullet "
body: Personal Experience: My husband who is deceased now had his leg amputated after years on antibiotics. The last round almost killed him but the infection won and he lost his leg. After that we thought our lives would return to normal once he got his prosthesis. However he had 2 yrs of diarrhea afterwards with everything tried including: water testing, cold stored prescription probiotics, Cholestiramine powder, colonoscopy, and a vast awray of home remedies and to no avail. My husband could not leave the house having to stay near the toilet or bedside commode. Finally our medical system gave up and labeled him with "idiopathic diarrhea" ...meaning they could not find the cause and gave up. After three capsules of this product his diarrhea was stopped..A week later I had him stop and it returned..so I know it was this that had finally worked for him. I guess it has better quality controls than the prescription antibiotic the MD prescribed when looking at the flora in his gut as the cause. Anyway he actually wore his prothetic and went out and got employed and helped vast amts of veterans with their benefits and was useful before he died. If your story is similar this is worth a try.

title: Culturelle works, but not this particular box!
body: I have been using Culturelle for about 3 months now to help with IBS-C. It works wonderfully for me. I also bought the kids culturelle for my daughter who is 10 and prone to constipation and it works perfectly for her too. It is the only supplement that works and it works even better than a prescription medicine I was given. So I am a very happy culturelle customer. However, this particular box, the first one I bought from amazon, was not ok. As soon as I started it, I found out it no longer worked for me. I was back to my old symptoms. After reading multiple customer reviews, I found one that described how sometimes it can happen that the bacteria in the capsules are dead. I opened up a capsule to find yellow clumps in it instead of white powder. I returned to promptly and thanks to the wonderful customer support of amazon prime, I got my money back. I bought a new box from the drugstore which works again wonderfully. So be careful where you purchase. Since this product contains live bacteria, where it is stored and how it is shipped matters. No complaints with amazon prime so this is just to inform others of my experience.

title: Everyone should take this
body: As we age our internal good bacteria becomes less and less.  This sounds funky but it's important and you won't believe how much better you will feel when you replace this good bacteria with probiotics.  These are particularly easy to find and very reliable but lots of probiotics will work.  If you are ever bloated, irregular, gassy, crampy...  Your body needs you to rebalance your internal bacterial. This product taken once a day is a 50 cent per day fix and you will really feel the difference.

title: Excellent Product

title: Give it a try.  It can't hurt ...
body: Started taking these when I was put on a strong antibiotic for an upper respiratory infection.  I have tummy issues and a hiatal hernia and since taking these it hasn't been nearly as bad.  It does take a couple months to really feel the full affects of the balancing of the good bacteria, but I must say, it really did make a difference.  Give it a try.

title: This is the one for me
body: I have been taking this for about 2 weeks now and am very happy with the results!  I wanted to find a probiotic that would help me to become more "regular " and also to help boost my immune system, especially during the winter months when I seem to catch every cold virus and stomach virus that goes around.  I can usually expect to spend literally months at a time feeling ill in the dead of winter.  Since I've started using this product I have dodged at least one cold.  It feels like it's about to come on and then it's just gone! Nothing short of a small miracle as far as I'm concerned.  I had been experimenting with another brand and I kept upping the dosage until I was taking 150 billion cultures per dose and I still came down with a very severe cold that knocked me off my feet for 2 weeks!  I threw out the remaining pills and started taking a more "mainstream "brand and have not been sorry since.  I guess it comes down to what's best for each person, but I wish I had started with one of the three most common probiotics and saved myself some money and preserved my health.

That's the reason I took one star off because for the price, they should be able to provide this. title: Works the Best for Me
body: This was recommended to me by a very good friend who is using it to help her get her blood pressure down (believe it or not, her doctor recommended it to her).  She told me it was also good for building up my immune system, which I really needed after going thru chemo (4 intensive treatments) and radiation (33 treatments) for breast cancer.  Needless to say, my immune system was totally  wiped out to the point where I had 4 bouts of pneumonia, the last one sending me by ambulance to the hospital for 5 days.  I have been on Culturelle for about 6 months and am now "going great guns" and feeling super good with all my tests coming back normal.  I would highly recommend this to anyone who needs "the boost" to get their energy/health up to a "par".  I did find that buying it online (80 caps/box) is much less expensive than any of the regular stores, but will continue using this the rest of my life, no matter what the cost - it's worth whatever I may need to pay.

I will buy these when they are on sale, but I usually switch around brands to get the most cultures for my buck.
