title: Got the bronchial "flyer's" flu after a recent flight. ...
body: Got the bronchial "flyer's" flu after a recent flight. Instead of being sick for 3 weeks, as with prior flyer's flu, it was very mild this time & only lasted 6-7 days. I'm contributing this to these probiotics I've been taking for the last 6 months.

title: Best culture ever for making yogurt from milk
body: Best culture ever for making yogurt from milk, cashew, and coconut.  Makes yogurts thick and creamy.  Ferments vegetables faster than other lines.  I take another for personal consumption and use these strictly for food projects but I know that they are powerful b/c they work better than all others I have tried.  Please like this review if you found it helpful.

title: Amazing results
body: My child had a horrible condition of eczema on her feet that we have treated for several years now. After reading that Bio-Kult had 14 strands needed to treat eczema we tried it. She has not had one breakout since we started.

title: I'd like to note that I also don't feel nearly as ...
body: The only probiotic I've used so far to prompt a significant improvement in my health. I thought constant bloating was going to be with me the rest of my life, but by the time i finished this pack of 120 capsules my severe bloating disappeared for the first time in years. I'd like to note that I also don't feel nearly as lethargic after eating as I used to, and my appetite/food preferences have changed for the better. Thank you!

title: Probiotic strain with no carbohydrate fillers
body: I am a strong proponent of Probiotic use for general health. This particular brand is special in that it has no added carbohydrate fillers (dextrose, cellulose) that could feed the toxic bacteria or fungi I'm combating. As with all probiotics, the best results are seen from regular use because you never know when you'll encounter an airborne or food borne pathogen. I have not seen this or any other Probiotic formula have effect against an active virus, other than just keeping a healthy immune system.

title: This has made a real difference
body: This is from a woman with a history of colon issues from Ulcerative colitis in my 20's and 30's to bouts of constipation and gastric upset that has kept me anxious for years.

title: Life changer!
body: My autistic son has had constiaption issues since he was 2 years old. We started giving him this probiotic almost a year ago now, and the results are great! He's totally regular now. No more stomach discomfort and distension, no more crying and holding everything in for weeks. He's a completely different kid and we are so relieved and thrilled with this product.

title: This stuff is doing something
body: Waiting to see if this stuff works. I think I may have gotten a bad batch because we took some and didnt have any kind of reaction...maybe that is a good thing dont know. I plan on ordering more because this is the only product out there that has all the strains that I know of. I wasn't impressed with the packaging of the shipment. The box arrived that had been opened then retaped. There wasn't a packing slip in the box or anything. Made me think the box had been tampered with. I was also surprised that inside the capsule is actually powder.

title: seems to help
body: I'm not the type to believe in miracle pills, and so was a little dubious about trying this.  Our first child did not have a sensitive stomach. Now with our second child, she has tummy aches a lot. A friend suggested this, so  I decided to try it. I got it 4 days ago. The first night after I gave it to our baby she slept the night for the first time.  After a couple of days her diapers were less diuretic.  I would not say that she is totally not grumpy, but her symptoms are better.  I'm waiting to see how this works in the long run to give it a better rating

title: Effective at boosting immunity!
body: I have been taking this probiotic for about a year now, in combination with the herbal supplement andrographis (recommended to me by my functional medicine doctor), and have not been sick once! Feeling well every day is such a blessing. This is a significant improvement in my immune function so I believe this product is working. It also contains a larger variety of probiotic strains than most other recommended brands.

title: Very effective
body: After 15 days of Amoxicillan and heavy-duty pain meds, my guts were a mess- nausea, painful stomach, loose bowels. I started these, as well as sipping Kombucha pre-meals to aid digestion. In 2 days my symptoms were nearly gone, and in four days I feel normal again. But I'm not going to stop taking these. They're going to be in my daily diet now, to maintain ahealthy gut.

title: Good Product and Good Price
body: I searched for a lower cost probiotic formula containing bacillus subtillis.  I previously had excellent results with an expensive product sold by multi-level marketing which usually doubles the cost of a product.  This seemed like a good alternative.  I found that it is not as potent as the other product, but still gives good results.  Try it yourself, the cost is reasonable and it arrived quickly considering I bought mine from an Irish pharmacy.

title: seems to help
body: I'm not the type to believe in miracle pills, and so was a little dubious about trying this.  Our first child did not have a sensitive stomach. Now with our second child, she has tummy aches a lot. A friend suggested this, so  I decided to try it. I got it 4 days ago. I would not say that she is totally not grumpy, but her symptoms are better.  I'm waiting to see how this works in the long run to give it a better rating

title: Very effective probiotic!!
body: Very very effective! I had a lot of bloating and gassiness after my second pregnancy. One capsule a day on an empty stomach is all it took for me to see great improvement.

title: Great probiotic!
body: Doesn't need to keep refrigerated, huge plus since I use it in my deodorant recipes! Any time I'm sick these help me get better so rapidly tummy trouble or not! Each gelatin capsule is filled with a grainy powder form, a little extra grinding and they are great to use near your lymph nodes for added daily support as I do not take these regularly in pill form, unless I'm sick or having tummy trouble.

title: Finally....
body: Great to be able to ingest with food.  If I get too full, it seems as if two of these help ease and digest.  I'm having 2 bowel movements a day instead of being sporadic and my sleep is better.  My depression, moodiness, and procrastination is improving. I was looking for these results in the supplement I had to refrigerate and was not successful.  I will be using Bio-Kult products for years to come.

title: still can't believe it
body: I started taking this after strong antibiotics wiped out the good germs in my gut and gave me a spectacular case of the trots.  First, the diarrhea went away: mission accomplished. Then my mood slowly, gradually began to smooth out. Wow, nice bonus! But incredibly, I started to sleep like I did when I was a kid. Deeply, for 8 hours, and if I wake up, I go back to sleep. I have been on it for a month now and plan to take it as long as they sell it.

title: The BEST!!
body: The BEST!!!!!!!!! We buy every month and these help my sons eczema, constipation and my psoriasis. Everyone should take these if you don't. The best money can buy! I stand by these 100% and reccomend to all my friends.

title: This stuff is doing something
body: Waiting to see if this stuff works. I think I may have gotten a bad batch because we took some and didnt have any kind of reaction...maybe that is a good thing dont know. I plan on ordering more because this is the only product out there that has all the strains that I know of. I wasn't impressed with the packaging of the shipment. The box arrived that had been opened then retaped. There wasn't a packing slip in the box or anything. Made me think the box had been tampered with. I was also surprised that inside the capsule is actually powder.

title: I noticed being very gassy while I was taking these but my guts seemed to be happy and healthy by the time I finished the packag
body: Used this to help out my microflora after an intensive antibiotic protocol for "flesh eating" bacteria. I noticed being very gassy while I was taking these but my guts seemed to be happy and healthy by the time I finished the package. Have had no problems at all since then - usually it takes about a year for my body to get back to normal after taking antibiotics.

title: After an adjustment period, I feel GREAT!!!
body: I don't know if it's these probiotics or not, but I feel amazing since taking these.  I sleep better and have less anxiety and almost nothing upsets my stomach like it used to.  There was about 2-3 week die-off adjustment period where I did feel nauseous with some diarrhea and general felt unwell, but now I feel great!!!!  My son is in daycare and they get stomach bugs occasionally, so I'm hoping Bio Kult will help keep my stomach strong so I can avoid that!

title: I highly recommend this product as my gut is operating at a ...

I have followed Dr. Natasha McBrides Gap diet for a year and she is adamant that a probiotic is a necessary step in gut healing. I highly recommend this product as my gut is operating at a much healthier level and will always take my probiotic daily and that would be Bio-Kult.

title: trusted
body: I've had troubled digestion for most of my adult life and this is the only probiotic I've tried that makes a noticeable difference.  Bio-Kult (only taken when I start to feel a problem), turmeric capsules (daily) and enteric coated peppermint have all worked better than anything a doctor has every prescribed me.

title: Been taking Bio-Kult now for 4-weeks for my IBS-d symptoms ...
body: Been taking Bio-Kult now for 4-weeks for my IBS-d symptoms which flared up recently after a prolonged period of remission. Haven't seen any "major" help so far but have noticed getting a slight reduction in daily flare-ups taking two capsules per day. I'll continue to use until all 120 capsules are taken. Just a gut feel (no pun intended IBS sufferers) but don't think probiotics are my cure-all.

title: For me it was life changing
body: After years of taking prescription medication for my GERD I finally decided that I needed to find a better solution. There was just too much risk associated with Proton Pump Inhibitors (poor calcium absorption).  After a bit of reading I decide on a probiotic solution. I tried a couple of other brands with little success and then came across Bio-Kult.  After about 4 months of two capsules per day I decided to try dropping the medication again. To my amazement I did ok and after a few more months I felt like I was 100%.  An added, unexpected bonus was that Bio-Kult seems to have dramatically improved my lactose intolerance as well.  I'm sure that results vary somewhat for each person but for me Bio-Kult was life changing.

title: start slow
body: This seems to be a great probiotic. We've been taking it for about 2 1/2 years and, along with other dietary changes, this has helped my overall health.

title: Part of a good dietary program
body: I think this is a truly quality product. I started slowly, only 1 tablet at day for the first few days, then 2 and after about 2 weeks, 2 2x a day with meals which really works well for me. My digestion has always been my weak point, but since take Bio-Kult I feel like my digestion is much more in rhythm, getting stronger, not such a source of stress. A good whole foods diet is, of course, essential, exercise, good sleep,etc., but  Bio-Kult is now definitely part of the program! Perhaps the missing link.

title: Summer pollen allergies and dairy allergies
body: Last year my 18 year old son started taking these faithfully from March on through the summer and suffered very little from grass and pollen allergies.  He has had these June, July allergies for years.  He was taking 1 or 2 a day, but then quit in the fall and this year by early June was miserable - sneezing, stuffy, itchy throat and eyes.  I quickly purchased more, thinking it would take a couple months for the body to balance out, but within a couple weeks, his allergies improved by probably 60% or more.  He is a believer and will now make sure to take them year round.

title: Helped my one year old when nothing else worked
body: Bought this for my one year old after we'd been on a cycle of sick -> antibiotics - ear infection -> antibiotics -> 1-2 weeks of happy days -> now mom is sick...rinse and repeat for SIX months, insert new family member.  All due to daycare. The doc had warned us that if our son developed another ear infection he would require tubes and I was horrified to hear that this is a common practice - my son was EBF to 6 months and continued to BF until 14 months and eats only whole, organic foods that I cook at home for him...so how is this even possible? I decided as a last resort to try a probiotic - I had given him one when he was just a couple of weeks old to help with gas pains/colic and it worked extremely well - we literally had the happiest, easiest baby on the block. I liked that Bio-kult has multiple bacteria strains, which is important because multiple strains act to support each other and form a stronger "army" against pathogens than just one strain alone. Most other probiotics can't offer as many (unless you make your own milk kefir.)  This has made a huge difference in my son's health - he's fought off two colds on his own now without any antibiotics or other meds (I usually give him just one capsule a day, but 2-3 when he's sick.) Also, he eats all kinds of whole foods, including a lot of protein and healthy fats, and his digestion is extremely regular - he's never constipated or gassy. THAT's the way it should be - the body is capable of taking care of itself, given the right tools to work with!  Will definitely be ordering again.

title: This is a very nice probiotic supplement
body: This is a very nice probiotic supplement. I am taking this while on a round of antibiotics, and it has worked great to avoid upset stomach. I also love that the capsules are small. Most probiotic capsules and horse pills, but these are nice and small. I like that there are 14 different strains in this. Great quality, great price. Highly recommend.

title: Four Stars

body: I was skeptical because this one doesn't need to be refrigerated like others I have tried.  However, I can tell that this one works.  The refrigerated one did nothing, so I was believing that pro biotics wouldn't help me.  However I started reading about the Gaps diet, and they recommended this one.  I tried it, and I can really tell a difference in regularity and less food sensitive.  There were days when I was nervous to leave the house, and this has helped me regain my confidence and mobility!  Give it a try!

title: I'm disappointed.
body: I have been using Bio-Kult for over half a year now. This time the shipping speed leaves a heck of a lot to be desired. I ordered the product on September 19, and today is November 1, and it still has not arrived. When I realized delivery would be slooooow, I ordered the same product from another seller. It arrived within a couple of weeks, so it is tidying me over. The moral of this story is that if you need to take this probiotic on a daily basis and don't want the supply to be interrupted, don't go to this seller. When I order things from the European Amazon, for instance, they arrive in the US within two weeks. When private parties send me parcels in the mail, they arrive within ten days. That's why I think having to wait forty-one days for it (it still has not arrived) leaves a lot to be desired. I will not order from this seller again. The product itself is a high-quality, wide-spectrum probiotic that does its job very well. Bio-Kult was created by a group of physicians who needed a probiotic that could be used on a full-strength therapeutic level. It's easy to ship, to store, and to take--provided you buy from a seller who will get it to you in a timely manner.

I was up all night, literally, and got sick that morning (first time in the whole pregnancy!). I'd been taking acidophilus pearls daily for the whole pregnancy, so that was a bit surprising. I read a bit about it and decided to scale back at first, taking just 1 a day with food, and the problem has been solved. Just needed to give my system time to get used to them. I've started taking it in the afternoons on an empty stomach (just the 1) and will likely go to 2 soon as well (1 in the evening - decided to keep taking my pearl in the AM).

title: Recurrent Yeast Infections Cured!
body: I suffered from recurrent yeast infections for 2+ years and tried pretty much every medicine out there in order to get rid of them but they kept coming back. About 3 months ago I began taking this probiotic, 2 pills twice a day and then waited until my time of the month which is when the infections typically occurred. I felt some symptoms of the infection coming during my cycle, but then it subsided and disappeared without me having to take my antifungal prescribed pill. So needless to say I am so thankful that I finally found a "cure" for my terrible infections. I am not sure if this success was due to this specific probiotic, or would have happened with any probiotic, but I am thankful something finally worked! I just wish I had began taking them sooner! Feel free to contact me if you have any questions/ have suffered from something similar!

title: Use it for my toddler, preschooler and myself.
body: We have tried different probiotics before switching to Bio-Kult. I was hesitant at first since my last probiotic was causing me colon pain and cramps. After reading the GAPS book, I decide to give this a try since I knew I still needed probiotics and my kids need it as well. This has a lot more types than most probiotics and is fairly clean. My only concern with it was trace amounts of milk, especially since my daughter is lactose intolerant. This didn't seem to be a problem, I did start them with very small dosages of 1/3 of a pill each and worked them up to a pill over 2 months. My son who would frequently get sick was able to fully recover from an extended cold and has yet to get sick despite the cold season. I'm quite thrilled with the results. I too have noticed my food sensitivities have gone away.

I hadn't been taking it regularly or much at all actually and then got a nasty cellulitus type infection in my nose. The doc put me on Augmentin which is a very effective but VERY nasty antibiotic. Normally I cannot finish a round of it without being super sick. Well, I set my mind to taking these probiotics to do my best to finish the antibiotic as an infection like this so close to the brain is a bit scary and it was so painful. I had stomach cramps, minor gas, a couple of days out of the 10 and slightly loose stools 3x. I noticed a huge difference with taking these probiotics. I was able to finish my prescription! And the side effects were about like a normal antibiotic. Also, I am so prone to yeast infections and did not get one. When I started experiencing stomach symptoms and upped the dosage of the Bio-kult, I noticed them improving immensely. I cannot recommend this probiotic more. It truly works!!

title: What to look for in a probiotic.
body: When choosing a probiotic you want to look for a high culture count per serving (15B or so / serving).  Multiple strains, more is better, at least 10.  Look for strains that start with the letters 'L & B'.  You want a delayed release so the bacteria survives the acid in your stomach and reaches your digestive tract where it does the most good.  And lastly look at the potency at the expiration date.  Bio-cult meets or excedes all of the above.  Works well for me.

title: My husband and I both became extremely suicidal after taking ...

Sorry-it was a highly emotional experience, and I NEVER knew probiotics could do such a thing. There should be a warning, no joke.  I'm strangely curious about trying again in a smaller dose to see if I would have the same response, but I guess curiosity killed the cat

I know you're supposed to take 2 a day on an empty stomach, and I did at first. But first time made me so nauseous...it was like morning sickness all over! I was up all night, literally, and got sick that morning (first time in the whole pregnancy!). I'd been taking acidophilus pearls daily for the whole pregnancy, so that was a bit surprising. I read a bit about it and decided to scale back at first, taking just 1 a day with food, and the problem has been solved. Just needed to give my system time to get used to them. I've started taking it in the afternoons on an empty stomach (just the 1) and will likely go to 2 soon as well (1 in the evening - decided to keep taking my pearl in the AM).

title: Caution required for those with PANS/PANDAS due to strep strains
body: We used Biokult for nearly two years as part of the GAPS diet protocol. Initially it was great and the only probiotic at the time I had noticed a huge difference while using. After about 2 years my son was diagnosed with PANDAS.  Considering he had never had strep, I started researching and found that in some sensitive people taking a probiotic with strep strains can exacerbate OCD tendencies, tics and other features of this disorder. I can't say for sure that the Biokult caused this, but caution is warranted. Corganic makes a GAPS friendly probiotic called Gut Pro that doesn't have any streptococcus strains and I would recommend that for the most sensitive GAPS patients.

title: What to look for in a probiotic.
body: When choosing a probiotic you want to look for a high culture count per serving (15B or so / serving).  Multiple strains, more is better, at least 10.  Look for strains that start with the letters 'L & B'.  You want a delayed release so the bacteria survives the acid in your stomach and reaches your digestive tract where it does the most good.  And lastly look at the potency at the expiration date.  Bio-cult meets or excedes all of the above.  Works well for me.

title: My husband and I both became extremely suicidal after taking ...
body: My husband and I both became extremely suicidal after taking this! not sure if we took too much (2 capsules/day and maybe should have started out 1/2 capsule or less) , if it was an "allergic response" ( I've read this doesn't work well for ppl with PANDAS-maybe we have that?!), or was it a die off response (see first premise.) in any case, my husband ended up urinating on the remaining capsules and flushing them down the toilet. Sorry-it was a highly emotional experience, and I NEVER knew probiotics could do such a thing. There should be a warning, no joke.  I'm strangely curious about trying again in a smaller dose to see if I would have the same response, but I guess curiosity killed the cat

title: My favorite probiotic. I'm usually down with the stomach flu ...

It has been a year, and I just made it through the stomach flu season with a big fat zero to my name. I don't know if I owe it all to these probiotic or something else but I won't be stopping them anytime soon.

title: Best probiotics EVER.
body: I have lactose intolerance, complex carbohydrate intolerance, IBS, and PCOS - all of which wreak havoc on my gut. I had my first IBS attack when I was about 19 and I swear I thought I was dying. Didn't have another attack until my mid-20's, but from then until I turned 30 they continually for worse - both in terms of severity and duration. I had reached my wit's end, so I started researching natural ways to ease my digestive issues. I'd been doing well using papaya enzyme and peppermint oil, but they only help the symptoms of you catch them very early on, and even then I was still having attacks, they were just minor. Anyway, I had my daughter when I was 30 and during my pregnancy my attacks happened at least once a week for my entire first trimester. I was miserable, and at my wit's end decided to try probiotics on a whim.  I went for Digestive Advantage first and although they were ok, I didn't like all the junky ingredients. So I started looking up higher quality brands and voila! Udo's Choice. My life has changed. I haven't had an attack since my first trimester of pregnancy, and my daughter's 3.5. One small suggestion: stay away from Super 8. I don't know if they're just crazy strong or what, but those gave me significantly worse bowel problems. Udo's Choice Adult Probiotic, FTW!!

title: Probiotic is great - shipping is not
body: I totally agree with all of the reviews stating that this probiotic is very good.  I was on the subscribe and save program but only during the winter and colder months.  The product is shipped and apparently packaged by Amazon and they do not ship with cold packs.  I would think that most of us who are having good luck with this probiotic would be happy to spend a little more if it was shipped with cold packs and kept in a refrigeration system before shipping.  Most good probiotics require refrigeration to maintain the high quality of the good bacteria.  I will no longer be buying this probiotic from Amazon as they do not offer shipping with cold/ice packs.  Too bad because this is a very good price for this probiotic.

title: Great price - packed with cold packs now!
body: Many other reviews blast this product being sold here because it wasn't shipped cold.  This seems to have changed. Mine was shipped with cold packs and arrived still chilled. title: Finally got rid of bacterial vaginosis after 5 years!!
body: This is by far the best probiotic that Natures Bounty makes. I mistakenly orders the tablet form, not "extra strength" and could tell a huge difference. I have issues with bacterial vaginosis (BV) as well as IBS (chronic bile salts diarrhea after cholecystectomy) and was told to get a very powerful probiotic to replace the good bacteria that antibiotics had removed. After taking this for a month I have significant improvement with gas and bloating as well as no BV after 5 years of fighting it with different antibiotics, probiotics, yogurt, and other home remedies. I highly recommend this to women with my problem. I finally learned that the problem stems from the gut! I had to learn this myself after countless hours researching the net because my GYN and gastroenterologist could not figure it out. Trust me I have tried so many different probiotics including those marketed just for women and they didn't work as well as this does. You have to do what it says and give it a month to see progress. I am just so happy to finally have found something that works after dealing with this problem for 5 years!! BV is embarrassing and my GYN had given up on me. I tried Rephresh, Replense, and other products and they only worked temporarily because the problem is in our gut. Google it and research it like I did. Add this to your wish list and look at others and you will see this one carries the most live organisms which is what I had to looks for.

title: Very Surprised
body: I'm not one who takes trendy supplements and only take medication when I have no other choice.  I have suffered from Irritable Bowel Syndrome since I was a child, so I've had to keep adjusting my diet as different foods affected me.  I'm now well into my 6th decade and still suffered regular bouts of IBS until I started taking Probiotic 10 a few months ago.  Now I take 2 every morning and can eat just about anything I want without suffering any bloating, cramps and gas.  While it's not a wonder drug, it has sure made my life much more comfortable.

title: Probiotics for post antibiotic use.
body: My problems were corrected by using this probiotic.  I actually took it in conjunction with another probiotic to double up hoping to correct my gut problems caused by massive doses of antibiotics taken prior to a surgery I had several years ago.  I had another course of powerful antibiotics late last year for tooth abscesses and I figured it was time to give probiotics a try at a solution.  I have been taking this for about 8 months and my gut problem is all but gone.

title: Too Much Information?
body: I was hospitalized with diverticulitis, and had multiple recurrences over the course of several years. I was told by my doctor to make sure when I traveled to keep a current prescription of Cipro antibiotics in case of another flare-up. I started taking these multi-strain probiotics on my own, along with aloe vera gelcaps, and I haven't had an incident in over two years. The combination also stopped hemmorhoid bleeding, which I also suffered with for years. I'm amazed that my doctor didn't recommend it.

title: Take a probiotic!
body: I believe this product is beneficial.  I KNOW probiotics can be beneficial.  I had some GI issues.  My family physician suggested I try taking a probiotic.  I was utterly doubtful, however, after a few weeks, the problem of a year or two went away.  Having now read multiple articles/research papers on the benefits of probiotics, there appears to be little doubt that most if not all adults should probably be taking this sort of supplement.  Gut bacteria impacts our health far more than I had ever realized.

title: this pre & probiotic blend plus inulin is great and feels like it is fixing my intestines
body: I've only taken these for a week now, twice a day with meals, but I am less hungry already. I didn't expect that as a side effect. My stomach gurgled but didn't hurt at times, so I wouldn't recommend taking more than the recommended dosage at first. In fact, some people may need to take just 1 a day at first while their body adjusts.

title: C diff. Recovery
body: For anyone that has had an episode of c diff., this is your life saver. After having a weakened immune system from prolonged use of antibiotics, I developed c diff., went to urgent care and they gave me flagyl for 10 days and nothing else. Went back to the urgent care from a Reoccurrence 5days after the course and was prescribed 3 more weeks of flagyl and to see a Gi specialist and I am so thankful that I did because she prescribed this to me and claimed it also fights against it and has been proven to be successful. I was doubtful, feeling like hell and that this might be the end of me and nothing will work. I was wrong, it's been 3 weeks without a reoccurrence hallelujah. I DO NOT LEAVE REVIEWS, EVER. but after this horrific bug I want to help others find out about this. Even if I did not have c diff I would take this. My anxiety is down close to none, I've lost a couple lbs of excess weight since my food is processing better, and I feel better than I ever did. Please take this if you have any issues with things like c diff or anxiety, diarrea, hell take it for anything. I am 25 and I take 2 a day considering I am on recovery or else I would take 1. There are some bloating side effects but eventually it will stop. Good luck!!!!

title: Excellent!
body: I believe that I have written about this probiotic before but I can tell you that I was prescribed this when recently in the hospital on some very strong IV's.  I was told even when I was finished, to continue with this product.  I do notice a great difference in my complete system.  I highly recommend this to anyone looking for a wonderful probiotic!

title: Great Results for Digestion and Immune Support
body: I decided to try Florastor after 18 months of struggling with dietary changes, using Nexium and anti-acids for digestive distress with no improvement and a lifetime of oral and spray antihistamines for nasal allergies that often led to painful sinus infections no matter what I tried. I began using one Florastor capsule per day in mid-October and after 90 days, my daily digestive complaints have disappeared; I was able to enjoy all my favorite holiday indulgences (the ultimate test) without needing Nexium or anti-acids once!  Using Florastor along with my regular antihistamines, I am through most of the Fall/Winter allergy season, usually my worst, without an infection or even an acute reaction so far. I have to believe that Florastor has improved the environment in my gut which, in turn, has resolved my digestive problems and improved my immune system so my body can better deal with my allergies. I will continue to use Florastor and will update if my results change. If your complaints and experiences are similar to mine, I highly recommend.

title: Amazing product to stop C-Diff!!!
body: A friend was hospitalized and got the horrible disease, "C-Diff" from the "care" he received there.  This is common in hospitals these days. They gave him Vancomycin and Flagyl for more than two weeks to no avail.  He was screaming in agony 24/7.  Finally they were going to do a colectomy and put him on dialysis forever.  I begged them to try Florastor (S. boulardii) the day before surgery was scheduled.  Overnight, surgery was cancelled.  In seven days, he was C-Diff clear.  I am urging all friends with intestinal problems to try Florastor and am taking it myself as a preventative as C-Diff is rampant in some areas.

title: Florastor solved my digestion problems
body: I am one of those people who have been off and on antibiotics for most of their lives.  When I could no longer digest vegetables without severe stomach cramps, I went to a Gastroenterologist to find out what was going on.  My GI saw the number of antibiotics I had taken, and was currently taking, and decided the flora in my gut was completely out of whack and needed to be balanced.  She gave me a two week supply of Florastor to take with the antibiotics; apparently Florastor is a yeast and survives in the digestion system longer than other probiotics.  My symptoms completely resolved.  After taking the Florastor for about a month and a half, I went on a business trip and forgot my Florastor at home. After being off the Florastor for 24 hours, I had some tasty Thai food and my stomach started cramping like it did before I started taking these pills.  I found the nearest pharmacy, purchased some Florastor, and within 2 hours the cramping had stopped and my stomach quieted down.  I was shocked (and relieved!).  Now I recommend this to anyone who has digestive issues and will probably stay on it for the rest of my life.

This is not a miracle cure but certainly seems more effective than any other probiotic I have tried. I now use one capsule a day and no problems have developed.  As I said, it is expensive for a probiotic but it WORKS!

body: Good seller.  Very good price, I bought two bottles with combined shipping, saving about five bucks.  At this point I can't vouch for how well it works, but can say I feel better and it did not cause any ill effects.  I have upcoming stomach surgery, for three hernias caused by a previous colon surgery and I will be administered antibiotics, of course.  At the hospital, where I had the colon surgery, I was infected with the C-Defficile bacterium, which nearly killed me.  Antibiotics  can cause the C-diff to come back, because they kill off the entire immune system, which is the reason my doctor prescribed Florastor.  Florastor is the only probiotic that is yeast based and is not killed off by antibiotics.  I will take Florastor before, during and after surgery and perhaps from now on.  I also read a study claiming that Florastor is 64% effective in combating C-diff.

body: I had a dentist put me on clindamycin follow by a second antibiotic for another tooth (with no 100% evidence of bacterial infection - just 25+ year old fillings from when I was about 10)... and lucky me, they just happened to be broad spectrum to boot and I ended up with C Diff - so bad I ended up in the ER and was septic. It has now been over two months after my five day hospital stay and I am still doing good thanks to this and a second very hefty probiotic. The lesson; do not take any antibiotic unless your life depends on it, as I almost died. And if you have a dentist or endo pushing antibiotics to you a) make sure they are not broad spectrum and b) make sure to begin taking this and a probiotic immediately.

title: Best Probiotic oin the Market
body: I had heard about Florastor from my doctor but was hesitant to try due to the cost. After a couple rounds of antibiotics I decided to try this.  At two capsules a day my tummy started to act like Florastor was a wealthy long lost relative that came to visit.  It took less than a week and much of the discomfort was gone.  This is not a miracle cure but certainly seems more effective than any other probiotic I have tried. I now use one capsule a day and no problems have developed.  As I said, it is expensive for a probiotic but it WORKS!

title: Successfully Battled C-Diff!
body: Took Augmentin (anti-biotic) for a cat bite and ended up overrun with C-Diff. Read about C-Diff on Wikipedia and came across S. Boulardii. Then found Florastor doing an S. Boulardii search on Amazon and read the reviews. I took it twice a day along with Flagyl and the C-Diff got under control. I still take it, one every-other day, and I am healthy. I am glad I was one of the lucky ones that did not have to take another round of Flagyl and I did not have to take Vancocyn either. I fully believe it was the Florastor that helped the Flagyl work. This should always be taken with a broad-spectrum anti-biotic. Had a doctor known to tell me this when giving me Augmentin, the C-Diff might not have had a chance to take over in the first place. Glad I found Florastor before it was too late and ended up in the hospital like so many others who go un-diagnosed for C-Diff.

title: The best I've used.
body: The best probiotic I've used. All the others with billion of whatever gave me intestinal cramping, etc. No discomfort at all and it's what most doctor's suggest especially if you've had C Diff infection. Most probiotics are pricey...this one is not cheap; however, if you must take a probiotic I can't see why I should have to suffer cramping and more problems from those with the billion whatevers listed on the bottle.

title: Great product.
body: Just way too expensive, because I have to take two a day, am on disability and am being treated with heavy-duty antibiotics because of Lyme disease... for possibly up to three years.  It's been a year so far, and because I was only taking one Florastor, I got a bad fungal infection.  I'm taking medicine for it and started one more Florastor daily and finally it's starting to clear up. Anyway, that's my sob story, but I couldn't even take the antibiotics without the Florastor.  I tried calling the manufacturer to see if I could get some sort of discount, and the lady told me I was getting the best price from Amazon that she's heard of. So, Amazon it is. Thanks for being there! :) Jan

title: Excellent probiotic
body: I have ulcerative colitis and have had two c-diff infections in the past. My gastroenterologist suggested I try probiotics to help with flare ups and to maybe lessen the problems with c-diff. On the one hand, there isn't a lot of scientific proof probiotics help. On the other hand, it's not really going to hurt you either. With that being said, probiotics seem to help me.

title: A Good, Reputable Probiotic....but a panacea?  Hard to "swallow"!
body: The probiotic market is anticipated to reach 28.8 billion in revenue by 2015 in part due to the increased marketing and health-consciousness of consumers seeking healthy alternatives to traditional healthcare.  Some, but not all probiotic products have been studied and show considerable promise. However, the exponential growth in marketing, consumer interest and use has outpaced our current ability to run valid and reliable scientific research on the safety and efficacy of many probiotics.

title: I'm getting married in 4 months and was beside myself with the thought of battling terrible bloating in my wedding dress - I'd s
body: I wish I would have found this 10 years ago, instead of endlessly struggling with extreme bloating and misery all this time. It's only been 10 days and I cannot even begin to believe the results. I've seen many doctors and spent more money on pills and potions than I can even count - all to no avail. This fixes what no one and nothing else could, even with similar products. This product, however, is different than the others. A difference I never thought about before.

title: EXCEEDED EXPECTATIONS!
body: I have been taking these for a little over 3 months. My hair is fuller, My nails are stronger. My thyroid medication is more effective. I east less and crave sweets less. Food tastes better. I'm starting to sleep better. For me it took a few months for the effects to become evident but it was worth the wait! I am anxious to see what other improvements I will experience. I'll continue to use! Thanks Jarrow!

title: Good, mid-level probiotic for gut and immune support
body: I have been taking this product for several years with excellent results.  I have multiple chronic yeast, fungi, spore infections.  All of which were a significant problem before my physician recommended this product.  Now, though they are still present I do not have any clinical symptoms: skin is clear, no longer have mouth sores, don't get yeast infections, even when taking antibiotics no more irritable bowel (associated with fibromyalgia).  My hair is shinier. I have varied and tried other combinations of probiotics over the years, but always run into trouble or a resurgence of one or more infections. So I always come back to Jarrow-dophilus. This is a nice product for the money. Not as man CFU's as other versions, but for me it seems to do the trick for both my gut and  my immune system.

title: I started taking these probiotics after a friend recommended them for my stomach bloating and heartburn
body: I started taking these probiotics after a friend recommended them for my stomach bloating and heartburn.  They have been amazing!  No more bloating and no heartburn since I started taking them.  I like that they don't have to be refrigerated and they are easy to swallow.  Great product.

title: Really works as advertised!
body: This product REALLY makes a difference. I won't go into graphic DETAIL but too often I wasn't fully digesting my food it seems shall we say. This product..just one capsule a day has really changed my....you know what to very normal. I take a few meds for blood pressure etc, too often have a bit of a nervous stomach due to work stress, and I think those meds I was taking  for blood pressure etc were messing with my digestion. Since taking this Jarrow EPD probiotic formula one capsule a day, everything has returned to normal and better than I've ever been in THAT department if you what I mean. Long story short these capsules seem to be very effective.

title: Caused Severe Gad Pains and Diarrhe.
body: Caused severe gas pains, and diarrhea after taking for two weeks.  My husband reports severe gas pains.  So we have stopped taking the probiotic.

title: A daily must have!
body: I have been taking these daily for about 12 months.  I am convinced it's why I've had no illnesses.  I persuaded my husband to start on them about 4 months ago and he hasn't been sick yet.  He generally gets sick fairly often.  I'm also breastfeeding and have been the last 7 months and my little one has had no illnesses either.  I highly recommend this probiotic.  It came recommended to me and is of high quality in my opinion.

title: Effective support for immune system
body: I've been using this supplement, per my chiropractor's recommendation, for approximately 3 years now. My body's initial response to the product was a sense of well-being in my "gut". I have enjoyed good health without serious intestinal problems since then. My last bout of "flu" was 4-1/2 years ago. I believe this supplement is effective in supporting the immune system.

title: Keeps my gut happy.....
body: Keeps my gut happy..... I got this type because it's shelf stable and has all the types and quantities of probiotics I wanted, is vegetarian and protects your stomach from the acidity.  I've been taking it for over a year and I really have noticed a difference in my digestive area- as well as no more heartburn- maybe this is helping that- I don't know, but it seems to have made a difference.

title: Possibly cured my leaky gut/dermatographia.
body: I'm not a doctor, but I believe this probiotic supplement cured me of leaky gut.  I had zero health problems for the first 33 years of my life, then I contracted a nasty case of salmonella poisoning from some tainted chicken.  After I recovered from the initial illness, I started getting rashes everywhere that itched like crazy.  I was also getting lines anywhere I applied pressure to my skin.  I learned it was dermatographia.  I was nearly hysterical after days of it, until I found Zyrtec would keep it moderately under control.  I suffered this way for about 1 year until 10 weeks of taking 4 Jarro-dophilus capsules per day.  At the moment, I am Zyrtec free.  No more rashes.  No more dermatographia.  I can carry grocery bags without having 14 red lines around my arms.  I can comb my hair without having 20 red lines on my forehead.  I truly think this supplement cured me of my leaky gut.  Your mileage may vary, but I highly recommend this item.

title: Doesn't Do What it Claims
body: After having to contact the manufacturer directly, we gave this product the time they recommended to see if it would help some of the issues plaguing the household members. Unfortunately, it did not deliver as promised. Works no differently than probiotics I've bought before that is much cheaper.

title: Probiotics
body: This is the brand of probiotic recommended at National Jewish Health in Denver for their lung patients. Amazon has the best price I've found. I also like that they don't have to be kept in the refrigerator. I don't like yogurt and this is a great way to get my daily dose of probiotics.

title: Great digestive health
body: Excellent product. I was having trouble regaining my digestive health following a stomach virus. Started using this product and got my digestive health back. Great product!

title: Great product!
body: This product has saved my gut while traveling abroad in Asian countries where sometimes food,though delicious can be precarious on the stomach.I take much more the recommended amount,2 after each meal here at home as well.I am also currently on my 4th week of post knee replacement surgery.I doubled up my use both pre-surgery,and now post surgery to prevent any stomach problems that could come up around all the pain medications and antibiotics as well as constipation with the Opiates.My colon therapist(TMI?) told me that one can't take to many probiotics and in my experience,I am seeing the results of using this product diligently.These are convenient for travel because they don't have to be refrigerated.

title: Good product
body: This is a very good product at a competitive price.  I love fiber-rich food, but over a long time this diet changed my gut flora and caused flatulence problems.  It took about a month of taking this product to have these problems signficantly reduced and I can now eat certain food again that I couldn't eat before withoput massive problems.  Therefore it is important to keep taking this product for a while before you can expect relief from your problems.  Initially, I have hoped that after a while I would no longer need these capsules as my gut bacteria would be changed back to "normal".  However, that hasn't work, I still need to continue to use this product.

title: Great product
body: I was having a little issue last month with my bowel , wasn't able to go and feels like I have so much junk in my body.  I tried couple other products similar but it didn't work as well as this.  My sister gave me one pill to try and 2 hours later I was running to the restroom, but not the bad type of stomach pain.  I am sure bowel movement is just one of the benefits of taking this, I only take 1 pill a day even though it says on the box 3 times a day.  I would recommend this to a friend for sure.

title: This may work for some people, but I suggest knowing about what probiotics work for you before taking any strain haphazardly
body: There are so many different strains for probiotic formulas that I thought I would give this a try. title: Possibly cured my leaky gut/dermatographia.
body: I'm not a doctor, but I believe this probiotic supplement cured me of leaky gut.  I had zero health problems for the first 33 years of my life, then I contracted a nasty case of salmonella poisoning from some tainted chicken.  After I recovered from the initial illness, I started getting rashes everywhere that itched like crazy.  I was also getting lines anywhere I applied pressure to my skin.  I learned it was dermatographia.  I was nearly hysterical after days of it, until I found Zyrtec would keep it moderately under control.  I suffered this way for about 1 year until 10 weeks of taking 4 Jarro-dophilus capsules per day.  At the moment, I am Zyrtec free.  No more rashes.  No more dermatographia.  I can carry grocery bags without having 14 red lines around my arms.  I can comb my hair without having 20 red lines on my forehead.  I truly think this supplement cured me of my leaky gut.  Your mileage may vary, but I highly recommend this item.

title: Jarro-Dophilus EPS is the "secret sauce" of traveler health maintenance!
body: This product is the best all-around pro-biotic for people who can't always maintain the highest quality diet. Of course, I always try to avoid simple sugars and maintain a healthy intake of fiber from real food... but that's often not possible when I travel or must eat out in the course of my job. Most restaurant food is devoid of pro-biotic species and invariably contains too much simple sugar. I maintain a healthy population of gut bacteria by taking 2 EPS capsules with every meal. I make it a point to take these capsules with me when I know I'll be away from home. They maintain potency without refrigeration and are enteric-coated to make it through to the small intestine for delivery there and to the colon with sufficient potency to maintain a positive "friendly" species population. When indigestion due to water- or food-borne pathogens cause me discomfort, I take 4 capsules per hour until I no longer feel discomfort... often within the first dose or two. With over 4 billion organisms of 8 different species in a room-temperature- stable, individually sealed capsule, I've yet to find another pro-biotic product that delivers this list of features and benefits - regardless of price.

body: This didn't work for me, which isn't to say that it won't work for you.  I should have researched more thoroughly. Apparently there are some who feel that only refrigerated products can maintain their viability, yet most products on the market are not refrigerated. As is the case with most supplements It would appear difficult to know what is and is not working well, but I take some degree of comfort in the knowledge that these at least make the distinct claim that they are shelf stable and are individually packaged. From what information I am able to get, Jarrow is a reputable company and their price is reasonable. title: VERY HELPFUL IN MORE WAYS THAN ONE!
body: This stuff is great. Helps with constipation. Don't even need to take laxatives anymore. Also down from two stool softeners to one a day and may even skip a day.  I was taking the Walgreens brand of probiotic that was much more expensive for some time. But this I like even better. I take one a day at night. I also take digestive enzymes which I am sure these work together. Several doctors tried to put me on prescription meds saying I was having acid reflux that was causing me to have a persistent cough. I did not believe i had acid reflux because i never have an upset stomach and rarely have the least gas. But they said I could still have acid reflux. I made some life style changes and started this JARRO- DOPHILUS and the cough is gone.  I did not take the JD because of the cough but because of the constipation. But since it's all connected I think it may have helped with the cough too along with the life style changes. To me it's just common sense to rid yourself of the CAUSE of a problem than to take something to mask the symptoms. Mind you I had a thorough medical work up first.

Also on two occasions I've shared food with family where it seemed everyone who had the same food shared food poisoning... and me, the person who always gets sick over everything, was.... for the first time completely fine. Maybe it helped break whatever it was down... but its been like a miracle. The first week was weird, I had a lot of gas out of the blue and random mild tummy aches but after that it seemed my stomach was working the way it should. I probably had nothing good going on in there and it took an entire week of taking these regularly to bring me back to some normalcy. title: I like it but does it do anything?
body: These probiotic capsules are packaged in individual blisters packs, so they can be out of the refrigerator, which makes them handy for travel. I keep them in the fridge at home, but also pop a sheet of them into my bag when I travel. I started taking them after I had to take three courses of antibiotics, which knocked out my good gut bacteria. Are these working? I have no idea. But they don't cause me any problems, and until fecal transplants are widely available, oral probiotics seem to be all we've got.

Desperate to try anything that might work naturally, my sister told me to try Jarro-dophilus. Of course, I was skeptical. But, within TWO DAYS I was "regular" in a gentle and very friendly way. I was still skeptical. I figured many products could work short-term because I had been through that before. So far, this stuff has worked reliably, every day and for nearly a month now. title: I'm only giving this 4 stars because I'm not convinced all the bacteria are still alive when I receive it.
body: I've purchased (from Whole Foods) the probiotics that require refrigeration.  They worked well, so I had my doubts about this product which has a claim to be "shelf stable".  I like the Jarrow brand, so I ordered these.  I take one about 1/2 hr before eating (if I remember....otherwise, I just take a cap with my meal).  I also give a capsule to each of my dogs before their meals.  I know it works, because if I forget to give it to my dogs for a couple of meals, their poop stinks a lot more (they hand out with me while I'm gardening and they like to nibble on stuff they find in the yard).  As for my poop, it also doesn't stink as much.  Best of all, I don't pass gas as much.  Just for that, I will keep taking these.  I ordered two at a time and keep both in the fridge to try to preserve the viability of the bacteria.  This is great for traveling too.  Just put them in your pocket.

title: Jarrows Probiotic
body: The product seems to have a direct effect on making me more regular.  No refrigeration is required.  The capsules are blister packed for freshness.

title: I like it but does it do anything?
body: These probiotic capsules are packaged in individual blisters packs, so they can be out of the refrigerator, which makes them handy for travel. I keep them in the fridge at home, but also pop a sheet of them into my bag when I travel. I started taking them after I had to take three courses of antibiotics, which knocked out my good gut bacteria. Are these working? I have no idea. But they don't cause me any problems, and until fecal transplants are widely available, oral probiotics seem to be all we've got.

title: Effective, good value
body: Supplements and probiotics in general are hard to find quality products for a decent price.  This one hits all of the above!  I keep these on hand for mild GI upset (I have IBS and this really helps!) or if I ever need antibiotics (replace those good bugs or you will likely get diarrhea).  I've heard of people taking these before traveling to help keep travelers diarrhea at bay.

title: Great Probiotic
body: So far I'm loving Jarrow Formulas Jarro-dophilus.  Within the first week I noticed a difference...less irregularity, bloating.  I've suffered from IBS with constipation for years and I'm hoping that I've finally found a product that is going to help. I realize that I still need to watch what I eat...it isn't a magic pill...but it definitely helps!  I take one capsule in the morning...on an empty stomach...and one capsule in the evening before I go to bed.  I've tried other probiotics (Acidophilus Pearls, Accuflora) and they've not offered much relief.  For the price, I think it is worth a try.  If it doesn't work you can always give it to someone else to try....then there is no money lost.  For me it was money well spent!

title: Jarro-dophilus probiotic capsules
body: More effective than any shelf-stable probiotic I tried. Although it's not as strong as perishable probiotic products I tried, it's still a worthy supplement to take for digestive issues, especially when taken in addition to yogurts and yogurt-based drinks.

title: Keeps me healthy !
body: I had experienced respitory problems often. Colds, and flu were common to me. Since I started Jarrow's probiotic tablets I have been free of any illness for 19 months.! Amazing for me, even with Grandchildren. One in the morning and one in the evening. Try it and see, nothing to lose !

title: Just buy it!
body: I've been trying out different probiotics for the past seven years or so, and for the price, this is the best value.  The quality seems to be good, and it's cheap - I only take one per day at lunchtime, and it's helped my GI system and immune system quite a bit.  I'm definitely going to continue buying this.

title: Three Stars
body: I can't tell if they're working or not.  No side effects though as I did with another probiotic.

title: It was just okay
body: I've used a million brands of probiotics and this one is not one of my favorites. I had to, at times, take more than one a day to experience the positive effects. title: Essential For My Good Health
body: After concluding that my consistently soft stool was not a temporary condition, but one which indicated that something more serious might be affecting my digestive system, I began taking EPS.  The symptom cleared up after taking 2-3 capsules a day for 3-4 days.  I discontinued after a week after using up the small amount of EPS on hand.  Unexpectedly, taking EPS also resolved another issue, excessive nighttime urination. The frequency had increased and this coincided with the soft stool.  I didn't make the connection at the time.  I have an enlarged prostate and my doctor increased the dosage of the meds I take for the urinary symptoms.  The increased dosage did not improve the symptoms.  These events occurred about 4 months ago. The symptoms reappeared recently and I began taking EPS again with the same result, the symptoms are gone.  I haven't discussed this yet with my Doctor but I know that EPS is essential to me.  If you take prescription medications regularly, you may find that EPS is right for you.  I tried another product which was not enteric coated and received no benefit.

title: Cured my acid reflux!

title: This product has only 3 defects
body: 1st Defect:  This product contains potato starch, which is high in calories, instead of a calorie-free soluble fiber such as fructooligosaccharide (FOS), mucilage soluble fiber (psyllium husk), glucomannan soluble fiber (shirataki noodles, konnyaku cubes), galactomannan soluble fiber (soybeans, fenugreek seeds, guar gum, carob bean gum), or beta-glucan soluble fiber (oats, mushrooms).

title: Jarro-Dophilus EPS is the "secret sauce" of traveler health maintenance!
body: This product is the best all-around pro-biotic for people who can't always maintain the highest quality diet. Of course, I always try to avoid simple sugars and maintain a healthy intake of fiber from real food... but that's often not possible when I travel or must eat out in the course of my job. Most restaurant food is devoid of pro-biotic species and invariably contains too much simple sugar. I maintain a healthy population of gut bacteria by taking 2 EPS capsules with every meal. I make it a point to take these capsules with me when I know I'll be away from home. They maintain potency without refrigeration and are enteric-coated to make it through to the small intestine for delivery there and to the colon with sufficient potency to maintain a positive "friendly" species population. When indigestion due to water- or food-borne pathogens cause me discomfort, I take 4 capsules per hour until I no longer feel discomfort... often within the first dose or two. With over 4 billion organisms of 8 different species in a room-temperature- stable, individually sealed capsule, I've yet to find another pro-biotic product that delivers this list of features and benefits - regardless of price.

title: my two cents review from my two boys
body: It is hard to post a review for a food item that you yourself do not eat actually.  But alas, here is the review based on my two boys' reaction.  We have used the other brand of chewable tablets for 3 years, with no problems and much love by the boys, but the manufacturer has stopped making them exact same way and changed ingredients.  So I thought to try a new brand.  The older boy did not like it at all, and never wanted to try it again.  He said he did not like the chewy feeling in the his mouth.  The younger boy (who is not very talking yet) ate them just fine, every day.  But every day his stool was too soft, right after breakfast and all day.  Not sure if there is  a direct link, but I decided to put them away, and now his stool is normal again.  So we are going to try another different brand.

title: Highly reviewed inlaboratory testing; kids love them

SO much healthier than miralax or other laxatives. Highly recommend these!!

title: Great choice for kids

title: Good-tasting -- but if you have order fulfillment problems with Amazon, watch out.
body: I just got these tablets as treatment for the associated intestinal problems that go along with antibiotic treatment (kills all your good gut bacteria!) -- and I find that with all the vitamins, minerals, pills, etc. that I have to swallow, it's great to be able to take Primadophilus as a chewable tablet.  These taste great, and when I don't take these or another type of Primadophilus, yeast overgrowth because of antibiotic use tends to really cause some awful symptoms -- definitely a great product.  However, I only received one of the 2-pack from Amazon.com and though I sent in a "missing" request via the automated system (since there is no phone or email support), I've never received the other Primadophilus bottle.  So it ended up being twice as expensive as it was supposed to be, along with the frustration of trying to get it resolved (and not succeeding) with Amazon.  I order a lot of things from Amazon and think that most of their prices and customer service are great, but trying to get the "other half" of the order was a total bust.  I would send back the 1 bottle if I had it to do again and explain that I never received the 2-bottle pack.  So I had to take 2 stars off because I would never pay so much for one bottle -- and it's just plain frustrating that you can't reach a real person at Amazon by phone or email to fix the problem if they don't respond to the automated "fix it" system.

title: Simply The Best And A Few Suggestions
body: After being on antibiotics CONSTANTLY as a child and teenager, I suffered a lot of ill-effects and I have been killing candida and healing my gut since the early 90s, off and on.  IMO, these are simply the best on the market, and much better than the "regular" Primal Defense.  After reading some bad reviews, I wanted to point out a few things others may find helpful.  First off, probiotics aren't magic, and if they are magic to some folks, that's great!!  But let me take this a step further.  Mostly everyone that has bowel problems, and allergy problems especially, have leaky gut syndrome.  If you are REALLY sensitive to this product, you probably have leaky gut and will never recover if you don't heal your intenstinal tract.  I have found great recovery with a couple of products that some may find helpful:  Colostrum LD and MSM (both vendors are here at Amazon).  I have been on high doses of both of these and I feel better than I have in years.  I used to have severe bloating, extreme fatigue, severe food allergies/sensitivies, extreme chemical sensitivies, carb sensitivity, skin problems, cravings, IBS symptoms, uveitis (corneal inflammation), etc.....but I always tried to do my own research because I knew doctors caused all of this to begin with by keeping me on antibiotics constantly.  Please keep in mind that if you have a severe case of leaky gut syndrome, probiotics may not work well for you and you'll probably never *fully* recover.  Also, certain strains of probiotics work better for certain symptoms than others.  If I took a certain probiotic for IBS, I would get worse constipation because that strain of probiotic is for people with diarrhea.  Lesson learned.  Also, if you have candida problems, I find it's best to start out with Syntol and then go to this brand.  Syntol is great and very helpful.  But saying all of that to say, this particular probiotic has helped me tremendously and I don't ever want to be without it.  To actually have energy and function like a normal person is great!

title: Gut Dysbiosis after taking Primal Defense
body: I have been using Primal Defense for 2 years.  Recently, I was diagnosed with Gut Dysbiosis.  My Integrative MD told me she had another patient who is in the same boat.  Recently, an acquaintance of mine on Instagram told me the same.  She had been taking this probiotic for over a year and was recently diagnosed with Gut Dysbiosis.  Both of these individuals and myself are now taking VSL#3 in powder form.  I am hoping all my issues resolve very soon.  I cannot comment on the other two individuals, but I did not refrigerate my Primal Defense.  I recently found out through my Instagram acquaintance that she called the Garden of Life company and they said the bottle does not need to be refrigerated until it is opened.  I believe there is a lot of confusion about how to take and keep Probiotics so they are most effective.

title: My college kid caught the norovirus twice in one term ...
body: My college kid caught the norovirus twice in one term (norovirus is that horrible stomach and bowel illness that spreads in crowds like on cruise ships or schools). He could not digest food well in the months after that.

title: Poo, Just Poo (Because It's Fun to Use in a Title)
body: Probably the best brand probiotic out there. I had problems after heavy antibiotic rounds--things just wouldn't... move?--and, along with a digestive enzyme, these got things flowing more smoothly again for me. I mean, they were not a cure-all, but they improved chronic constipation issues (I think I may have gastroparesis, which means no probiotic is going to truly bring me back up to snuff, but these *did* improve the situation).

title: Makes me stronger, faster and smarter - no effect on stomach
body: I took long-term antibiotics as a child for acne (minocycline, etc) which really destroyed all of the good bacteria in my stomach and body, and I also have GERD. I bought these to repair the damage from the long-term antibiotic usage and also help with my GERD, and I have taken two full bottles so far. I've experienced very interesting and UNEXPECTED results and thought I would let everyone know.

title: "Ultra" or "Meh"?
body: This is a great company with great products, however if one researches enough about probiotics, and prebiotics, as with supplements of any kind, or vitamins, how can the same company offer so many different versions of a product, but then make one called "Ultra"? Should the others they sell be called "Meh" or "Not Ultra"? I wound up having to purchase an additional once daily live or RAW version by Garden of Life, that requires refrigeration, at a local store, to ensure freshness, that cost me more for a one months supply of 30 capsules then this "Ultra" package for a two months supply. It gets ridiculous.

title: Great probiotic that does NOT need refrigeration!
body: Great product, has the strain that will fight C.Diff infections. I love this product and the whole family uses it for probiotic gut health. I love this choice because it does not have to be refrigerated and has strains that are very beneficial to your gut. Much cheaper to order here on amazon than the regular health food stores (I was paying about double at the store)... My only gripe was it took 3 tries for me to receive unbroken bottles of the product. Amazon was great and replaced the broken bottles (the bottle inside the box is GLASS). title: I began researching ways to reduce some of the side effects and ran across a post on a cancer-support website that recommended t
body: This product has been a life-changer for me! Began chemo in 2013 for colon cancer and have experienced the "usual" side effect (diarrhea) with every infusion. In an effort to take control of my health as much as possible while dealing with chemo, I began researching ways to reduce some of the side effects and ran across a post on a cancer-support website that recommended this particular probiotic. I figured I had nothing to lose except the cost of the product, so I ordered a small bottle. What a difference it made!  Within 2 days (2 capsules!!!), diarrhea and gut discomfort was GONE! I immediately called a "chemo buddy" who was also experiencing difficulties from the chemo and offered her a week's worth of the capsules. Amazingly enough, again within 2 days, her problem (opposite of mine) began to subside. While we were experiencing the opposite side effects, we both enjoyed a return to more normal bowel function. I've been taking 2 capsules daily since and have had no further problems with diarrhea during my chemo treatments.

The recommended dosage is a gradual build up to three a day. I usually take one before breakfast, and one before lunch. title: C-DIFF
body: I contracted C-Diff after a dental implant and long use of strong antibiotics.  This product is a very integral part of my recovery and is an excellent product. I would highly recommend this for anyone with this problem.  Many think that just by taking probiotics you can get rid of C-diff.  Nope.  You must use something strong and doctors often use probiotics with some form of antibiotic.  Anyways this is what I am using.  Turmeric Standardized 2 tablets twice a day (which is proven as strong as vancomycin (google turmeric Clostridium difficile), 2 Nutribiotic Maximum Strength Defense Plus (grapefruit Seed Extract) Lugols iodine 5, 2 drops 2 to 4X a day. Or use iodine Plus-2 once a day.  Or iodoral 12.5 mg. I'm in my fifties so I use the stronger iodine.  multi tabs of the Futurebiotic Daily Enzyme Complex this has betaine hci and pancretin 4X (very important because patients found with low stomach acid are at higher risk for c diff). And it calms a heartburn or sour stomach. Nature's Plus Mini Reds 2 a day, 1 Vitacost CoQ10 + Alpha Lipoic Acid + Acetyl L-Carnitine HCl 1 pill.  Vitamin C with bioflavonoids, Vitamin D 2000 mg, Nature's way B- Stress Formula 1 a day.  zinc, selenium.  Barleans Cod liver fish oil, Florastor (Saccharomyces Boulardii). Jarro-Dophilus EPS, and of course the Ultra Primal Defense as needed.

title: Definitely helps IBS
body: Came down with IBS-D about 5 months ago. First 2 months were absolute HELL. I couldn't live nor function in that HELLish state so I went online and did some research. Found this product and have been taking it twice daily for the last 3 months on top of eating a MUCH healthier diet, stopped smoking, exercising, and drinking nothing but water... as well as managing the stress levels as much as possible. These days my IBS isn't much of a worry and I can sneak in those "garbage foods" (i.e. fat/greasy foods, fried foods) without much/any problem. The product definitely helps keep me regular. Go about 2-3 times a day when I used to have watery diarrhea for a good 2 months with VERY loose stools. Remember, these pills serve as a supplement and won't cure you alone (but will still help you nonetheless). For maximum relief, take the pills on top of adapting a healthier lifestyle. That's the only true way of conquering IBS. I'm not fully cured but I'd say I have my IBS over 80% under control in under 5 months time.

After a month or two of taking Primal Defense, I could eat normal foods without getting sick, and now, after taking it for over a year, I feel like my old self again. title: Wish we could give negative stars (-5 stars)
body: This product made me very sick. I have been dealing with intestinal issues for the past 15 years (pain in intestine, frequent bowel movements, lots of doctor tests to no avail, etc.) so I'm willing to try anything. I took 1 pill for 5 days and by day 4 I was having a ridiculous amount of diarrhea. I have stopped and am now worried of permanent damage as I've had diarrhea for about 3 days now. I do not believe that this is the product expelling the so called mystical "toxins" from my body nor could it be the other elusive "die off" that I read about. It's pure and simple - my body is saying "get this stuff [Primal Defense] out of me!"

title: Great yeast killer!
body: My nutritionist recommended this product to kill the yeast in my system.  It is wonderful to have a natural product that can control yeast & keep it in check on a daily basis.  I highly recommend it for yeast control!

title: Amazing stuff!
body: I have suffered from constant diarrhea for almost 10 years.  I was diagnosed with IBS but the medicine only worked so much.  I started taking these on a recommendation of a friend who works in a vitamin shop.  I was skeptical at first that it would actually work given that prescription medication didn't work or worse gave me chronic constipation, also I had tried a similar product that I purchase at Walgreens.  I started off with just taking one pill in the morning and at first I felt like crap.  But I expected this because of the reviews I read on amazon.  After 3 weeks the diarrhea stopped and I resumed normal bowel movements and that hasn't happened for almost a decade!  Two weeks ago I upped the amount I was taking to 2 capsules (the bottle says to take three a day) and it's amazing!  I no longer have acid reflux, I have more energy, and my allergies have gotten much better.  This probiotic has been a life saver!  Don't buy the cheap stuff at the drug store, you really get your moneys worth.  I've been recommending this stuff to everyone!

title: Migraines? Beware.
body: I am a biologist, and even though I appreciate that micro biome can have a very strong impact on our overall health, I know that nothing is yet scientifically proven to work. I decided to just try this and see what happens. I was taking it 4 days as directed and all I got were migraines. I never has migraines before and they were horrible. The day I stopped this product, migraines went away.

title: Slowed things down - Caused constipation
body: "Slowing things down" is NOT why I want to use a probiotic.  I've used Jarrow, New Chapter, Nutrition Now, and a host of others - and all have "kept things moving" properly.  This product resulted in more constipation compared to using nothing at all.  Maybe a got a bad bottle or something - but this product was a waste of my money.  I wish I knew why ... went back to some Jarrow I had left over and everything went back to normal.

title: It really works
body: I have had Crohn's disease for over 20 years. I have been on everything possible for this disease.  The last 10 years I have been on Remicade or Humira.  After reading "Restoring Your Digestive Health" by Jordan Rubin, I began taking some of the recommended supplements.  Honestly, I couldn't go on such a radical "cave man" diet as he suggests so I thought I would start by trying the supplements.  My diet is already "pretty clean." This supplement in particular worked very well for me.  This product has helped tame chronic diarrhea caused by Chrohn's.  Keep in mind that the first few days on this will not go well.  You will have lots of gas and diarrhea while the battle in your gut rages between the good and bad bacteria.  After a few days, you should notice a great improvement in your bowel habits and your ability to digest ruffage (something I have not been able to digest in 20 years!).  Now I can enjoy a salad without spending the next 12 hours on the commode!

title: Wonderful Product
body: I've been taking this probiotic for about four years now and I can move freely again.  In my late 50's and early 60's I was becoming crippled with osteoarthritis and the only recommendation I could get from the medical community was ibuprofen 800 mg, which made me so sick and I was getting so I could hardly walk and surgery was recommended in both my wrists for carpel tunnel.  Well I did not want surgery and a destroyed stomach so in desperation I started taking Garden of Life's Primal Defense Ultra.  Today I can walk, run, move my arms freely and the swelling is gone from my wrists I can even ride my bicycle and I will be 70 soon.

title: It's made a huge difference in my overall health.
body: I used to struggle with almost daily stomach-aches, unexplained vomiting, and seasonal allergies.  I read the book "The Maker's Diet," which was written by the man behind this product.  I decided to try the Primal Defense, but was too cheap to take it at the recommended dosage of 3 capsules a day.  Within two weeks, taking only 1 capsule a day, the stomach aches and vomiting quit almost entirely.  When the spring came, my allergies were hardly noticeable. My overall health has improved greatly, my whole system just feels cleaner, and I'm sure I would see more improvement if I were to take the full dosage. I highly recommend this product to anyone struggling with digestive problems, and you might even see if it will kill your allergies like it did mine.
