title: Causes MIGRAINE HEADACHE!
body: Causes MIGRAINE headaches! I was taking this product for a few months. At first, I didn't take it religiously each day - just now and then. I hadn't really been sold yet on probiotics. For the last month, however, I have taken one capsule daily. It has been since then that I began to have day-long headaches that went well into the night. Every day, all day!I had to stop taking pain meds for it for fear of stomach bleeding. At first I thought the headaches were caused, inexplicably,  by another prescription med that I'd been taking for a couple of years. It never occurred to me that it was the probiotic that might be causing it. So, out of desperation, I researched probiotics (the only other med I was taking) and found that migraines are very common with some people. These were the worst, most painful migraines I have had in over 40 years. I stopped taking the Trubiotic and 24 hours later, the migraine was completely gone. No headaches now at all. As an aside, they also caused severe constipation. I am sure that this is not the fault of the makers of Trubiotic per se, but they should include a warning to customers that some people may have these types of reaction to probiotics in general.

I also bought Align (1Billion CFU), Culturelle (10B CFU), AcuFlora (1B CFU) and Pearls (1B CFU).  After taking the product with low dose for two weeks my skin itching and flaking is reduced somewhat.  But then I switched to probiotics with 30Billion and 90Billion CFU daily dose for colon support, and the skin improves much faster.

title: TMI time
body: I ordered this because I've been experiencing self diagnosed chronic constipation for about a year now (so don't take this review as medical advice). I have a fairly decent diet that includes very little processed food, plenty of fruits and veggies, and just a regular amount of cheese yet I am constantly bloated and constipated. I have tried seriously every sort of fiber supplement that is supposed to help you poop and they would just make it worse. I was resorting to laxatives once a week which I really didn't want to continue to do. I found this on Amazon and decided to try it and IT IS A MIRACLE!!!!!! I take this in the evening and the next day around noon it's go time! It doesn't give me that rushed, s*** your pants feeling like a laxative, and it never makes me feel more bloated, just a nice healthy poop that's much more comfortable and regular. It is somewhat pricey for my budget, but if I have to take one every day for the rest of my life, it's still worth it.

title: Not for certain immune compromised people
body: I'm not sure, but I really seemed to feel worse while on this, so I stopped after the first few days. I have a weak immune system, due to a chronic-fatigue type condition. Then in my research I discovered that people with CFS and other immune issues that make them TH2 dominant (research this if you don't know what I'm talking about) do not do well with a certain probiotic strain- streptococcus thermophilus, which is found in this formula. It further increases TH2 cytokine production, which exacerbates our issues because we need probiotics that increase TH1 production instead. L. Casei, L. Plantarum, and B. Longum are good for TH2 dominant people (like people with HIV or CFS) and these are all found in the jarrow formula, so I've been using that instead.

title: Praise! Praise! Praise!
body: I'll be delicate, but let me say I had a medical condition that often kept me home close to the bathroom. I had medical tests, took prescription medications, saw a specialist. Nothing worked. Finally, I was told to try a probiotic. A colleague told me about Dr. Ohhira's. He claimed he researched the product and it provided the greatest variety of beneficial bacteria on the market. I corroborated his research.

title: Excellent non- dairy fermented probiotic

title: It was okay...I have other probiotics I like better.
body: I didn't find this to be as effective for me as some people report, but that's to be expected.  We are, after all, as individual with our gut flora as we are with our fingerprints.  I have been more successful with GoLive, but my daughter has had more success with TruFlora and Theralac.  My husband on the other hand has had more success with Kyodolphilus and Jarrowdolphilus.  Having said all of this, success means for us fewer colds, less bouts with allergy related sneezing and coughs.  I will say, however, that changing probiotic brands occasionally seems to help all of us retain better health. I especially like brands that state which species and strain is in the probiotic.

It was suggested that if you are unsure how your probiotic is working, discontinue for a few years and see what happens. I did that and felt miserable with symptoms returning. When I take them I don't have nearly the same embarrassing gas & no bloating. What a miracle these probiotics have been in my life.

title: Potential quality issues...
body: I don't know why, but within 30 minutes of taking this probiotic (I was taking the recommended dose) I would develop bad nausea almost to the point where I felt I was going to throw up (which is highly unusual for me) that lasted about a half an hour each time, and then would subsidize. After a couple of days of taking this product I started to feel really tired and overall unwell. At first I thought it was the "die off effect," but it seemed strange that I would have such strange and unpleasant reaction to taking it within the first 30 minutes. I decided to discontinue using this product because I became concerned about its quality. I'm sure some of my reaction to it could've been explained by the "die off effect," but not the severe nausea that I experienced each time shortly after ingesting these pills.

title: BEST probiotic on the market!
body: Love this probiotic and it's the ONLY one I've found that actually makes a real noticeable difference in my life. I have chronic diverticulitis, and have been hospitalized as my first indicator of this affliction.  Once you have it - you have it for life.  I worked really hard to take in fiber, eat properly and had to take a horrible medicine Linzess.  At the risk of TMI, I've been constipated 30+ years. After 1st hospitalization I was put on Linzess to keep constipation at bay. My best efforts didn't work & I was hospitalized for EMERGENCY surgery in May 2015 for a perforated colon. No amount of fiber helped my constipation.  After suffering a perforated colon, peritonitis and major emergency abdominal surgery to save my life, I started looking for more answers to nutrition.  A massage therapist at Whole Foods suggested Dr. O'Hirra's and said "it's expensive, but all the women I see here rave about it".  I'm a re-order girl right here on Amazon - ordered at least 12 times. I've changed nothing about my eating habits EXCEPT this probiotic AM & PM, also stopped taking fiber supplements.  I'm now "regular" every single day & my body must be getting more nutrition because my hair and nails have never grown so well. Since my emergency surgery in May, I take it religiously every morning & night. I'm THRILLED to practically be an evangelist for this product.  IT WORKS!!

title: Good product. Buy elsewhere.
body: My doctor recommended this probiotic supplement, which is why I gave this order two stars and not one. The last box I received from another company had a sticker with an expiration date on it. This box had no sticker, no expiration date. So there is no way to know if the probiotics are viable or not. I called the manufacturer, Essential Formulas, who said there certainly should be a sticker with an expiration date on the box. I was also told that this particular company is not on their list of distributors, which makes me wonder, along with the missing expiration date, if Western Distributors is safe to do business with. Or did the sticker just fell off by accident? As other reviewers have mentioned, I don't like the lack of any seal on the box. Yes, the probiotics are in blister sheets inside the unsecured box, but that doesn't guarantee that the product's expiration matches the date on the box--assuming, of course, there is an actual date on the box. Anyway, this was not a happy experience and was a waste of time. I don't recommend it to anyone.

title: This is a potent probiotic, which will change your life!

I took Dr. Ohhira's probiotics on an empty stomach morning (5 pills) and evening (5 pills), then continued taking 1 pill in the morning and 1 pill at night (search online for Dr. Ohhira's probiotics loading protocol). These probiotics completely alleviated my allergies and balanced my gut flora perfectly. I also noticed an added benefit of excellent bowel movements and less sugar cravings (since it helps with candida issues as well)! This is a potent probiotic, which will change your life! I have recommended it to many people and they also became believers. Highly recommended!

Food I could normally eat was now giving me bad, painful diarrhea. My husband was having the same problems after only a few days of taking it, and he does not suffer from IBS like me. body: This is plain and simply the most advanced probiotic I have ever found.  I have been taking it for a couple of years and here is what I have noticed: an increase in my overall mood, including a dramatic decrease in Seasonal Affect Disorder which has plagued me through many long New England winters; dramatic decrease in gas and bloating; dramatic decrease in getting sick (I went from getting sick 3 to 4 times per year to once in two years); better ability to maintain a steady weight. title: Sayonara, Dr. Ohhira
body: I've used Dr. Ohhira's Probiotics for many months, but recently switched back to my previous brand, PB 8 by Nutrition Now.  The PB 8 just works better for me, despite the fact that it's much less expensive than Dr. Ohhira's.  I've tried taking Dr. Ohhira's with food and without food, and no matter what I do, it still gives me terrible gas and bloating.  The box says this is likely to happen for the first 10 days, until your gut bacteria is "remodeled," but even after several months, I still felt terrible every time I took this stuff.  Good-bye and good riddance.

I noticed that my breast cancer is healing, as I have so much more energy to walk, especially while it's hot out. I can take deep breaths, and don't feel the pain in my ribs. I am suffering from stage IV breast cancer and have been on chemo for about one and a half years. This is the best I've felt since beginning chemo.

title: Better than RX probiotics!  The best!
body: I've found that nothing compares to this probiotic.  I've used foods like organic plain yogurt, acidophilus milk, OTC and RX probiotics, pepto, anti-diarrheals and prescriptions like Prevacid for years.  The first consistent result (IBS disappeared, skin looked better, energy better) was the result of this product.  I've also just started (3 weeks) the soap by Dr O, and found it delivers on reducing body odor - a big issue for a 40's something woman going through hormonal flux.  I wish it was less expensive so I could use it all the time.  If I eat poorly (too much sugar, etc) and have stress, I use it and it helps.  I've recommended to friends with bowel issues.  There's alot to say about how antibiotics and a high (simple) carb diet have caused health issues in the past fifty years, and I won't pretend to know it all, but I believe this mix of magic by Dr O is a partial antidote to the situation.

title: True Freedom
body: What is true freedom?  We may think we know but the truth is most Christians do not know what true freedom  is anymore than someone who has lived behind bars their entire life.  They have no idea what freedom is because they have never experienced it.  This book will do two things for you. It will show you the path to true freedom in Christ through forgiveness and thereby bring you into a closer and deeper walk with the Lord.  It is not like any other book I have ever read.  If you want to be free from emotional pain and recurring patterns that you can’t seem to break, this is the book you need.  My life has been radically transformed and yours can be too.

title: A life changing product!
body: I normally do not write reviews, but this product is unique! It really works. Having suffered from digestive related issues for the past several years I had just come to accept that those issues would be the norm for me. Just part of getting older I told myself. But a few weeks ago when ordering more Imodium Amazon "suggested" this product as well. The reviews were favorable so I thought why not, it couldn't hurt and was only $18 for a two month supply. After about two weeks of taking one capsule a day before bed I noticed my issues were less severe and after 4 weeks they have all but disappeared!

title: Great Probiotics. Best Brand I Have Used.
body: I have tried many Probiotics over the years as I have suffered from a number of GI issues. These are far and away the best ones that I have personally used. I can tell if I go more than a couple days without them. Phillips has always been a trusted brand and they seem to continue to be more than reliable.

title: Helped regulate my IBS symptoms!
body: I wasn't sure what to think of this after the first few days taking it as it didn't seem to be doing much at all (I have IBS and have been looking for solutions to my irregularity). But I stuck with it, and after about 2 weeks of taking it, I noticed some major changes! I now am quite regular and don't have as many random days waking up with diarrhea. It's honestly such a relief after living with such discomfort for so many years. Don't know why I didn't try a probiotic sooner, but I'm very happy with this product! It didn't "cure" me, but it has helped ease my symptoms and made them less frequent.

title: THRILLING DAILY RELIEF WITHOUT A LAXATIVE!!!
body: FINALLY - something that REALLY works for me and my chronic constipation!!!  I have suffered bouts of constipation my entire life. As I have aged, it has increased.  I have tried everything - prunes (blech!), psyllium husk, heads of lettuce and other high fiber foods, LOTS of water,massage, and fiber supplements. Some of these have helped a little, with the unpleasant side effect of cramping, bloating and BAD gas.  But nothing has worked on a continuous basis (meaning a nice BM every day). I try to maintain a healthy lifestyle; vigorous daily exercise, not overweight, my doctor refers to me as her "star patient".

title: and I was delighted to find them for a decent price on Amazon
body: These have been my probiotics of choice for a while, and I was delighted to find them for a decent price on Amazon. These keep me healthy and regular, and I love only having to take them once per day. I highly recommend them.

title: TMI but hey it is a "colon health" product
body: I was going to give this a full week of taking before I gave a review just to see what the results would be and how quickly it would start working, if it even did. I'm on my 5th day and writing a review already if that is any indication of how awesome this stuff is! So I have IBS, I go back and forth between straining and running to the bathroom, but unfortunately for the past 2 years I've been mostly in the straining mode because of a severe, almost deadly kidney infection (sepsis) and months worth of antibiotics. My intestines and the lack of good bacteria are wreaking havoc on me. It's stress and diet also, I know this, but yet even when I try to change my diet, I don't see much of a difference. I have tried other probiotics, upping my yogurt intake etc. Nothing has really helped me have consistently good BM's that don't feel hard as granite and the size of mini-butterfinger (sorry for the description). So I started taking this Thursday evening with my dinner, we had a pretty large meal at Outback so this was the perfect test to see how uncomfortably bloated and stopped up I would be after dinner. As I started through my appetizers and salad, I started feeling a pretty uncomfortable stomach ache, 15 minutes later when my entree arrived it was gone. Okay cool, whatever, that was weird. I noticed when the meal was over I didn't have the overly bloated feeling I normally have after I eat, still a little there, but tolerable. Friday I noticed all day that after I would eat I was not as bloated or uncomfortable. Saturday, oh Saturday... I finally had to go to the bathroom. It wasn't the painful experience I was used to which was amazing, but also, I wasn't expecting to see what I did in the toilet after I was finished. I said out loud OH MY GOD! The hubby heard me lol! I know, I'm sorry for the TMI, but when you're used to straining to barely see any progress and then all of a sudden the damn toilet bowl is almost full and with little to no effort put into it, I'm saying Halle-freakin-lujah! It has been like that every day since I've been taking it. Even after getting pretty tipsy that Saturday night, my husband asked me Sunday if I had the "beer s***s" yet that we all get after doing a bit of drinking.. NOPE! Fully intact and NO looseness at all. I haven't stepped on the scales but I'm sure I've even lost a little weight with how well my digestion has been. I give this a full two thumbs up, I would recommend this to anyone who has tummy troubles like I do. I have felt so much better these past 5 days. I will update to let you know how it is still working for me! Happy pooping to all!

title: Changed my life

It does make sense that adding beneficial bacteria to the system (the "good flora") could help with general digestion and just to make things work better. And when taking certain antibiotics that kill off the good stuff, these probiotic capsules might be a benefit.

title: Works for me

For peace of mind, though, I use Phillips. I have not had any problems with this brand and you can find that if you buy more than 30 at a time, the price goes down.  Probiotics just seem to help keep me regular.  I do take one of these every day, with food.

title: Good Aid for Lactose Intolerance and the Effects of Antibiotics
body: I previously tried the Natrol Bio Beads probiotic; however, I prefer the Phillips Colon Health probiotic supplement because it helped eliminate the gastrointestinal disturbances associated with the antibiotic, Clindamycin, and it helped to improve lactose tolerance, as well. In fact,I no longer worry if I neglect to take a Lactaid caplet before consuming any diary products. Additionally, I was very satisfied with the seller, CostLow Wholesale, and its low pricing. I would definitely purchase again from this seller in the future, if the product is not sold directly by Amazon.

You do not want to be in the same room with me after I eat that, let's just say that. My gas problem has been compulsive to say the least. I wish I would've tried this sooner verses trying Gas X and Bean O (fail). I read other reviews to coax me into buying this but now I guess for now you can add me to the list of believers. title: My doctor recommended this brand to me and I have found it ...
body: I have suffered with lower GI issues for about 10 years.  I was diagnosed with IBS and went to several gastroenterologists before trying probiotics.  My doctor recommended this brand to me and I have found it to be the most affordable on amazon for 60 caplets as opposed to the drugstore.  When starting the medication, I started feeling better within a week (less cramping and IBS symptoms) and after taking these supplements almost a year my overall health has improved. I recently bought these pills for my mother as well who has tried several OTC medications and she can’t believe how much better she feels after taking this product.

title: I love this product
body: For some reason this does something yogurt and other probiotics have not.  I love it and have since passed the word on to friends. Another great plus is that it does not need to be refrigerated, at least I haven't read where it does, but traveling is much easier. I don't usually run into the big bottles in the drugstore but the price is great on Amazon so I usually get two at a time, especially since I will give about 5 caps away at a time to my friends so they can try for themselves. So far after 5 days they have all been really satisfied.

title: Buyer Beware; a word of caution!
body: This product amounts to THE WORST thing I’ve ever done to myself. I took one with dinner the 1st night I got it and felt a lot of pressure the next day; instead of relieving gas it seems to cause it. On the 2nd night I took another pill with dinner. I went to bed thinking it would be a normal night. However, I was abruptly awoken at midnight with a sudden urge to go to the bathroom. I made it, but nothing but diarrhea. I drank a glass of water before going back to bed, wondering what I had ate. At 1AM, I was awoken with a sudden urge to go to the bathroom, and again diarrhea. Then at 3AM, 4AM and 5AM the same thing. When I tried to go back to sleep I couldn’t because I was constantly burping. It is now about 12 noon and I have visited the bathroom a total of 8 times. I haven’t slept, and I feel extremely fatigue. The bloating and pressure in my stomach is so great that I have to let out a belt loop in order to fasten my belt. I understand this is not typical of other reviews here, but buyer beware!

title: The Best Acidophilus I Have Tried!
body: I have tried many different kinds/brands of acidophilus (after my doctor recommended I should start taking it). Some of the other brands I tried gave me an upset stomach and/or terrible diarrhea. I kept trying new brands in the hope of finding one that would work for me. Well, I finally found Nature Made and it has made all the difference!!  After using this product for over eight months,  I would defintely recommend it!

title: Only brand that does not require refrigeration
body: The Nature Made acidophilus appears to be the only brand on the market that does not require refrigeration.  You're supposed to keep it in a cool, dry place.  I can't remember to take it if it's hidden away in my fridge instead of in my nightstand with my other medication, so this is a big deal to me.  It's hard to find locally, so I've taken to ordering it online.  (Yay for Prime!)

title: This is a great product and a fabulous value (cheaper than local drugstores/pharmacies/Walmart
body: This is a great product and a fabulous value (cheaper than local drugstores/pharmacies/Walmart.  It is also appropriately packaged in dark jar and labeled that you keep in a cool, dry place (I keep mine in the door of my fridge).  I trust Nature Made though some products were recently in the news, I don't believe Acidophilus was recently in question, and I do believe Walmart and/or Walgreens were the lots in question over a couple of other more common supplements.  I use this whenever I am placed on an antibiotic to avoid or minimize unpleasant side effects such as diarrhea or yeast infection (sorry for graphics, but it is probiotic and good for this, I'm an RN).  You can also get the lactobacillus (what is in this) from most yogurt, but that can have alot of sugar (which doesn't help, particularly women), and if you are lactose intolerant or don't like yogurt or just don't want to eat it every day, this is a convenient alternative.

title: These are the best!
body: A couple of years ago I was diagnosed with Celiac disease. For years I had been sick with terrible stomach and digestive issues that would literally make it impossible to function on some days. After adjusting my diet I felt much better, but I still had bouts of pain that just didn't seem to go away. I did some research and discovered that the digestive tracts of Celiac patients were often lacking in many of the pro-biotics that flourish in healthy people, so I decided to give them a try. Unfortunately, this was not the first one I used, and believe me, the quality and effectiveness of many pro-biotic brands is questionable. Some of them really had no effect at all, and some seemed to make the problem worse. Add to all of that the problem of finding a good quality product in general, plus one that contained the specific strains needed for my particular disease and the necessity of being gluten free - well, it took some time.

title: Keep coming back to this brand
body: I have been using probiotics for years. Before people really knew what they were. I research a lot of products that makes you feel better and read about how probiotics can help. When I got pregnant I took align and stopped because it was getting to expensive. During my pregnancy I gained like 15lbs while on the probiotic and had no bowel issues. When I stopped taking it suddenly I was gaining tons of weight like 50lbs and having a lot of issues in the bathroom causing me to have to take laxatives. Probiotics were still so new then that I didn't know the reason for my bathroom troubles were because I stopped taking a probiotic. I wish I found this product sooner. So I found this current product because my husband had to go on antibiotics and the dr recommended this brand and I started to take them with him. Wow they clear me out everyday. My husband who always has bathroom issues and takes forever is in and out now and no more emergencies while we're out. I just switched to another brand called floraster I think it was called and it did nothing for me and was so expensive. I went back to this brand. It's only a dollar cheaper on Amazon so I'll probably just keep picking it up at the grocery store when I go. Oh and I took this brand during my second pregnancy every day and only gained 15lbs total and never had a bathroom issue with constipation. After the baby was born I actually weighed less.

title: I cannot recommend this enough
body: I use this for vaginal health. After battling cases of BV for years, taking everything my dr gave me only to have it be temporary and/or cause other issues, I started to do some research of my own. I came across this and I researched my heart out so I would know exactly what I was taking. I can tell you confidently after using it for only 2 weeks, I will never NOT take this. I will take it until I'm 90. After 3 or 4 days of using it, all of my symptoms were gone. I cannot recommend this enough.

body: This is by far the best probiotic I've ever purchased.  I have tried many probiotics on the market and most have either given me undesirable results or have not worked at all. title: Its works!
body: First off I like it because it doesn't need Refrigeration. Since I've been taking this for the last 6 months knock on wood I have not got a cold. I take one in the morning and then one around lunch time. With a 12-hour spread. I'm a truck driver so I wake up early. I bought 4 bottles to make it convenient. I keep one in the truck one at home 1 in a car and the other one in storage. I don't ever want to miss a dose, because it means if I get sick I have to work outside with the elements. I don't want to take off of work at all. So I would suggest to buy one bottle take it religiously, if it works for you great if it doesn't then try something else.

title: Almost a year of use.
body: This is the only probiotic that works for me. I've been buying it for almost a year now and it's continued to provide we the comfort I need. I have several triggers that affect my digestive system and cause me discomfort. I have a lot of anxiety induced stomach and digestive issues. I also have some food sensitivities. I went to a Dr about my stomach a few years ago and after paying for expensive testing I was nowhere close to a diagnosis and gave up. I was trying to treat my symptoms with OTC meds. So a combination of fiber, heartburn medicine, Lactaid, Tums, Pepto, and Imodium depending on what the symptom was that day. title: Stink-free toots and a quiet tummy!
body: We love this product.  I started taking it when I was in college because I had an incredibly noisy stomach so loud that I would skip classes so I could skip the embarrassment of everyone looking at me (it sounded like I hadn't fed it for days, and it could be heard from clear across the room).  I did tons of google searching, tried different products like beano, charcoal pills, etc.  But none of those worked.  Then I started using Accuflora -- two pills every morning and two at night -- and after a few days, my stomach doesn't make crazy noises anymore.  I've been able to decrease the number of pills now that my gut has "normalized", so now, a couple years after starting, I only take one pill every morning.  I still have some stomach noises, they're just little mouse whispers compared to what they originally were, and now I have no more anxiety about being in a classroom or an office meeting.  It sounds silly, but that stomach noise was making me miss out on so much of my life.  Then a couple years later, my now-husband, then-boyfriend, had the nastiest flatulence.  The smell was horrendous... and seemingly constant!  He finally took my advice to take the pills (because not only did they make my stomach noises decrease by quite a bit, they also made my gas not stink), and now he has stink-free gas.  This product has done wonders for myself, my husband, and our relationship (ha!).  Highly recommended, and I especially recommend buying it on Amazon, if you buy it at one of the big box stores, it'll be almost as expensive but you'll only get one box of 60 pills instead of two.

title: Best Pro-biotic for me
body: When my gastro doctor told me that I had to take a pro-biotic every day, I was not happy.  There are so many pro-biotics on the market and I had no idea how to pick one. Besides that, they aren't cheap.  He wasn't any help when I asked which one he recommended either.  So I started doing some research and after reading label after label after label I picked Accuflora Pro-biotic Acidophilus.  I started seeing a difference in just one week. Most of my gas issues went away and my stomach stopped making all kinds of noise every time I ate or drank anything.  I noticed that I had less abdominal pain.  It seemed to regulate my digestion so I felt better.  I almost never experienced the bloating that had been making me so miserable. As a matter of fact, it made such a difference in the way I felt that I just kept talking about it to my husband. He does not believe in taking any kind of supplements or aides but he seemed very interested in how this pro-biotic was helping me with digestion issues. By the second week of me taking them he told me he was going to try them also. Guess what - now we both take them faithfully every day.

title: Best out there

I can eat some dairy without lactaid pills and it did make me regular if you know what I mean. If you have PANCREATITIS, do not take any probiotics. I did research on probiotics and the study showed that people with pancreatitis had higher incident of having sudden death syndrom from being on probiotics. I don't know the mechanisms of why sudden death with probiotics but I had to cut back on my accuflora to just sevral times a week because I do have sluggish and fatty pancreas from diabetes. All others who has normal pancreas, I highly recommend this brand over organics, natural or regular brand probiotics because I have tried them all.

title: contains maltodextrin!
body: For someone dealing with a sensitive balance of healthy and harmful flora, pro-biotics are lifesavers.  Or rather, they CAN be.  Anytime you have a pro-biotic containing a sugar/sweetener of any kind it does more harm than good.  Harmful bacteria thrive so much easier than the good bacteria do, so when you put sugar in there they just go crazy!  Maltodextrin isn't necessary and definitely isn't wanted in this product.  I had to toss it in the garbage.  Guess I better stick with the pearls!

title: Worth a try especially if you are having digestion problems.
body: After reading the reviews I decided to purchase this supplement. I really like it. I suffer from slow digestion from diabetes and I really feel that these helped. I take them after eating and I don't get reflux like I used to and I don't burp up the taste of last nights dinner the next morning! (Sorry, I know that sounds gross but its true and it happens to a lot of people.)  I plan on continuing to purchase these after my first bottles are used up. No after taste, not hard to swallow.

I'm allergic to Dairy, really allergic to even trace amounts, with this product a little bit is no longer a problem.  So if you diverticulitis or leaky gut or spastic colon or any digestive issues, try this product...it is amazing.  Haven't eaten beef in 8 years...now I can!

body: I began taking probiotics several years ago after my local herbal/natural medicine store owner and friend recommended I incorporate them into my diet. The ones I started buying and using were great, but didn't fit well into my budget. I discovered these and have been taking them for at least 3 years now, and I'm very happy with them.

title: Multi-Enzyme Probiotic
body: Over the last six years, probiotics have been an important part of my nutritional supplements.  Because of surgery, I am missing 8 feet of my small intestine.  I tried many, many probiotic products - most did not work.  One day, while in Walmart, I picked up the least expensive probiotic on the shelf - this one being reivewed.  It is the only probiotic product that works.  I take one tablet with each meal.  It has helped resolve the many GI issues I had including chronic inflammation and diarrhea.  This probiotic is a permanent part of my daily nutrition.

title: These Multi-Enzyme tablets DO aid in digestion.
body: The Spring Valley Multi-Enzyme Digestive Formula is a great product to aid in digestion.  I have been taking it for over a year now and have found that my body feels normal, no problems with bloating, constipation, etc.  My gall bladder was removed several years ago and without it my digestion was horrible.  I never felt right.  I am thankful that the enzymes includes the ox bile.  Also, the pills do have a funny smell, but who cares?  I don't spend time smelling my pills.  And personally, I don't think they are difficult to swallow.  I take three at a time with a big drink of water.  We swallow food that's (not coated) all the time and most people don't have problems.  I will continue to purchase this product.

title: These have been working GREAT for my kids!
body: Besides the great taste that my kids love, my rating is for how well they are working for my kids.  I purchased them initially for two reasons.  My kids (especially my 2 1/2 year old) were sick non-stop between August and the end of November.  Additionally, my 4 year old had been complaining daily that her stomach hurt.  Someone suggested that I put her on probiotics so I bought these with the hope they would help her and also help both my kids' immune systems. And for a little more background, my 2 year old had been on Miralax since just past 1 years of age.  Prior to the probiotics I had to increase his Miralax dosage to allow him to produce a BM without too much pain (otherwise he screamed and it would take a long time to produce).

title: WONDERFUL product!
body: My one son takes these without any issue and it's helped him tremendously.  He's had gastro problems since he was a baby.  This is the first time he's felt good consistently in years.  LOVE that there are NO artificial colors and it's all real ingredients.  We are on the Feingold diet and my son has peanut, tree nut and soy allergies as well, so this is a win win for us.  I highly recommend it.

title: These are great but my child is not fond of the flavor
body: These are great but my child is not fond of the flavor. It's hard to get her to take them, but she has been much healthier since taking them. We missed the flu bug that was going around and only had a mild case of strep. That's amazing because for 2 weeks at her school there were over 90-110 kids out daily for illness. It was crazy.

title: Great kids probiotic
body: The kids love these probiotics. I love that I can put this on subscription so that we get an auto shipment every other month.

title: After a year we are very pleased.
body: Got thies for my two young children after reading all the benefits of probiotics for children. They have been taking them now for a year, this month, and though we have not seen any major changes we have found that our children have not gotten any of the stomach viruses or colds that go around or any infections since they started thies. And they have very normal, even predictable bowel movements, which is quite different from before they took this supplement. Over all we are pleased with them, they are yummy and the shapes are cute. Kids did ask for more flavors at first but have gottan use to having only one and don't complain at all. :-) We have and will continue to recomend this product to friends and family.

title: Great Kid Probiotic!
body: These are great kid probiotic supplements. My daughter takes them every day and has for over a year now. She will be four next month. Never had a problem with getting her to take it. She likes the taste and actually thinks it's a treat. These seem to really help keep her regular with bowel movements and after a few strong antibiotic treatments when she had pneumonia, I'm glad that she is regularly taking these to build back and maintain a healthy gut. I trust this brand as I've know them for over a decade now, back when I worked at a health food store. I also recommend their children's multivitamin.

title: Children like it so far...
body: After two days, both children (3 and 5 year old) take this without any issues.  Our daughter, who tried PRO-Kids Children's Probiotics for about 3 days, no longer wanted the Pro-kids on the 4th day.

title: All 3 kids hated them - TOO SWEET, if you can believe it...
body: My kids are used to vitamins and probiotics, but not this brand. I purchased this based on all of the reviews, and I'm very sad to say that none of my kids like this at all. The only description I could get from one of them as to why they don't like it is because it's too sweet. I'm online now looking to buy a replacement because they won't chew these at all. I gave it 2 stars instead of 1 only because they choked them down even though they hated them lol.

title: It's OK
body: I switched to this probiotic for my children (7 &10) from another one.  It works fine for my 10 year old, but my 7 year old started complaining of stomach pain 2 days after switching.  After about a week of her on it and complaining about her stomach, I thought there may be a connection, so I took her off.  Her stomach has been fine since.

title: No More Digestive Issues
body: My toddler has had digestive prolems her entire life. I typically order Digestive Advantage For Kids Under 50 Pounds. I find it hard to find in chewable form, so I end up buying the powder and guessing how much my daughter has digested. Her issues were nearly  gone.

title: No more potty accidents
body: My son was having lots of potty accidents at the age of 6. Even though he was regular, his doc thought maybe poop in his bowel was crowding things in his abdomen to the point that he couldn't feel when he had to go. Miralax seemed to work somewhat, but I didn't want him on a laxative all the time. So we transitioned to these and he hardly ever has accidents anymore. All my kids love them.

I tried this because I like some of the other Animal Parade products (vitamins and greenz).  After taking these for a few days my son, who had been regular, became constipated as he had been prior to starting a probiotic regimen.  What works for one doesn't always work for another!

body: I purchase this all of the time. My son loves the taste and it allows him to get a probiotic. He has had the sniffles, but no major illness throughout our long winter season. Will continue to purchase!

body: Bought these for my sons. My older guy has no problem with it. Everything is going well. My little guy however has some serious side effects. I understand that this helps with digestion, but there is a line you cross from 'regular' to having extreme diaper/entire outfit changes when he ends up with explosive gas every 30 minutes.....on vacation. Seems that it's too harsh for the little guy, but my 7 yr old does well on it.

body: We have used these for a couple of years and my kids never complained. The latest bottle we got both kids complain that they taste bad and now refuse to eat them. I bought the same thing we always have so it makes me question if they changed something in the formula. Very disappointed this time around.

title: Great for 6 year old, but beware with younger kids...
body: Have definitely seen a healthier school aged child since beginning these regularly.  (IE, strep throat goes around, she stays healthy)...HOWEVER, my younger two kids (ages 2 and 4) have started with very loose stool and doctor suggested that the probiotic/vitamin blend in this product is too much for their tummies...so we are headed back to the more expensive, but better for their little digestive tracts, Culturelle.  Will try these again for them when they get older, more mature tummies.

title: Wonderful!!
body: These have been a lifesaver for my little girl. My daughter began having slight constipation issues right after turning 2. After several months, I had taken her to the doctor and they recommended using Miralax. This is not something that I would ever want to use for her long term. After another 6 months or so, I started searching for a children's probiotic and found these. At first, she wasn't crazy about the texture or the slightly sour taste, but now she takes them without any issues. We have been using them now for about 5 months and they have helped tremendously. I can tell right away if we have missed a few days. Would definitely recommend!!

title: My 3 & 5 year old take 1 a day ...
body: My 3 & 5 year old take 1 a day.  I have been giving them this exact probiotic for over 2 years.  I'm not going to say that my kids never get sick, but I am a firm believer that this probiotic has kept them from catching a lot of viruses.  My daughter (5) is not the healthiest eater and she gets sick (stomach and/or fever) once or twice a year!

title: Great Product
body: For the first 2 1/2 years of his life, my 3 year old son had very bad yeast diaper rashes as a side effect of treatment for a birth defect. It seems like we tried every topical yeast treatment out there (both prescription and over-the-counter.) His surgeon was hesitant to prescribe an oral medication, but it was to the point that my son would scream every time we laid him down to change his diaper. The last time we were there he recommended trying a probiotic and if that didn't help after a month, we would give him the oral medication (he gave us the prescription for that at the smae time.) This product not only cleared up his rash, but he has also been pretty much rash free for the last 6 months. We are grateful that we gave this a try and now use it with our other child as well. This product did exactly what we needed it to!

title: Excellent Probiotic for Kids
body: Probiotics have finally been the key to keeping my 3 year old's digestive system happy.  Despite eating a very well balanced diet with lots of fruits and veggies, he has suffered with irritable bowel type symptoms since he was under a year.  Prior to trying these we'd tried fiber gummies, prescription laxatives, and other kids probiotics.  These have been the best so far.

title: Good but kids think they're sour
body: I think the ingredients are great, but the kids complain they are a little "sour."  I tried one and I wouldn't call them sour, and think they are rather tasty myself.  I guess kids will have their own opinions.

title: Hoping to Help Keep Kids Healthy!
body: I've been reading about the benefits of the good bacteria, and we've been battling strep and other illnesses in our house, so I'm hoping to give these a try in hopes of staying more healthy this winter. Just received them today and I tried one, as did my 9 y/o and 7 y/o. I thought they were fine -- tart  and a little chalky but that passed quick enough. My 9 y/o hates chewable vitamins and was reluctant to try them, but she didn't complain about the taste. And my 7 y/o, who loves sour, liked the taste. So the taste test passed in my family (was a little concerned based on some other reviews) and now will see if they help keep the kids from contracting every bug this summer!

title: Love these for my kids
body: Love these for my kids!! Have tried many of the natures plus animal parade vitamins with my kids and love them all! They come in fun animal shapes and my kids love how they taste. Would recommend these to anyone who has kids!

title: My daughter loves these!
body: Due to a milk allergy that my daughter has we had to look quite a bit for a probiotic that didn't have any milk ingredients in it.  I found this at our local natural food store and my daughter loves them.  The bad news is they were quite expensive at the store so I turned to Amazon, and of course found them and for about $8 a bottle cheaper than I could buy them locally.

title: So far so good.
body: My son had to take antibiotics last week. I purchased these to prevent him from having any digestive issues in the future. I'm trying them out every other day to see how he reacts to them. So far so good.

title: Great for healthy intestines and my kids love them
body: When we lived in China, this was great for keeping my kids healthy and as free of stomach issues as possible given the food problems there. We also take these religiously when we travel to foreign countries to help keep our intestines in good shape as we get exposed to different bacteria. Definitely worth it!

title: Works Wonderfully. Heaven Sent!
body: My 4 year old son used to always complain that his stomach hurt. I bought these probiotics and soon after, his tummy aches stopped. I am now using them to help him because he is on antibiotics and they are easing the pain the antibiotics are causing in his tummy. I also love these because they do not have any artificial sugar in them or gluten. Plus, they taste good (I take them too)

title: These really helped my daughter's stomach!
body: My daughter is 3 and from the time she was born has had a horrible stomach like me. At around 2, I started emptying the contents of probiotic pills into her milk in the morning but we still weren't seeing the results and it was costing my $20 a month to keep it up! So... I thought I would give this one a try. First of all she loves the flavor of it so that's awesome! Second, she is finally able to go to the bathroom every day without a problem. For any mom out there who has struggled to get her child "to go", you know what a relief this is for you and them! My daughter doesn't complain near as much about tummy aches since she started this probiotic.

title: So far so good
body: My little girl (2 1/2) was having the worst time passing her stool and would do her best to try and keep it in. It broke my heart every time she had to go #2. Her stool is now soft and she is strating to realize that pooping isn't such a bad thing. Glad I purchased.

title: Vs. Lil Critters
body: I bought these based on a review where a customer compared these to Lil Critters, which is what we tried, first.  My kids (and I) actually liked the Lil Critters, other than the fact that we need a higher count since we were taking four daily.  In the review, the customer stated that these were cheaper and tasted better.  I thought, "You can actually make these taste better? Great!" Yes, they are much, much cheaper, but they taste like it, too. Firstly, when I opened the bottle, fine purple powder flew everywhere. It's all over the cotton ball inside, so every time I get tablets out, I have to be careful of where I set the cotton ball down. They taste more like regular vitamins, which my kids and I have NEVER liked (since we use the AMAZING-tasting SmartyPants). The Lil Critters are just higher quality and worth the money.

I did get the 10 strain so I am happy with my order in that regard.  The entire description shows a 4 strain bottle though.  .... it is what it is... We love this product and I will buy it again.

They seem to help keep their tummies feeling good and they have regular bowel movement (no issues with constipation here).  I have these on my subscribe and save but they have been out of stock, which is really upsetting. I haven't been able to get my son or daughter to take any other probiotics so they have been off of them for about a week. My daughter is sick and I really wish I had these to give to her. Please stock these again Amazon.

body: My daughter loves these, but if you have a dog I would recommend getting an option that does not contain Xylitol, as this is toxic for dogs!  I realize this isn't anything against the vitamin, but if you have kids that tend to drop things on the floor, and a dog that is always waiting for stuff to drop, this could be deadly.  For now, we are finishing the bottle and I just make sure I get this vitamin and put it directly in my kid's mouth:)

title: Great product!
body: I've been giving these probiotics to my three kids for about a month and am really, really happy with the results for my youngest child in particular.  He is 9 now, and ever since he was a toddler he's had bowel troubles.  He was on a prescription laxative for a while, and even as he got older and his diet improved, he was notorious for clogging the toilet regularly.  He would also get an extremely painful stomach cramp/gas pain about once week.  The pain was so bad, he couldn't walk upright.  Sometimes this cramp would strike while we were at a birthday party or other function, making him feel self conscious, not to mention ruining his fun.  Since starting the probiotics, he has not had a single cramp.  I don't even know the last time he went two weeks without pain, let alone a month.  I am so, so thrilled to have my son feeling good all the time now!

title: Perfect
body: So happy to have found these! I have found NOW to be good products and had been wanting to have my kids take Probiotic daily. Now, all of us take the chewable a few times/day. I signed up for the automatic delivery and saved even more. Love Amazon, so simple and save time and money! These require refrigeration-a sign they are a better quality.

title: Best I've found.  They worked wonders for my son.  He loves the taste too!
body: My 2 year old son has had tummy troubles since birth.  He was on meds for reflux, and had severe gas issues.  He wouldint eat, and wasn't gaining weight because of it.  I started giving him these chewables about 6 months ago, and he takes them daily.  He loves the flavor, and runs to the fridge every morning to get one.  I started noticing a difference within a week or so of him taking them.  Before, he would wake up crying with a gassy tummy every night.  During the day it affected his food intake.  Since taking these, he sleeps soundly EVERY night, eats great at mealtime, and is a super happy kid.  I truly can't remember the last time he had tummy pain or severe gas issues.  As a mom, it's so hard to see them go through anything that causes them pain.  I'm very thankful that these actually WORK for us!  Obviously, I highly recommend these probiotics by NOW Foods.

title: Colicky Baby (Toddler) Cured
body: I have had six children, they were all easy peaceful children, until the last one came. He was a screamer, he would go from 0 - 100 in frustration and start screaming in no time over small things, all until someone suggested that I try probiotics for my own health issues, so I thought, well if I need them, my children who grew in my womb must need them too.

title: Lifesaver for chronic diaper rash!!!
body: Wow, these have been a lifesaver. My 2 year old has been battling diaper rash for 8 months.  It started after I weaned him.  His bowel movements were like sand paper - they tore up his bum.  We have both been in agony for 8 months.  His diaper rash was preventing him from developing correctly.  Now that we are introducing him to the potty, I needed to figure out how to resolve his issues.  I started these probiotics as we started eliminating foods. After a few months I figured out he has a dairy sensitivity - I started him on toddler milk after breast feeding, which I now regret and never once thought toddler milk was the problem - he loved it!  Once I got rid of milk, he started dumping (thanks to these probiotics).  After a few weeks of horrible smelling BMs, they started to become normal for the first time in months. Everyday his gut is getting better.  Amazing!!

Amazingly, all three kids like these...in fact all said these taste better than the other brand, and they like the animal shapes.  I'm disappointed they took these off of Subscribe & Save, but will continue buying them here on Amazon since I can't seem to find these in any stores near me.

title: No viable bacteria - not a good option.
body: My son needs probiotics, and since taking these he has had noticeably more difficult bowel movements. I was suspicious that these sugar-coated gummies which do not require refrigeration and which are very cheap, were not providing enough probiotic bacteria. Then I read an independent study, published on Labdoor which have these gummies a D- !!! Their statement as to why: "This product met all purity standards but recorded 95% less viable bacteria than claimed on the product package." So now I know, these are basically just candies, and have no probiotic value. I won't be buying again.

title: Probiotic GREAT FOR KIDS!!  REALLY WORKS WELL!
body: my (now 4) grandson has had problems pooping for a very long time.  since he was around 22 months old.  hard hard stools and BIG!  when he is with me, usually two to four days weekly, he gets plenty of fiber and fluids.  i finally HAD it with his suffering and ordered this probiotic.  SO HAPPY I DID!!!!!  he takes only one every morning and it has changed his life completely.  he NO longer avoids the "deed" because he knows it will hurt.  his stools are soft and he goes every day, sometimes twice.  what a difference it's made in his happiness.  he looks forward to taking it, it tastes good and REALLY WORKS!!  i do recommend it for any child who has similar issues.  GREAT PRODUCT!!

title: Great tasting and effective!
body: I'm an adult and have lived my whole life with IBS. Some things help a little, but nothing was a real game changer until a family member gifted me these gummies after realizing they were probiotics and not vitamins.

title: Great gummies - keep them in the fridge!
body: Great way to get probiotics to your kids without swallowing a giant pill. One thing to watch out for, and the reason I dock it a star... These gummies will melt fairly easily and stick together in a giant blob. Store them in the fridge to avoid the hassle.

title: Score!!!
body: Read the reviews-- as I always do, before my purchase. My 6 yr old son is very health, yet has trouble and strains when using the bathroom. Also he get a bellyache in the morning when he eats breakfast, no matter what the food. I knew I needed to try something, anything! Well, I can say I just purchased my second bottle! No more stomach issues and he goes to the bathroom more, without straining. They also taste great, as I sneak a few myself. Without doubt you will LOVE this product and I am now looking to see what else this brand offers.

title: It Works!!!
body: My kids and I take this product daily. After reading extensively on the benefits of probiotics, I began to search for one that would be effective while tasting good enough that my kids wouldn't complain about it. I settled on the Probiolicious gummies. The taste is great, and we have found them to be effective. My kids have had fewer morning tummy aches since taking these probiotics, and we have all avoided the various stomach bugs that were circulating around their school this year. I do believe that we have seen amazing immune benefits by taking a probiotic daily. My son is the one who reminds me that he needs to take it. I find that I enjoy taking these gummies, too. I have reordered several times, and I make sure that we always have a new bottle on hand so that we don't run out. I highly recommend this product to anyone who wants a delicious and effective probiotic.

title: Great probiotic for kids and adults.
body: We LOVE these!  We've been using these on and off for the past year.  Previous to these we were using a powder but I felt it was messier and more work and I'd forget to give it to my kids.  I have 3 kids under 12 and they really like these.  I've noticed they get less sick even when all their classmates are coming down with something.  It doesn't prevent everything but gut health is critical to fighting off germs!  I suspect my youngest has some very mild gluten intolerance.  If we forget to stay on a regular probiotic schedule with him he's cranky, has more meltdowns and bathroom issues.  I've even taken one or two of these for a sour stomach and it's resolved within about 30 minutes.  Great to know it's not filled with sugar and food dyes too.

title: Our 3. 5 yo son loves these. He ...
body: Our 3.5 yo son loves these.  He has been taking these since he turned 2 without any issue with chewing or swallowing.  That said, for the first almost year we did cut them in quarters and then in half before letting him have them whole.  We rotate probiotics for different strands of bacteria and he gets really exacted when we have these ones.  I do wish they weren't sugar coated and that they were just the regular gum drop without added sugar. that is really hard to find.  That is my only complaint though.

title: Perfect for regulating my recently potty trained toddler!
body: I purchased these for my daughter who is three and was recently potty trained. She would hold her poop in for days resulting in me having to use a suppository on her . After constant frustration and sadness seeing my daughter in pain, I decided to try a children's probiotic. I am so glad that I did!  The third day after she started taking these she had a bowel movement with no trouble at all! This has never happened! I am so relieved  to have found such a wonderful product with zero negative side effects!  If your tired of seeing your little one afraid to go poo poo... look no further! :)

title: Good gummy alternative
body: It was a hard sell for my 5 year old, but after a few sinus infections and a stomach virus, I needed to get a probiotic into him, and he refused the chewable tablets.  He also did not at first appreciate the sugary coating (crazy!) but he has come to like these well enough.  I tried them and they have a pleasant, only slightly tart and somewhat sweet, cranberry flavor.  He now take them regularly with no fight.  I like that there doesn't seem to be too much junk in these as compared to the other gummy kids' probiotics out there.  Win for me!

title: Arrived Melted!!!
body: This arrived completely melted together. I tried to separate into individual vitamins but unable. I know I probably live in one of the hottest states, so this may have something to do with the melting.

title: but for gummies they taste horrible. They have that vitamin taste that most people ...
body: These do the job, but for gummies they taste horrible. They have that vitamin taste that most people who use gummies are trying to avoid. Will be glad when I get done with this bottle so I can get a better product in place.

title: Wonderful for picky kids!
body: I was so excited about receiving this product. I've tried hopelessly to get my kid to swallow the pill and powder forms of probiotics and every time the ordeal turned into an enormous battle of the wills. I'm still amazed at what kids can taste inside of their juice and how enteric coated pills leave an aftertaste...

title: Biggest difference noted when we stopped taking them!
body: After finishing our first bottle, I was a little unsure if they were making a big difference for my family. My six and eight-year-old had no problem eating them (along with myself!), but I wasn't sure that they were working. Well, that question was put to rest when we were off them for a few weeks. My psoriasis began reappearing, and my daughter's skin sensitivity was triggered. Prime to the rescue! Next day, we received our next bottle, and since then, I have them on regular subscription. We won't go without- I wish they sold in larger quantities, though!

title: Effective; highly recommend them
body: These Probiotics were recommended to me when I was toilet training my then 2.5YO. He has a resistance towards toilet training, specifically for  bowel movements (he would continue to hide vs. using the toilet).  I finally started him on the Probitics and within a couple days he was using the toilet.  I realized that he was hiding because because how difficult it was for him to have a BM and once he stared on the probiotics things were a lo smoother.  He likes the flavor and he now asks for them- I have noticed a difference in his BM and even in his mood prior to BM if for some reason he does not take the Probilicious.  I definitely recommend this product

title: I like this product
body: I like this product, however I won't be reordering the Probiolicious Gummies again...they were very sticky and hard to get out of the container. I prefer the Rainbow Vitamin-D gummies.

title: THRILLED!
body: I'm thrilled with these!  My little has been experiencing chronic constipation since December.  I put her on a probiotic that I found at my grocery store, but it either worked too well, or not at all.  So I switched to this right around the time we started potty training and the issue was worse.  I started with just one a day but it's wasn't cutting it.  Now at 2 per day, she's going everyday, with no more clenching, soiling, crying or pain.  I'm so so so so happy!  It is horrible as a parent to watch your toddler go through such pain.  :(

title: Great!

He likes the taste, it has no allergens that can hurt him, and it helps his belly. Will be ordering more.

title: Outstanding Product
body: My 5 year old has struggled with constipation since she was a baby.  Our pediatrician eventually recommended she be on a daily dose of Miralax.  This helped but still didn't solve the problem completely.  At that point, she was having bowel movements about once a week.  I tried a few different probiotics and this one worked wonderfully for her.  I made the mistake of pulling her off of this only to try a different probiotic and the horrible constipation problems returned!  Now that she's back on it, she's having regular bowel movements about every other day!  We're SO happy with this product!
