title: Finally a probiotic that my 4 year old loves
body: I tried about 5 products and finally my kid wants to take these probiotics!! love rainbow light products!!! great product!! They're helping her go to the bathroom on the regular!!

title: My doctor recommended taking probiotics after going off antibiotics.
body: Used this for family members that took strong antibiotics to get over sinus infections. I prefer this over high-calorie added, sweetener yogurts. Probiolicious gummies helped them get back to normal digestion again. When you take antibiotics, the good bacteria is killed in your digestive tract. Products like this help replenish what you lost by taking the antibiotics. Next time wash your hands and ask sick people to wear a mask, so you don't get sick and need antibiotics or probiotics. Your gut bacteria will be restored without taking something like this, but it may take much longer. If you are sick, it is still preferable to take antibiotics and this to actually recover than to waste time and money on any ineffective homeopathic quackery. I have four kids and all of them wanted to have a "candy" when one of them is given one, so I wish they sold a larger container because I have run out of these twice now.

title: Good product
body: Not sure if these are the best probiotics for me being I'm a 40 something year old woman but because my stomach is so sensitive and I already take so many vitamins I like that their gummies and the taste is amazing! I've read that probiotics may not even be helpful as we've been led to believe but I will continue to take. I noticed reading many reviews on different sites these seem to be made for children but I figured it's better to have some form of this in my system than none. I've taken 3 different brands of probiotics in the past and honestly I don't know if any of them actually do what they claim so it's hard to say. I will admit I do feel more regular when I take them but I also have to watch my lack of daily water intake because that does dehydrate me causing irregularity. I hope this helps.

title: Tastes great, runs out fast
body: These were tasty and delicious and my 3 and 5 year old children loved them!  I have recently read some medical literature that probiotics can shorten the length of illnesses, especially the flu, so I was trying to keep us all healthy this cold and flu season.  While these were easy to take, I'm not sure how much they impacted our health and there are not very many in a container, so at 2 for each person, they don't last long.

title: Five Stars
body: Excellent product.

title: Five Stars
body: Great Probiotic.....very easy to take on the go and no HUGE pill to swallow or refrigerate.

title: Yummy chews!
body: So my son was experiencing stomach pain-- so much that we took him to the doctor and found out it was constipation likely from not drinking enough water. These were recommended and they helped within a day or two. They taste sweet, my kids beg for more than one, and we haven't had any negative side effects. Recommend trying them!

title: I think they really work!
body: My 7 year old would always complain that his tummy hurt after we ate, so I asked around and people suggested probiotics.  We tried the powder, but it can't work if I can't get him to drink the mix.  We tried the crunchy chewables and he quickly got sick of them.  These are yummy and all my boys look forward to taking them.  Plus, they only have to take 1! Some supplements have each kid taking 3 a day and such, which makes them really expensive when I have to multiply that by my 3 boys! We had run out early one month and realized he'd started complaining about his stomach hurting again. We started these back up, and no complaints.  I'm sold!

title: Yummy and easy to chew
body: My kiddos are very picky when it comes to vitamins. They LOVE these! The flavor is great, they're easy to chew (don't stick to their teeth).  Also it's a good price for the amount of gummies. They're only required one a day

title: These are awesome, but now there is a shipping issue and ...
body: These are awesome, but now there is a shipping issue and we can't get these shipped to is. Not a problem cause I found them locally, and a little cheaper too:) These are really great for my 3 yr old that has constipation issues. She loves them so much and gets excited about her vitamins :)

title: BEST TASTE OF ANY SUPPLEMENT!
body: Dangerously delicious!!! I only say dangerous because I may have to keep the bottle locked up because they taste so good. Seriously have never tasted a better supplement of any kind (probiotic or not) in my life... I don't even care if they work or not (I just got them last night) they are so good it doesn't matter lol... But they probably do :)

title: THRILLED!
body: I'm thrilled with these!  My little has been experiencing chronic constipation since December.  I put her on a probiotic that I found at my grocery store, but it either worked too well, or not at all.  So I switched to this right around the time we started potty training and the issue was worse.  I started with just one a day but it's wasn't cutting it.  Now at 2 per day, she's going everyday, with no more clenching, soiling, crying or pain.  I'm so so so so happy!  It is horrible as a parent to watch your toddler go through such pain.  :(

title: Biggest difference noted when we stopped taking them!
body: After finishing our first bottle, I was a little unsure if they were making a big difference for my family. My six and eight-year-old had no problem eating them (along with myself!), but I wasn't sure that they were working. Well, that question was put to rest when we were off them for a few weeks. My psoriasis began reappearing, and my daughter's skin sensitivity was triggered. Prime to the rescue! Next day, we received our next bottle, and since then, I have them on regular subscription. We won't go without- I wish they sold in larger quantities, though!

I ordered an expensive, more comprehensive brand of probiotic, thinking I could take it, along with my husband and daughter. Ha ha.  The bottle said clearly (once I had purchased it) that it was ONLY for adults.

title: Love the probiotic, not sure they work.  Mail order ones arrive with sugar crystals melted off. Not good.
body: I purchased my first bottle of these from the store and I liked them.  I purchased the bottle I am reviewing through Amazon.  They arrived and they were all stuck together, the sugar crystals on each chewy were melted off.  There was a desiccant drying packet inside, but the bottles must be older or have been subject to extreme temperature changes.  I will stick to purchasing them from local stores.

title: Helps with allergies and eczema too
body: My 3 year old and my 9 year old loves this. My youngest has bad eczema and allergies, to about everything from animals to food. I swore ever since she has been taking this probiotics for about 7 months now, her skin has gotten clearer and not breaking out as terrible as it did before. Ofcourse, her medications, lotions and other things we have been using helps to but I really believe this was the last ingredients/thing that was needed to help her skin clear up. If you have a child with eczema or/and allergies, I definitely recommend you try it. I hope this review helps.

title: Great!!!
body: Bought these for my 8 year nephew on the advise of an old pharmacist.

title: Love This Product
body: My grandchild has been diagnosed with IBS constipation type.  The doctors basically had no suggestions for us other than Miralax for life.  After 5 years of Miralax, we decided to try something more natural to see if it would help.  She has been taking this 6 months, 3 in the morning, 3 in the evening.  It has improved her IBS immensely.  Instead of giving her Miralax twice a day, we give it to her only two or three times a week.  This product is doing a very good job at keeping her more regular.  She loves the gummies and reminds us to give them to her if we have forgotten.  Great product only wish it came in a 100 count, which would lessen the price, since she takes so many.

title: I love to open them in the morning and smell them ...
body: OMG these are the tastiest probiotic gummies ever.  I love to open them in the morning and smell them as I divvy them out to my 5 year old.  These have everything a kid (or adult) needs to keep beneficial bacteria in check.

title: Love that these taste good and WORK
body: Love that these taste good and WORK.  Last year I had complications from a back surgery and with the antibiotics I was on, my tummy was really messed up.  After taking these and other Rainbow light supplements, my GI tract is back to normal.

title: daughter is going a lot more often
body: Wow my daughter has been going like crazy, like 5 times a day. She was a once a day maybe every other day. The reason why i put her on these was because she got a stomach virus and the doctor recommended it. I tried the little kid ones for toddlers but they weren't really making a difference. They ran out and i needed more so i figured i'd try these since i like this brands prenatal and you get more for cheaper. One of the things i started to notice was her toddler budda belly went away. She actually went down a size even though her weight stayed the same just because her stomach isn't popping out so much.I think she was just filled with poop. I'm hoping this will help keep her from getting sick by giving her immune system a boost this fall.

title: does a good job
body: I bought this product because I have a 6 and 8 year old who has irregularity problems all the time, they have been taking these probiotics and since then have become more regular, they also like the flavor they say they taste like regular gummy snacks . I am really happy with this product I will continue to buy it!

title: Delicious and keeps tummy happy
body: Delicious. My favorite probiotic. I definitely tell a change in my tummy if I run out. Have used for a couple of years.

title: Excellent!!
body: I've had my 2 kids on these for 5 months now. I have no trouble getting them to take their daily dose, its their favorite out of all their gummies! They have helped us breeze through winter with good health! They have also helped to regulate them both. It did take them awhile to adjust to the dosage. I would recommend starting with half a gummy & working your way up to a whole one to avoid tummy troubles. I also take rainbow light vitamins for adults. Good company with great products!

title: I swear by these probiotics. My 4 year daughter ...
body: I swear by these probiotics. My 4 year daughter has autism and get very finicky about food. These gummies help reduce tummy problems and significantly increase her appetite!

title: Good tasting but didn't help
body: I bought these for my 6 year old son. He really likes the flavor, so getting him to take it was not an issue (in fact, I had to keep him from sneaking into them). However, they didn't help his gastrointestinal issues like I'd hoped.

title: Works better on constipation than loose stool
body: My 3 year old daughter liked the gummy. However i was using it to help with her loose stool and it did not help. The day we stopped using it her stool got back to normal. I think it might be more helpful for constipation.

title: Yummy and kid/adult friendly
body: I have used these probiotics for the past 6 months for my sons...one is 6 and one is 16.  These things not only work to balance the digestive tract ( I use these for me when I run out of mine)but they taste delicious.  So my only caution would be to keep them out of the reach of kids because they may want to consume the whole bottle.  These are a little pricey for the amount that you get and the bottle says if you are 12 or over to take 2 a day so they go very quickly, but I think well worth the price for feeling good.

title: These made my stomach hurt quite a bit. I ...
body: These made my stomach hurt quite a bit. I am told that if you stick it out a month, that goes away but I am not sure if I felt a noticeable difference on the positive side. Certainly not enough that I wanted to take them any longer than the 3 weeks I already had.

title: Helps with allergies and eczema too
body: My 3 year old and my 9 year old loves this. My youngest has bad eczema and allergies, to about everything from animals to food. I swore ever since she has been taking this probiotics for about 7 months now, her skin has gotten clearer and not breaking out as terrible as it did before. Ofcourse, her medications, lotions and other things we have been using helps to but I really believe this was the last ingredients/thing that was needed to help her skin clear up. If you have a child with eczema or/and allergies, I definitely recommend you try it. I hope this review helps.

title: Five Stars
body: Kids love these. They're like candy for them

title: So maybe it may be wise to ship with a cool pack when shipping in the Summer
body: My son loves the taste. I have no problem with him taking it. He actually 'reminds' me to take it. The only issue that I had was that it was in the process of melting. So I had to refrigerate and then cut them back into the little pieces for him to take. So maybe it may be wise to ship with a cool pack when shipping in the Summer.

title: These taste wonderful! No matter how old you are
body: These taste wonderful!  No matter how old you are, you should take the gummies to help stay young at heart.  I use another probiotic along with this one and alternate.  I've read the body can get used to the bacteria if you don't alternate every couple of months.  These taste better than the brand I use and don't have the off smell, either.  I much prefer these.

title: These are definitely good!
body: Taste great and the kids LOVE them! I'm considering switching from the "pearls" I've been taking to these too. I wish there were more in a bottle since my 3 and 6 year old girls take them. I'm not a psycho homeopath tree hugger either, but I do reasonable research and then confirm with my G.P. They say they're beneficial, so we're in.

title: Love the vitamins, but they were melted together into a single gelatinous blob when I got them
body: I love these. They taste good and are good for you. My kids like them too. So why 2*? Well, I purchased these and they arrived on time in 2 days (good) but they were a solid melted blob. They got too hot either in storage or shipping and melted all together. So I couldn't separate the individual pieces. Won't be buying online again.

title: My 3 year old loves these gummies. I have ...
body: My 3 year old loves these gummies. I have tried the powdered probiotic and he always seem to be able to tell it was in his milk or juice and wouldn't drink it. He takes these no problem. Originally purchased them from the Vitamin shoppe but found them on Amazon for $5.00 cheaper. Yay!

title: Winner for us!
body: My daughter was previously taking a harder, chewable probiotic and I found they kept getting dried up and chalky as time went on (even with the bottle closed).  My daughter loves gummies anyhow and she has loved these as well.  No complaints about the taste, and she seems to be having zero tummy and bathroom issues (which she has had in the past).

title: Love these!
body: These are delicious! I've been purchasing these for 3 years now (which is a record for me since I typically try a product and then when it's finished, try another brand).

title: Works well. I've seen improvement in my gastronomical health ...
body: Works well.I've seen improvement in my gastronomical health.

title: I buy these for my daughter she loves the taste ...
body: I buy these for my daughter she loves the taste and it helps with digestion and immune system. Plus she hasn't been sick as much since taking this  product. Will continue to purchase it for her.

title: I love to open them in the morning and smell them ...
body: OMG these are the tastiest probiotic gummies ever.  I love to open them in the morning and smell them as I divvy them out to my 5 year old.  These have everything a kid (or adult) needs to keep beneficial bacteria in check.

title: My kids don't like how these taste and won't eat them
body: My kids don't like how these taste and won't eat them, I can't attest to whether or not they work because of this. It's disappointing because it is hard to find a good probiotic that tastes good for kids, I don't understand why, it's not my kids, they like gummy vitamins etc. These are sour and sweet, they have a sugary coating that my daughter does not like. My son doesn't like the over all taste of them and he'll eat almost anything!

title: Tangy/tart flavor, seems not as effective as other brands
body: These didn't work for us. We had better results with the store brand ones from Target. Plus those come in a variety of flavor (if you have picky kids like me).

title: Great product, not so great purchase.
body: I have been dying to find a probiotic gummy for my 4 year old. He won't take the powder in drinks anymore and the other reviews for this product made me really excited to order it. It did arrive as scheduled via USPS(took about a week) from The Natural Health Shoppe. Upon opening the bottle, I realized during shipping all the gummies had melted, melded together and formed one solid block that was stuck to one side of the bottle. I have no way of solving this and per the vendor's return policy, I cannot return it and my refund will be deducted a 15% "restocking fee" and the cost of the free shipping. Guess next time I'll find a product covered by my Prime membership and get it within 2 days.

title: 2 of my kids like them. The packaging is horrible
body: The product is ok.  2 of my kids like them.  The packaging is horrible.  The wrapper slides right off the bottle and the child proof top is impossible to open.  I thought it might be just a defective bottle so I opened the second and we need to pry it off and then not screw it back on since you cannot get it off!  My husband couldn't get it off either bottle so we had to use pliers. I will not buy again

title: My daughter's bowl became a little bit difficult again (still better than before)
body: I'm not sure if all probiotics on the market serves the same purpose, but I get probiotics for my daughter's constipation.  We usually use NOW Foods, but bought this brand once for a change.  It didn't work as well as NOW Foods I must say.  My daughter's bowl became a little bit difficult again (still better than before), so we switched back to NOW Foods.

title: Works better on constipation than loose stool
body: My 3 year old daughter liked the gummy. However i was using it to help with her loose stool and it did not help. The day we stopped using it her stool got back to normal. I think it might be more helpful for constipation.

title: Effective; highly recommend them
body: These Probiotics were recommended to me when I was toilet training my then 2.5YO. He has a resistance towards toilet training, specifically for  bowel movements (he would continue to hide vs. using the toilet).  I finally started him on the Probitics and within a couple days he was using the toilet.  I realized that he was hiding because because how difficult it was for him to have a BM and once he stared on the probiotics things were a lo smoother.  He likes the flavor and he now asks for them- I have noticed a difference in his BM and even in his mood prior to BM if for some reason he does not take the Probilicious.  I definitely recommend this product

title: Works for our family
body: My family younger family members like these. They don't seem too harsh on the stomach, if you know what I mean. With some probiotics you can't tell you've taken them. With some, they are much to apparently effective. These are a good balance for an average healthy person.

title: Not better than what you can buy in the store.
body: My daughter loved the taste of these, but they didn't do anything for her than the cheaper store versions did. We ended up having to switch to a capsule from the health food store to break open and add to her food to get her yeast under control.

title: Great product!
body: Bought these for my 5 year old after his acid reflux came back.  He was given a prescription bit the medication was horrible tasting and he refuse to take it. Pediatrician suggested that I put him on a probiotic, and since I buy everything from Amazon I decided to see what they had. I found these and decided to give them a chance. They are quite tasty, and they have greatly improved his acid reflux. I've recently started taking them for my IBS and an also having great success.  I just bought 2 more bottles.  Note: its cheaper to buy 2 individual bottles than it is to buy the twin pack.

title: Nice tasting probiotics for kids
body: Nice way to get probiotics into your children.  I usually use a different brand but wanted to give these a try.  Most of my kids prefer the other brand.  I tasted these and they are very good tasting not sure why my kids did not like them that much, I think it's because of the sugary like coating on top, they never seem to like that type of vitamin as much as others that do not have it.  Probiotics keep my kids healthy and when they show signs of any illness I double or triple up on the dose.

title: They work!
body: My son was on Miralax since he was two. He suffered from constipation and bad patches of eczema.  We eventually did an elimination diet and concluded that he had an intolerance to gluten and milk.  Once we decreased those from his diet his constipation improved but was still a problem.  Once he started taking these he has become REGULAR for the first time in his life! He is now 9 yrs old.  He loves them! and he likes how he feels! even his skin looks better. Would totally recommend these!

title: They're pretty good I must admit
body: I've tried various forms of probiotics for my daughter, and realized she likes the gummie supplements. She loves these. They're pretty good I must admit. But I can't really tell if they are working for her or if it's just a great tasting average probiotic. She suffers from occasional constipation and probiotics normally regulate her but I haven't noticed that with these. I'll finish what remains & see if things change or I might look for another.

title: Great taste! No need to refrigerate
body: My toddler loves the taste of these probiotic gummies and so do I! I like that we can share the same product. The recommended dose per the bottle is 1 for children (see age specifics on bottle) and 2 for adults daily. It encourages her to take hers daily with mommy and she looks forward to taking them. I love the health benefits of taking probiotics and have always loved the rainbow light brand, I use them for all our supplemental needs.

title: LOVED these...until they doubled in price!
body: My little guy (4 yrs old) loves these! However, they literally doubled in price over the last month or so...bummed. :(  I had them set up on Subscribe And Save, so I did not realize there was a price jump until the latest shipment.  Off to find a good replacement...

title: Yummy chews!
body: So my son was experiencing stomach pain-- so much that we took him to the doctor and found out it was constipation likely from not drinking enough water. These were recommended and they helped within a day or two. They taste sweet, my kids beg for more than one, and we haven't had any negative side effects. Recommend trying them!

title: Wonderful for picky kids!
body: I was so excited about receiving this product. I've tried hopelessly to get my kid to swallow the pill and powder forms of probiotics and every time the ordeal turned into an enormous battle of the wills. I'm still amazed at what kids can taste inside of their juice and how enteric coated pills leave an aftertaste...

title: Arrived melted
body: Purchased because my preteen has been having tummy issues but when it got here the entire contents had melted. There was a solid gummy pool at the bottom of the bottle that had coated the sides as well. Decided not to purchase anything gummy online in future. Also, it made me wonder how well the bacteria might survive that type of heat, so I purchased some at my local WalMart and Whole Foods instead.

title: Delicious, great for kids
body: Delicious! I give my son only Rainbow Light vitamins and purchased this when I found out there is also a gummy probiotic. Easier to give to a child than the powder probiotic you mix into a drink which for me was hit or miss - he doesnt finish the drink, he didnt get the full dose of probiotics. Son loves all this gummy. Only small issue is it is quite sticky and tends to stick together. I unstick and fish it out of the jar with a pair of chopsticks.

title: While they taste great, I haven't noticed a big difference in my ...
body: While they taste great, I haven't noticed a big difference in my regularity but I have noticed a difference in my immunity. I will purchase this again. However, I am only giving this three stars because when I reordered them, they were all melted together.

title: Excellent probiotic
body: We decided to add probiotics to our diet to help in balancing our digestive systems. I have a hard time swallowing pills, so decided to try these gummies. They are great! They taste delicious and easy to chew and digest. Will definitely buy again.

title: Tastes great, runs out fast
body: These were tasty and delicious and my 3 and 5 year old children loved them!  I have recently read some medical literature that probiotics can shorten the length of illnesses, especially the flu, so I was trying to keep us all healthy this cold and flu season.  While these were easy to take, I'm not sure how much they impacted our health and there are not very many in a container, so at 2 for each person, they don't last long.

title: BEST TASTE OF ANY SUPPLEMENT!
body: Dangerously delicious!!! I only say dangerous because I may have to keep the bottle locked up because they taste so good. Seriously have never tasted a better supplement of any kind (probiotic or not) in my life... I don't even care if they work or not (I just got them last night) they are so good it doesn't matter lol... But they probably do :)

title: worked for us
body: Family really loves these probiotics - have been begging my husband, with lactose intolerance, to take probiotics for over a year.  These are the only ones that have stuck, because they taste like candy.  They definitely help his stomach.  However, I did a search for the efficacy of these gummies, and turns out, they're ranked at a D- (google search these tablets with name + reviews and you'll see a list) because they have  more bacteria than they said they did.  I'm not actually sure why that's a bad thing.  Anyway, we bought them before I saw the review, and then I tried to change brands and my hubby's stomach problems came back, so we are going to be very loyal customers of this brand from here on out.

title: My daughter loves them
body: I bought these for my 7 year old daughter, she loves them. Full of flavor and really great on the nutritional content. This is the second product that I have tried from Rainbow Light and I am impressed. I really wished that it came in a larger size though. But I guess that this is the safest size to ensure product freshness.

title: pleased
body: I've been buying these for my toddler son for at least a year now.  They taste great, and he has no problem chewing them up.  I have no way of really knowing what these have done for his digestive system, but it seems to help keep him regular and not as gassy.  We started these when he went on a stint of having to take antibiotics every few weeks, it seemed.  My only complaint with the product is the packaging.  There is something about the cap that threads off at times and makes it difficult to get the cap off.  This has happened to me with a few different bottles.  Otherwise, I'm very pleased with this product.

title: Better than candy! You're gonna love these!
body: OMG. The best tasting gummy product ever. I started eating these like candy. These are better than any gummy candy I have eaten. Kids will love these. I started taking them when I had to take antibiotics for an allergic reaction to the pencil cactus tree (euphorbia family) that grows all over AZ, NM, UT.

title: These made my stomach hurt quite a bit. I ...
body: These made my stomach hurt quite a bit. I am told that if you stick it out a month, that goes away but I am not sure if I felt a noticeable difference on the positive side. Certainly not enough that I wanted to take them any longer than the 3 weeks I already had.

title: Love these, great flavor!
body: I've been buying these for over a year for my two kids, ages 3 and 6. Both kids love to eat their "tummy" vitamins and they taste delicious--sometimes I even sneak one instead of swallowing down my own probiotic! We had previously been using another chewable brand that did not have a gummy option--the flavor difference is night and day--these actually taste good, like candy, so getting your kid to eat one is not that difficult! I would recommend them any day. We choose to refrigerate them, but it is not necessary.

title: does a good job
body: I bought this product because I have a 6 and 8 year old who has irregularity problems all the time, they have been taking these probiotics and since then have become more regular, they also like the flavor they say they taste like regular gummy snacks . I am really happy with this product I will continue to buy it!

title: Very good!
body: My dd loves these. They're sweet tasting and nice texture. I was happy we found this, it worked with a few days.  Other brands went in the garbage.

title: Great!!!
body: Bought these for my 8 year nephew on the advise of an old pharmacist.

title: One has a red dye allergy so this was a great option. The kids actually don't love the flavor
body: I bought these for my kids. One has a red dye allergy so this was a great option. The kids actually don't love the flavor, but my husband likes them. Glad to have probiotics around. We use then daily for immune system boost.

title: Rainbow Light
body: DELICIOUS!! I love it that I only need two per day and that the dosage isn't spaced out..second doses I always forget. The only complaint I have is that they aren't as big as a golf ball because they taste so good.

title: My son loves them
body: I'm not sure they are doing anything, but man do they taste sugariffic!!! It's funny that they say one reason for needing a probiotic is that our digestive system gets off track or out of balance. One of the things I've read that contributes to that is white sugar....these are clearly coated in sugar. I'm not bashing just an interesting note. They do taste good though.

title: I've had to take many antibiotics over the years and ...
body: I've had to take many antibiotics over the years and my digestive tract seemed to be out of wack.  Tried these. They were delicious.  Keep out of reach of children as they may mistake them for candy instead of medicine.

title: Essential supplement for my girls and they love the taste...
body: Only probiotics I've found that my girls will actually take.  They often ask if they can have a second one.  I tell them only 1 a day.  But they obviously like the taste.

title: Excellent
body: We bought these for our daughter since she was clearly having digestion issues due to antibiotics for an infection.  She goes bonkers over them, and the first day she started taking them her movements improved.  I would suggest these to anyone that needs a probiotic for their kid.

title: They're so good, you almost want to snack on them
body: These are, just as they say, delicious.  My kids don't mind taking their probiotics at all, and I've even started taking them instead of my usual capsule.  They're so good, you almost want to snack on them.  Not a hint of any flavor but the cranberry!

title: Best Allergen Free Probiotic!! EVER!!
body: I LOVE these probiotics for my severely food allergic children, they work well and they are free from the additives and allergens that other dairy based probiotics have. I will ALWAYS buy these! Much cheaper than Whole Foods.

title: Yummy for your tummy
body: These are so good. I bought them for my son but now I eat them too! I even bought some for my uncle who is trying to clean up his digestive tract. I haven't been measuring the benefits but I absolutely love the flavor. If this was candy, I'd eat the whole bag.

title: Yummy!
body: These taste great! I hate taking pills and have a hard time doing it in the morning. I have turned to gummies for most of my vitamins - these are great.

title: So maybe it may be wise to ship with a cool pack when shipping in the Summer
body: My son loves the taste. I have no problem with him taking it. He actually 'reminds' me to take it. The only issue that I had was that it was in the process of melting. So I had to refrigerate and then cut them back into the little pieces for him to take. So maybe it may be wise to ship with a cool pack when shipping in the Summer.

title: Delicious and perfect for children
body: My son's pediatrician recommended probiotics to help his constipation issues so I bought this one. The gummies taste like candy and my son already noticed a lot of improvement... I'll leave out the details lol He told me he gives it all 5 stars :)

title: Love the vitamins, but they were melted together into a single gelatinous blob when I got them
body: I love these. They taste good and are good for you. My kids like them too. So why 2*? Well, I purchased these and they arrived on time in 2 days (good) but they were a solid melted blob. They got too hot either in storage or shipping and melted all together. So I couldn't separate the individual pieces. Won't be buying online again.

title: Excellent brand, safe ingredients that I feel good with ...
body: Excellent brand, safe ingredients that I feel good with giving my son. He also has a sensitive stomach and would complain of pain, he has autism so that is common; since he started taking these he hasn't complained of pain since and also has good bowl movements because the probiotics have helped regulate him.

title: These are definitely good!
body: Taste great and the kids LOVE them! I'm considering switching from the "pearls" I've been taking to these too. I wish there were more in a bottle since my 3 and 6 year old girls take them. I'm not a psycho homeopath tree hugger either, but I do reasonable research and then confirm with my G.P. They say they're beneficial, so we're in.

title: Delicious!
body: Our 3-yr-old son loved the flavor of these probiotic gummies far more than the other probiotics he has taken, but he seemed to have an adverse reaction so he had to stop taking them.  He has a couple of conditions related to his digestive system, and unfortunately he could not take these.  His big sisters finished off the bottle and seemed to do well with them.  We will consider purchasing them again for our daughters!

We couldn't even separate out pieces of the goo to serve our kids... I am disappointed that we can't get them shipped in the form they are supposed to come in. Great product but due to them melting while shipping, we won't be buying these again. Really too bad.

These are gummies and they taste great so kids will eat them. And most importantly, they help her poop without any negative effects since they're not a drug or a laxative or anything of the sorts. Just PROBIOTICS.

I made the mistake of pulling her off of this only to try a different probiotic and the horrible constipation problems returned!  Now that she's back on it, she's having regular bowel movements about every other day!  We're SO happy with this product!

title: Don't give up
body: I tried these for 2 weeks and seen little to no results.. I gave up.. Continued to wake up each morning with severe IBS. Desperate for hope, I cam back to Amazon to read more reviews. One person stated taking 2 a day, morning and night... HUGE change... Within 3 days my stomach is better than ever. I am beyond happy, these changed my life. If 1 a day isn't working, try 2 !!!

title: Thank you Jesus and I mean that!!!
body: Yes yes yes!!!

title: I can really notice a difference
body: I was really looking for a vaginal health probiotic, but I didn't like the selection I saw because they were pricey and didn't have a lot of capsules in the package. After reading through some of the reviews for this product, I decided that this might work wonders for overall body health. Why not treat three problems with one stone? (Vaginal health, gas, bloating).

title: CURED all my tummy problems!
body: I LOVE this product.  I used to have a lot of tummy problems and I was using a lot of over the counter medication trying to control them.  After recent studies claimed that some medications sold over the counter could cause kidney issues, I began my search for a healthier alternative.  I discovered that probiotics helped.  I have tried NUMEROUS brands. This product not only worked better, but they are super tiny and easy to swallow.  They also do not require refrigeration which makes them so handy to store and use while traveling.  After completing my first box, my tummy issues are COMPLETELY gone!  I will continue to use as long as they continue to make them!

title: Better than Miralax
body: I LOVE these pearls! My kids and I had to live on Miralax everyday for years due to severe constipation. I hated relying on a drug, but it was the only thing that would help. I decided to TRY these after doing some research online. I originally found them ar Walmart and later found them WAAAAY cheaper her on Amazon. But after a couple days it started working! I definitely noticed a difference and had to back off on my miralax! I then started to gradually decrease the Miralax over a few weeks and....success! I've been using these for nearly 2 years now. I started  giving them to my kids (age 7 and 5) about a month ago and it's working for them too! Once in a while I'll need to take 2 a day, but only for 5-7 days during my period, lol.

title: Can't imagine going without Pearls ever again!
body: My husband found these and began using them to help his stomach after he had taken antibiotics for an unrelated illness which left his stomach with extreme sensitivity and some discomfort.  His stomach improved rapidly and he suggested I try them.  I have been plagued all my life with constipation.  I had resorted to taking fiber on a daily basis, but sometimes it didn't work and just succeeded in making me feel bloated.  Within a few days of taking Pearls regularly, I noticed I was having regular and for me more frequent bowel movements.  I felt less bloated.  The best thing about these is that they are hearty - no refrigeration is required like some other brands.  They can be slippery because they are so small and smooth.  We've learned to push them out of the foil container into a spoon rest so that they don't slip or roll away.  I love that they don't have to be taken at any specific time (like 20 minutes before a meal or something, which some of these probiotics require), just once a day any time.  I don't like having to fool around with time issues. Personally, I like taking them at night on an empty stomach. I've found if I miss one, I can tell the difference almost immediately.

title: Recommended by my doctor
body: My gynecologist told me to get this. He said it was better than any prescription he could give me to keep away infections caused by imbalances in the digestive & female tracts. He told me to get this brand & I have been using it for years. He was right. Haven't had any infections since that first & only one he treated me for.

title: Worth a Shot!
body: Good product!  My husband used these to help with some of his symptoms from Ulcerative Colitis.  While they are certainly not a cure for the disease, they did help by controlling some of the bad bacteria in his intestines.  They are slightly difficult to remove from the packaging, but definitely worth a try if you have stomach/intestine issues.

title: Real Gems!!
body: A friend gave me my first pearl after eating out one night at a Thai Restaurant.  This was AFTER I had taken a Beano with no relief.  In about 15 minutes, I began to feel a difference. 30 minutes later and I noticed a significant change.. and, 1 hour later I was feeling great!  A few days later, I bought my own box and started taking them everyday.  I've bought (and still have in my cabinet) other Acidophilus pills before, but never noticed much of a difference after taking them a few weeks.  I'm not lactose intolerant, but for some reason yogurts like Activa really make my stomach cramp up severely... and, I mean I drink whole milk and half and half with no issues at all... so, I've never known the benefits from eating a product with Acidophilus in it... but, I know the body can benefit from it as my doctor would suggest it often... especially when taking heavy dosages of antibiotics. Since I've been taking these (about 3 months now), I feel great.  No more bloating or holding on to excess gas... and, I'm very regular now!  I've signed up for the subscribe and save program... don't want to be without these from now on! Great product and VERY effective!

title: I really wanted these to work
body: I ordered these because I have a lot of problems with IBS-C and the reviews I read seemed really promising. Although I have only been taking these for 2 weeks my C has not at all improved although my bloating has gotten better and the stomach noises after meals have greatly subsided. I am going to keep taking these and will revisit this review in a few more weeks! I'm hoping it helps my C and we can give it 5 stars.

title: Work perfect for me
body: These work great for me, and I like that the Pearls, unlike Now Foods Probiotics that I also bought from Amazon, do not require refrigeration.

title: For me, life changing.
body: Since before I was a teen I have never been able to have a proper bowel movement "schedule." Always constipated, then when I did go, they were the tiny "bunny" ones, I would call them. Fast forward to my late twenties when I was diagnosed with a rare form of colitis & I just could not keep it in. With the help of my doctor, I finally figured out a prescription med that helped to control my problem but I was off & on back to my previous constipated self. I started taking these daily over 2 months ago & haven't looked back. I am regular, solid & haven't had any tummy pains. I can't say that I have ever gone 2 or 3 days within the last 20 years without issues, so for me, these tiny pearls are life changing.

title: Great probiotic! Even for someone with allergies
body: I enjoyed this product. I have a pretty wicked dairy allergy (non-life threatening), but was able to take these with signifanctly less severe reactions than other probiotics I have tried. If you struggle with recurrent infections, have a dairy allergy and are unable to find a good probiotic that is effective, I recommend this product.

title: Doctors recommended extra fiber products(like Benefiber) which just made me bloated
body: Works extremely well for IBS. Doctors recommended extra fiber products(like Benefiber) which just made me bloated, gassy, crampy, and generally just more miserable. Not only do I suffer from IBS, but I also have conditions which have required me to be on pain meds for many years. I've been on these babies for a couple of years now and take them religiously. I poop regular most of the time and rarely catch nasty bugs going around anymore because of the boost to my immune system. A lot of my friends and family are now healthier and more regular because of my recommendation for these wonderful little Pearls. My daughter contracted a nasty intestinal parasite and the first thing I did, after reacting in total horror, was to put her on a subscription of Pearls from Amazon! They work!

title: So cheap and effective!
body: I have had a lot of different digestive issues and my doctors always recommend that I take a probiotic. I have been recommended Culturelle and Align and others, which are all relatively pricey at the drugstore. My friend recommended the pearls to me, and I could not be happier! They are so affordable and have been way more effective than other those brands that my doctors recommended. They are also much smaller than any other probiotic I have had, which makes it easier to swallow! The pearls are great! I would try these out before opting for any drug store brand.

title: Best probiotics!
body: I have some pretty frustrating digestive issues and if you're a girl, you know how annoying it is to not be able to digest normally. Throughout the years, I've tried greek yogurt (which made me gain a lot of weight), Activia Light (after realizing I was gaining weight from the greek yogurt), and expensive probiotics that I hated taking because the pills were so large. My sister told me about Pearls so I ordered a pack on Amazon. After about two weeks of use, I started seeing improvement. Before using Pearls, I was using the restroom about once every 2-3 days on average. Now I go consistently, and around the same time every day! I still have issues when I'm traveling or when I'm in an uncomfortable environment, but for the most part, these probiotics have successfully regulated my system. The best part is that the pills are tiny so taking them is a breeze! What a relief it is to not always feel bloated and uncomfortable!!!

title: I like small things, they go down my throat easier.  No innuendo there.
body: This makes you poop better, right?  Well, how can you have an objective review when what you eat varies each day?  I'd literally have to eat the same meals everyday for a couple of weeks to see the objective benefit of this product.  However, it's recommended by doctors especially after an antibiotic treatment, and swallowing tiny pearls sure beats horse pills they like to prescribe.  5 stars for being tiny!

title: Best natural product on the market!
body: i have always had stomach issues. I take nexium daily and have for years. I never know if what I eat is going to cause pain and discomfort. Finally, in desperation, I thought, what do I have to lose trying a probiotic. Wow!! I've gone from stomach upsets regularly every evening, to none, as long as I take my acidophilus faithfully in the evening.

title: They are perfectly tiny and easy to swallow
body: These little pills are like tiny little beads that you can swallow very easily. For those who hate pills that dissolve in your mouth, or capsules that get stuck in your throat, it is perfect. They work great, I use them any time I am sick, or have gas, and recently when I had norovirus and it helped my gut get back in check. They are all in their silver wrap that you pop out, so it's easy to travel with them and just tear off how many you will need. I have tried plenty of probiotics and while some worked great, I hated taking them because of the capsule form, and needing to keep them refrigerated. These don't need to be kept in the refrigerator, and they are nice and easy to swallow, ensuring that I will take them daily without fuss.

title: Works!
body: I have a lot of stomach problems, my son told me about these things and I have been taking them for several months now and they help a great deal, I take one every morning will continue doing so as long as they are available.

title: These are awesome and totally work for the whole family!!!
body: Been taking pearls for years and years because they're cheaper and just as effective as Wobenzyme.  I give them to my family and we have rarely gotten sick in years.  These are truly awesome and worth the price.  Give it a month or two and you won't be sorry.  So tiny, anyone including a small child can easily swallow.  Definitely a plus.  At first, take 3 times a week, then increase to once a day.  Happy gut, happy person!  :)

title: Keep your pearls Refrigerated better shelf life
body: The  90 days supply of the pearls is the the best buy, its a 3 month supply, and after all you don't have to run to Walmart or Walgreen's to purchase another 30 days worth.  Both of us (husband & wife)  were sharing before and when I found out that Amazon carried a 90 day, 180, supply I was sold. every 3 months I will be reordering this product of probiotics and my Dr. stated to me it was a brilliant choice to start taking Pearls, it helps over all digestive, balances out the gas, and bloating, regulates irregularity, great for the Immune system. Usually you see these products on the shelf, its better to refrigerate the pearls, better shelf life, just because it has 10 strains. Its worth every dollar spent.

title: Have been taking for years.
body: Hands down best probiotic for my system. Have used them from the first time they came out. This is the best place to get them. I have them on subscribe and save way cheaper than any discount drugstore.

title: Pearls
body: The Pearls Probiotic supplement works really with my troublesome stomach. I switch back and forth with Pearls and Phillips Probiotic so that my stomach doesn't get to used to one product.

title: Love them
body: So easy to use, can't taste them and they have helped me feel better.  Not sure if I can do without them!

title: Puppy approved
body: I discovered my puppy had a terrible allergy to the grains in his food which was manifesting as an awful yeast infection. (Red swollen skin, weepy eyes, itchy rash) I switched his food and started him on this probiotic on the same day. Within days his symptoms started to subside. (Too soon for the food to make a difference so I am crediting this product) Thanks for giving my little guy some relief.

title: Ibs relief
body: So far is helped with ibs-d (and occassional c) Tummy hurt first week - week and a half but subsided as my body got used to it. I was prescribed anti depressant for my tummy and this gives me more consistent relief than increasing my dose did.

title: Put my machine right back to the factory settings
body: I have been motivated to write many bad reviews over the years for inferior products and services, but this is the rare occasion where I am just as motivated to tell you what a great product this is.  In two weeks time Acidophilus Pearls have somehow managed to correct what had in retrospect been years of digestive issues that I had been ignoring. Every now and then it would get so bad that I would try Papaya Enzyme tablets or Activia yogurt, but the results were slight and didn't seem worth the effort or money.  After going through September and October with a chronic stomachache, the research led me to the conclusion that friendly bacteria was missing from my system.  My best guess is that a lifetime accumulation of antibiotics and other medicines killed off my helped down there.  It's back now and I won't forget this lesson.  Count me a regular customer from this point on.

title: Acidophilus Pearls
body: I take one at night every single night.  The first night I took them it hurt my stomach a little, but by the second night I was fine.  I think some people take them in the morning, but for me it works better at night on an empty stomach.  These are extremely convenient to carry for travel and do not need refrigeration.  Works for overall health and stomach health and to keep you regular.  I am young, almost 30, and don't deal with IBS or any of those issues but have from time to time had some stomach problems. body: These little pills are like tiny little beads that you can swallow very easily. For those who hate pills that dissolve in your mouth, or capsules that get stuck in your throat, it is perfect. title: Really Bad – Did the Opposite of What it Said it Was Going to Do
body: Can't understand all the positive reviews. Granted they made me want to purchase the product in the first place but after going thru exactly 41 of those "pearls" I can honestly they don't work for me at all. And in a way it's a relief because they never made me feel good once. Quite the opposite; they made everything worst. But, I was in denial, thinking it must be something I ate, I ate too fast, too much, didn't have enough water etc, etc... Constipated, bloated, cramps, you name it. It got so bad I started on a food journal again last week, keeping tab on everything that goes into my mouth for bfast, lunch and dinner. The last time I kept that journal, and I kept it up for over three months because that's how long it took me to identify each and every reaction to each and every food I was consuming, the results were pretty clear: slight but very real and annoying wheat intolerance, especially whole wheat, total soy intolerance, and slight dairy intolerance. Not even my GI could figure that one out with all the tubes he inserted here and there. The kicker to those results? I travelled to Europe shortly thereafter for almost three weeks and guess what? No symptoms, no intolerance to anything. People are poisoning us here and I don't say this lightly. I stopped dairy products, brown rice and tofu, and looked for all the other way they label "soy" and soy derivatives in my supplements. Everything I buy in non-GMO, vitamins included. Until I decided to sort of replace the acidophilus I was no longer getting from the milk, yogurt and cheese. Big mistake, all the symptoms I have been combatting for years came back! Tonight I can't sleep because I'm not only bloated, my stomach is distented and hard like I'm pregant, but I also have painful cramps. So I come here on Amazon and read the bad reviews which I had never bothered to read before and surprise, that stuff is made of GMO soy, a double big no-no. I'm so relieved. I have shrinked my portions to a point where I can't shrink them anymore, I will finally be able to ingest more that a green juice or a hard boiled egg in the mornings, and my stomach will go back to being somewhat flat and soft. Not to even mention the bathroom part (because thanks to this stuff, I was back on prescription laxative the GI had prescribed last year). If you have the slightest intolerance to soy and/or GMO products, I would stay away big time.

I do really like the fact that I only have to take one of these TINY little pearls once a day, and that I can keep them in my purse since they require no refrigeration.  However, I am disappointed to say that so far I have noticed zero improvement despite taking one each & every day.  I will continue to take them daily since I bought a 90-day supply and from what I have read, they are good for you whether they actually seem to help or not.  Once the 90 days are up, I may try another probiotic, but so far am not impressed w/them in general and wonder if any would help me at all :-(

title: Give these a shot--they work for me!
body: So far these are the only probiotics I've taken (and I think I've tried 5 different kinds over the last few years) that actually made a noticeable difference in my digestion.  It didn't take long either, day two I was already feeling regular and less bloated, day three and beyond have been pretty smooth sailing.  Also, here's a tip that has helped me tremendously--don't drink and eat at the same time.  It seems crazy because everyone does it, but look it up--it works.  I try to stop drinking anything 20-30 minutes before eating, and then I wait at least an hour after eating before drinking anything, even water.  I find that for one I eat slower when I am not washing my food down before properly chewing it.  And also they say it gives your stomach acids a better chance to break down your food because it isn't diluted with liquid.  Makes sense to me, and in real life application I have seen serious results.  It's hard at first, especially not having a glass of wine at dinner or something, but it is worth it to wait!  Since I started waiting, I've noticed that other animals don't eat and drink at the same time, I guess they know more than we do.

title: This probiotic works!
body: I have Crohn's disease and have tried 2 probiotics before the pearls. I haven't seen improvements from either. With the first it was a placebo effect and the other one made things even worse. I am really happy I ran into these pearls. I saw the reviews and everyone was praising them. I read almost all of the 70 reviews here because I wanted to know every single thing about them. After reading all of the reviews I figured 70 people can't be lying. These pearls started working after 4-5 days. They don't cure Crohn's but they sure help. I am regular now and go to the toilet once a day every morning. I tolerate high fiber foods and milk products a lot better now. The only problem that's left now is greasy, fat food, but when I look into the past, what kind of problems I had, diarrhea, cramps, gas, bloating, running home because of diarrhea, missing out on life, I am grateful that this stuff was invented and hope this company will be here for at least another 100 years.

body: I recommend this items to family that have had an antibiotic treatment.  When you take an antibiotic treatment, many bacteria in your system are depleted, both good and bad bacteria.  When finished with an antibiotic run, think of your body as a hotel that's nearly completely empty after this antibiotic treatment.  One of two things can then happen 1) bad bacteria can multiply and your hotel (ie, your intestinal system) can have a population of bad bacterium or 2) good bacteria can multiply and your hotel can be filled with good bacteria.  Or obviously some combination of both.  You want to keep your body in balance and try to promote the good bacteria as much as possible.  If you replenish your systems with acidophilus or other good flora (bacteria), then your hotel will be filled with a good population.  This will help you in the long run.  Additionally, the more good bacteria in your system, the less likely that bad bacteria will see vacancies for multiplication.

title: Good delivery system
body: As I understand it, for probiotics to benefit the gut, they need to survive the trip down to where they need to live. In the old days, powder form (or capsules) was the norm for acidophilus ingestion. These "pearls" are supposed to insure the the ingestion of the beneficial bacteria in the gut where they need to be, instead of being destroyed by the stomach acids, etc. They have improved my overall well being as far as I can tell. This type of probiotic is apparently beneficial by building up one's immune system.

title: Acidophilus Pearls do the job
body: My first experience with the probiotic Enzymatic Acidophilus Pearls was about 4 years ago while preparing for a vacation in Cancun.  I was concerned about experiencing Montezuma's Revenge during our trip.  I asked for advice at Whole Foods for a good probiotic that didn't need refrigeration & this was the product they recommended.  It worked very well for the trip and I noticed that my normally sensitive stomach was actually better than usual, so I continued and to this day still take it daily.  I have recommended to numerous people with tummy issues & they have all found it to be effective. The price is much better through Amazon.

title: Really makes a difference for me
body: After a number of intestinal infections apparently in my case caused from antibiotics I had taken for pneumonia, I was turned on by my gastrointestinal doctor to a different and very much more expensive brand of probiotic.  Started to take these instead after running out of those.  It's because they are coated like a pearl and don't get dissolved in your stomach as opposed to your intestine, the acids in your stomach don't destroy the live enzymes before they can get to your intestines where they need to get absorbed. I take these every day as I really don't want to have to deal with another intestinal infection ever again.

title: Noticeable difference!
body: I have been taking this supplement every morning for quite some time and have noticed a major difference inmy dogestiv health. It seems that I digest things much easier than before, including dairy products, and gas has been all but eliminated. Excellent product!

title: No more bloat
body: I have been taking the product for a few months.  I have always been bloated and had a big stomach.  I noticed after a couple of weeks that my stomach was smaller and that I never bloat anymore.  I do have microscopic colitis perhaps that is why I have had such dramatic results.  The colitis never flairs anymore.  I have recently lost weight not due to this product, however, I have lost 2 inches in waist and hips but 4 around my stomach. I did not have these results when I ate an Activia a day. I plan on taking Acidophilus Pearl for the rest of my life.

title: Normalized my digestive issues
body: For the last few years I had been plagued by several issues related by my digestive tract and even though I've only been taking the pearls for about 2 weeks I think I've now put them behind me. I had a very strange problem of getting the urge to vomit on an empty stomach. It would come on suddenly and I would get dry heaves if I didn't get something in my stomach quickly! My doctor was as mystified as I was. In addition, I noticed that I was becoming more and more constipated, especially in the evenings. I was resigning myself to the thought that this is just what would happen when you get older, but it turns out this is not necessarily the case.

title: A great supplement to take after a antibiotic treatment
body: I recommend this items to family that have had an antibiotic treatment.  When you take an antibiotic treatment, many bacteria in your system are depleted, both good and bad bacteria.  When finished with an antibiotic run, think of your body as a hotel that's nearly completely empty after this antibiotic treatment.  One of two things can then happen 1) bad bacteria can multiply and your hotel (ie, your intestinal system) can have a population of bad bacterium or 2) good bacteria can multiply and your hotel can be filled with good bacteria.  Or obviously some combination of both.  You want to keep your body in balance and try to promote the good bacteria as much as possible.  If you replenish your systems with acidophilus or other good flora (bacteria), then your hotel will be filled with a good population.  This will help you in the long run.  Additionally, the more good bacteria in your system, the less likely that bad bacteria will see vacancies for multiplication.

title: Definately Works in Some Fashion
body: My husband and I just started taking these pills. They seem to work great for him. I definately have a feeling of less bloating, but not sure it has completely solved my problem. But I am going to give it a little more time. My husband swears by it. I had to force him to start taking these and now he won't stop!

title: My stomach thanks you
body: My wife and I have had a tough time finding the right probiotic to take.  Some where the size of horse pills, some contained so many billions of bacteria that could cause anyone's colon to explode, and some tasted like rabbit food (don't ask me how I know this).  Pearls was the answer and we love it.  The pill is very small (similar to tapioca bead) but delivers 1 billion count to your system.  It has worked for us and our digestive systems are happy.  You only need to take one a day (which was another plus... some you had to take 2+).  Highly recommended

title: Pretty good stuff
body: I tried this product due to various secondary yeast infections after being treated with antibiotics during the labor/delivery of my daughter. I have always been prone to yeast and after several bouts of thrush while breastfeeding I read that taking acidophilus was a good idea. I found out that many other comparable products (ie. Culturelle) are based on yeast. Given that I was trying to solve that very problem, this was the best product for me. Kind of gave me gas the first few days, but so far, no yeast infections. Keeping my fingers crosed! Easy to swallow, no refrigeration needed either.

title: didn't really notice a change but can't hurt right?
body: I guess I just have a seriously wonky digestive tract.  I notice that SOMETIMES after taking them bowel movements are a bit easier to pass; however, this is a really inconsistent outcome. I wouldn't count on it to change your life in any meaningful way (unfortunately for IBS-C sufferers).

title: I feel like a new person
body: It took about 48 hours for these to kick in but OMG have they made me feel better.  I've been "backed up" for nearly 3 months and I was stuck using laxatives which are NOT fun.  Now I'm as regular as the sun in July!  Thank you acidophilus!!

title: Really Bad – Did the Opposite of What it Said it Was Going to Do
body: Can't understand all the positive reviews. Granted they made me want to purchase the product in the first place but after going thru exactly 41 of those "pearls" I can honestly they don't work for me at all. And in a way it's a relief because they never made me feel good once. Quite the opposite; they made everything worst. But, I was in denial, thinking it must be something I ate, I ate too fast, too much, didn't have enough water etc, etc... Constipated, bloated, cramps, you name it. It got so bad I started on a food journal again last week, keeping tab on everything that goes into my mouth for bfast, lunch and dinner. The last time I kept that journal, and I kept it up for over three months because that's how long it took me to identify each and every reaction to each and every food I was consuming, the results were pretty clear: slight but very real and annoying wheat intolerance, especially whole wheat, total soy intolerance, and slight dairy intolerance. Not even my GI could figure that one out with all the tubes he inserted here and there. The kicker to those results? I travelled to Europe shortly thereafter for almost three weeks and guess what? No symptoms, no intolerance to anything. People are poisoning us here and I don't say this lightly. I stopped dairy products, brown rice and tofu, and looked for all the other way they label "soy" and soy derivatives in my supplements. Everything I buy in non-GMO, vitamins included. Until I decided to sort of replace the acidophilus I was no longer getting from the milk, yogurt and cheese. Big mistake, all the symptoms I have been combatting for years came back! Tonight I can't sleep because I'm not only bloated, my stomach is distented and hard like I'm pregant, but I also have painful cramps. So I come here on Amazon and read the bad reviews which I had never bothered to read before and surprise, that stuff is made of GMO soy, a double big no-no. I'm so relieved. I have shrinked my portions to a point where I can't shrink them anymore, I will finally be able to ingest more that a green juice or a hard boiled egg in the mornings, and my stomach will go back to being somewhat flat and soft. Not to even mention the bathroom part (because thanks to this stuff, I was back on prescription laxative the GI had prescribed last year). If you have the slightest intolerance to soy and/or GMO products, I would stay away big time.

i don't know that these actually work. i take them, but i can't tell if they make a difference or not. i basically just hope they do. *shrugs*

title: Gift
body: Did not use.  It was a gift.  Perhaps I will get some feedback in future as to whether or not there was improvement.

title: Pearls
body: I don't feel that I have used The Pearls long enough to give an accurate review.  They seem to work.  Time will tell.

title: doesn't work at all
body: This pearls didn't do a thing to my digestion problems, I could take as well tick tac so I'm not sure from where these all positive reviews, maybe from the seller??? had to return to 3lac which so far is the only one that works.
